Major_Well.name: Well
desc: [Put 1 <FOOD> on the 5 next turns. At the start of each turn, collect the <FOOD>]
Major_Well.description:
在接下来5轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的

desc: [__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW-1X> 5<FOOD>
[When you build it, you can Bake immediatly]
Major_ClayOven.description:

5
当你建造这个主要发展时，可以立即执行一次“烤面包”行动。

desc: [__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW-2X> 4<FOOD>
[When you build it, you can Bake immediatly]
Major_StoneOven.description:

4
当你建造这个主要发展时，可以立即执行一次“烤面包”行动。

A1_Shelter.name: Shelter
desc: You can immediately build a stable at no cost, but only if you place it in a pasture covering exactly 1 farmyard space.
A1_Shelter.description: 你可以立即免费建造一个畜棚，但前提是你把它放置在一个正好覆盖1个农场格子的牧场上。

A2_ShiftingCultivation.name: Shifting Cultivation
desc: Immediately plow 1 field.

A3_PaperKnife.name: Paper Knife
desc: Select 3 occupations in your hand. Select one of them randomly, which you can play immediately without paying an occupation cost.
A3_PaperKnife.description: 从你手牌中选出3张职业卡牌。随机从中选择一张，你可以立即打出它，无需支付职业花费。

A4_Baseboards.name: Baseboards
desc: You immediately get 1 <WOOD> for each room you have. If you have more rooms than people, you get 1 additional <WOOD>.
A4_Baseboards.description:
你每拥有一个房间，你立即获得1
。如果你拥有比家庭成员更多的房间，你额外获得1
。

A5_ClayEmbankment.name: Clay Embankment
desc: You immediately get 1 <CLAY> for every 2 <CLAY> you already have in your supply.
A5_ClayEmbankment.description:
你的供应堆每有2
，立即获得1
。

A6_StorageBarn.name: Storage Barn
desc: If you have the Well, Joinery, Pottery, and/or Basketmaker's Workshop, you immediately get 1 <STONE>, 1 <WOOD>, 1 <CLAY>, and/or 1 <REED>, respectively.
A6_StorageBarn.description:
如果你拥有“井”、“木工坊”、“陶器工坊”，和/或“制篮工坊”，你立即分别获得1
、1
、1
，和/或1
。

A7_GardenersKnife.name: Gardener's Knife
desc: You immediately get 1 <FOOD> for each grain field you have and 1 <GRAIN> for each vegetable field you have.
A7_GardenersKnife.description:
你每拥有一块
农田，你立即获得1
。并且你每拥有一块
农田，你立即获得1
。

A8_FoodBasket.name: Food Basket
desc: You immediately get 1 <GRAIN> and 1 <VEGETABLE>.
A8_FoodBasket.description:
你立即获得1
和1
。

A9_YoungAnimalMarket.name: Young Animal Market
desc: You immediately get 1 <CATTLE>. (Effectively, you are exchanging 1 <SHEEP> for 1 <CATTLE>.)
A9_YoungAnimalMarket.description:
你立即获得1
。(此卡牌效果等同于用1
交换1
。)

A10_WoodenShed.name: Wooden Shed
desc: This card can only be played via a __Major Improvement__ action. It provides room for one person. You may no longer renovate.
A10_WoodenShed.description: 本卡牌只能通过“主要发展”行动打出。本卡牌为一个家庭成员提供房间。你不能再翻新了。

A11_MudPatch.name: Mud Patch
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <PIG>. You can hold 1 <PIG> on each of your unplanted field tiles.
A11_MudPatch.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得1
。你的每个未播种的农田板块都能容纳1
。

A12_DrinkingTrough.name: Drinking Trough
desc: Each of your pastures (with or without a stable) can hold up to 2 more animals.
A12_DrinkingTrough.description: 你的每个牧场(无论是否有畜棚)可以额外容纳至多2只动物。

A13_RenovationCompany.name: Renovation Company
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 3 <CLAY>. Immediately after, you can renovate without paying any building resources.
A13_RenovationCompany.prerequisite: In Wooden House with Exactly 2 Rooms
A13_RenovationCompany.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得3
。然后，你可以立即翻新，无需支付建造资源。

A14_CarpentersHammer.name: Carpenter's Hammer
desc: Each time you build at least 2 wood/clay/stone rooms at once, you get a total discount of 2 <REED> as well as 2 <WOOD>/3 <CLAY>/4 <STONE>.
A14_CarpentersHammer.description:
每当你一次性建造至少2个木造/砖土/石造房间时，你可以少支付2
和2
/3
/4
。

A15_CarpentersAxe.name: Carpenter's Axe
desc: Each time after you use a wood accumulation space, if you then have at least 7 <WOOD> in your supply, you can build exactly 1 stable for 1 <WOOD>.
A15_CarpentersAxe.description:
每当你使用一个木材累积格后，如果你的供应堆中至少有7
，你可以用1
建造正好1个畜棚。

A16_RammedClay.name: Rammed Clay
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <CLAY>. You can use <CLAY> instead of <WOOD> to build fences.
A16_RammedClay.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。当你建造栅栏时，可以支付
或
(支付时可以混搭)。

A17_ReclamationPlow.name: Reclamation Plow
desc: After the next time you take animals from an accumulation space and accommodate all of them on your farm, you can plow 1 field.
A17_ReclamationPlow.description: 在你下次拿取一个累积格上的动物并全部圈养在你的农场后，你可以犁1块田。

A18_WheelPlow.name: Wheel Plow
desc: Once this game, when you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space with the first person you place in a round, you can plow 2 additional fields.
A18_WheelPlow.description: 每局游戏限一次，当你在一轮内放置你的第一个家庭成员来使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，你可以额外犁2块田。

A19_Handplow.name: Handplow
desc: Add 5 to the current round and place 1 field tile on the corresponding round space. At the start of that round, you can plow the field.
A19_Handplow.description: 在目前的轮数加上5，在该轮的轮次格放1个农田板块。在该轮开始时，你可以用该板块犁1块田。

A20_DoubleTurnPlow.name: Double-Turn Plow
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately plow up to 2 fields.
A20_DoubleTurnPlow.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即犁至多2块田。

A21_FamilyFriendHome.name: Family Friendly Home
desc: Each time you take a __Build Rooms__ action while having more rooms than people already, you also get a __Family Growth__ action and 1 <FOOD>.
A21_FamilyFriendHome.description:
每当你在拥有比家庭成员更多的房间时执行“建造房间”行动，你还获得一个“家庭增长”行动和1
。

A22_Telegram.name: Telegram
desc: Add 1 to the current round for each fence in your supply and mark the corresponding round space. In that round only, you can place a person from your supply.
A22_Telegram.description: 你供应堆中每有1个栅栏就在目前的轮数上加1，并标记对应的轮次格。仅在该轮内，你可以从你的供应堆中放置一个家庭成员。

A23_StoneCompany.name: Stone Company
desc: Immediately after each time you use a __Quarry__ accumulation space, you get a __Major or Minor Improvement__ action during which you must spend at least 1 <STONE>.
A23_StoneCompany.description:
每当你使用“采石场”累积格后，你立即获得一个“主要或次要发展”行动，在该行动期间你必须至少支付1
。

A24_ThreshingBoard.name: Threshing Board
desc: Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you get an additional __Bake Bread__ action.
A24_ThreshingBoard.description: 你每次使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，可以额外执行一次“烤面包”行动。

A25_Bassinet.name: Bassinet
desc: You can place a(nother) person on the first non-accumulating action space used in each work phase, if there is only 1 person, including newborns, on that space. (There can never be two people on __Meeting Place__.)
A25_Bassinet.description: 在每个工作阶段，你都可以在第一个由任意玩家(包括你自己)使用的非累积行动格中放置一个(不同的)家庭成员，只要该格中只有一个家庭成员。(“广场”中永远不能有2个家庭成员。)

A26_SleepingCorner.name: Sleeping Corner
desc: You can use any __Wish for Children__ action space even if it is occupied by one other player's person.
A26_SleepingCorner.description: 你可以使用任何一个“增加家庭成员”行动格，即便该格上已有其他玩家的家庭成员。

A27_OvenSite.name: Oven Site
desc: When you play this card, you get 2 <WOOD> and you can immediately build the __Clay Oven__ or __Stone Oven__ major improvement. Either way, it only costs you 1 <CLAY> and 1 <STONE>.
A27_OvenSite.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你获得2
并且你可以立刻建造“砖土烤炉”或“石造烤炉”主要发展。无论哪种，它只花费你1
和1
。

A28_ForestSchool.name: Forest School
desc: You can consider the __Lessons__ action spaces not occupied. You can replace each <FOOD> that an occupation costs with <WOOD>.
A28_ForestSchool.description:
你可以将“职业训练”行动格视为未被占据。你可以用
代替职业花费中的
。

A29_AleBenches.name: Ale-Benches
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, you can pay exactly 1 <GRAIN> from your supply to get 1 bonus <SCORE>. If you do, each other player gets 1 <FOOD>.
A29_AleBenches.description:
在每一轮的回家阶段，你可以从你的供应堆支付正好1
来获得1点奖励
。如果你这么做，每位其他玩家获得1
。

A30_BakingSheet.name: Baking Sheet
desc: Each time you take a __Bake Bread__ action, you can use this card to exchange exactly 1 <GRAIN> for 2 <FOOD> and 1 bonus <SCORE>.
A30_BakingSheet.description:
每次你执行一个“烤面包”行动，你可以使用本卡牌，来用正好1
交换2
和1点奖励
。

A31_DebtSecurity.name: Debt Security
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each major improvement you have, up to the number of your unused farmyard spaces.
A31_DebtSecurity.description:
游戏结束计分时，你每拥有一个主要发展，你获得1点奖励
，最多不超过你未使用的农场格子数量。

A32_Manger.name: Manger
desc: During scoring, if your pastures cover at least 6/7/8/10 farm yard spaces, you get 1/2/3/4 bonus <SCORE>.
A32_Manger.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你牧场所包括的格子数量至少为6/7/8/10，获得1/2/3/4点奖励
。

A33_BigCountry.name: Big Country
desc: For each complete round left to play, you immediately get 1 bonus <SCORE> and 2 <FOOD>.
A33_BigCountry.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，距离游戏结束每有1个未进行的完整轮次，立即获得1点奖励
和2
。

A34_Loppers.name: Loppers
desc: Each time you build 1 or more fences, you can also use this card to exchange 1 <WOOD> and 1 <FENCE> in your supply for 2 <FOOD> and 1 bonus <SCORE>.
A34_Loppers.description:
每当你建造1个或更多的栅栏时，你还可以使用本卡牌，来用你的供应堆中的1
和1
交换2
和1点奖励
。

A35_SwimmingClass.name: Swimming Class
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if you return a person from the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get 2 bonus <SCORE> for each newborn that you return home.
A35_SwimmingClass.description:
在每一轮的回家阶段，如果你的一个家庭成员从“钓鱼”累积格回家，则你每有一个回家的新生儿，你获得2点奖励
。

A36_FacadesCarving.name: Facades Carving
desc: When you play this card, you can exchange any number of <FOOD> for 1 bonus <SCORE> each, up to the number of completed harvests.
A36_FacadesCarving.prerequisite: Wood in Your Supply >= Current Round
A36_FacadesCarving.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以用任意数量的
交换奖励
，每个
交换1点奖励
，最多不超过已完成的收成次数。

A37_Bucksaw.name: Bucksaw
desc: Each time you renovate, you can also pay 1 <WOOD> to get 1 bonus <SCORE> and 1 <GRAIN>.
A37_Bucksaw.description:
每当你翻新时，你还可以支付1
来获得1点奖励
和1
。

A38_WoolBlankets.name: Wool Blankets
desc: During scoring, if you live in a wooden/clay/stone house by then, you get 3/2/0 bonus <SCORE>.
A38_WoolBlankets.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你住进木造/砖土/石造房屋，获得3/2/0点奖励
。

A39_Chapel.name: Chapel
desc: This is an action space for all. A player who uses it gets 3 bonus <SCORE>. If another player uses it, they must first pay you 1 <GRAIN>.
A39_Chapel.description:
本卡牌是一个所有玩家均可以使用的行动格。使用它的玩家获得3点奖励
。如果其他玩家使用它，其必须先支付给你1
。

A40_PottersYard.name: Potter's Yard
desc: Immediately place 1 <CLAY> on each unused space in your farmyard. Each time you turn a space into a used space, you get the clay and you can immediately exchange it for 2 <FOOD>.
A40_PottersYard.description:
立刻在你每个未使用的农场格子上各放置1
。每当你使用其中一个格子时，你获得上面的
并且可以立刻用它交换2
。

A41_VegetableSlicer.name: Vegetable Slicer
desc: Each time you upgrade a Fireplace to a Cooking Hearth, you immediately get 2 <WOOD> and 1 <VEGETABLE> (not retroactively).
A41_VegetableSlicer.description:
每当你将一个火炉升级成灶台，你立刻获得2
和1
(不追溯)。

A42_ForestLakeHut.name: Forest Lake Hut
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__/__Forest__ accumulation space, you also get 1 <WOOD>/<FOOD>.
A42_ForestLakeHut.description:
每当你使用“钓鱼”/“森林”累积格时，你还获得1
/
。

A43_FarmyardManure.name: Farmyard Manure
desc: Each time you build 1 or more stables in one turn, you place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
A43_FarmyardManure.description:
每当你在一个回合内建造1个或更多畜棚时，在接下来3轮的轮次格中各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

A44_PondHut.name: Pond Hut
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
A44_PondHut.description:
在接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

A45_FireProtectionPond.name: Fire Protection Pond
desc: Once you no longer live in a wooden house, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 6 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
A45_FireProtectionPond.description:
一旦你不再住在木造房屋，在接下来6轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

A46_ClawKnife.name: Claw Knife
desc: Each time you use the __Sheep Market__ accumulation space, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
A46_ClawKnife.description:
每当你使用“羊市”累积格时，在接下来2轮的轮次格中各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

A47_Trellises.name: Trellises
desc: Immediately place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next round spaces, up to the number of fences you have built. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
A47_Trellises.description:
立刻在接下来的轮次格中各放置1
，数量最多为你已经建造的栅栏数。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

A48_ShavingHorse.name: Shaving Horse
desc: Each time after you obtain at least 1 <WOOD>, if you then have 5 or more <WOOD> in your supply, you can exchange 1 <WOOD> for 3 <FOOD>. With 7 or more <WOOD>, you must do so.
A48_ShavingHorse.description:
每当你获得至少1
后，如果此时你的供应堆中有5个或更多
，你可以用1
交换3
。如果有7个或更多
，则你必须交换。

A49_NestSite.name: Nest Site
desc: Each time 1 <REED> is placed on a non-empty __Reed Bank__ accumulation space during the preparation phase, you get 1 <FOOD>.
A49_NestSite.description:
每当1
在准备阶段被放置在1个非空的“芦苇池”累积格时，你获得1
。

A50_MilkJug.name: Milk Jug
desc: Each time any player (including you) uses the __Cattle Market__ accumulation space, you get 3 <FOOD>, and each other player gets 1 <FOOD>.
A50_MilkJug.description:
每当任意玩家(包括你)使用“牛市”累积格时，你获得3
，每位其他玩家获得1
。

A51_DriftNetBoat.name: Drift-Net Boat
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get an additional 2 <FOOD>.
A51_DriftNetBoat.description:
每当你使用“钓鱼”累积格时，你额外获得2
。

A52_ThrowingAxe.name: Throwing Axe
desc: Each time you use a wood accumulation space while there is at least 1 <PIG> on the __Pig Market__ accumulation space, you also get 2 <FOOD>.
A52_ThrowingAxe.description:
每当你使用1个木材累积格时，如果在“猪市”累积格中至少有1
，你还获得2
。

A53_Claypipe.name: Claypipe
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if you gained at least 7 building resources in the preceding work phase, you get 2 <FOOD>.
A53_Claypipe.description:
在每轮的回家阶段，如果你在同一轮的工作阶段获得了至少7个建造资源，获得2
。

A54_Credit.name: Credit
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 5 <FOOD>. At the end of each round that does not end with a harvest, you must pay 1 <FOOD>, or else take a <BEGGING> marker.
A54_Credit.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得5
。在每个不以收成结束的轮次结束时，你必须支付1
，或者拿取1
标志。

A55_JunkRoom.name: Junk Room
desc: Each time after you build an improvement, including this one, you get 1 <FOOD>.
A55_JunkRoom.description:
你每次建造一个发展之后(包括本卡牌)，获得1
。

A56_Basket.name: Basket
desc: Immediately after each time you use a wood accumulation space, you can exchange 2 <WOOD> for 3 <FOOD>. If you do, place those 2 <WOOD> on the accumulation space.
A56_Basket.description:
你每次使用一个木材累积格之后，可以立即用2
交换3
。
如果你这么做，将用于交换的2
放在累积格上。

A57_MilkingParlor.name: Milking Parlor
desc: When you play this card, if you have at least 1/3/4 <SHEEP>, you immediately get 2/3/4 <FOOD>. The same applies if you have at least 1/2/3 <CATTLE>.
A57_MilkingParlor.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你至少拥有1/3/4
，你立刻获得2/3/4
。当你至少拥有1/2/3
时，获得同样效果。

A58_AsparagusKnife.name: Asparagus Knife
desc: In the returning home phase of rounds 8, 10, and 12, you can take 1 <VEGETABLE> from exactly 1 vegetable field. You can immediately exchange it for 3 <FOOD> and 1 bonus <SCORE>.
A58_AsparagusKnife.description:

农田拿取1
。你可以立刻用它交换3
和1点奖励
。

在你每次收成1+
后，如果你的供应堆中有3+
，你可以将正好1
转换为6

<VEGETABLE> <ARROW> 4<FOOD> <SHEEP> <ARROW> 3<FOOD>

4
3
5

2

desc: After the field phase of each harvest, you can use a <BAKE>-improvement but only to turn exactly 1 <GRAIN> into <FOOD>. (This is not considered a __Bake Bread__ action.)

在每次收成的收割步骤后，你可以使用一个
发展，但只能将正好1

。(这不被视为一个“烤面包”行动)

。

在每次收成的收割步骤，你每收成1块谷物农田就获得1

。

每当你使用动物累积格时，并且你已经有该种类的动物，你获得1
。

A67_CornScoop.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，额外获得1
。

每当你一次性建造的栅栏数大于等于目前的轮数，你立刻获得1

将目前的轮数加上4、7、9，在这些轮的轮次格各放1

。

每当你在你的回合内建造1个或更多畜棚时，在接下来3轮的轮次格中各放置1

。

。

。

当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
。每当任何玩家(包括你)使用“猪市”累积格，你立刻获得2
。

你每次使用“钓鱼”累积格时，额外获得1
和1
。

每当你执行一个无条件的“播种”行动，在至少一块农田上种植了
时，你获得1
和1
。

A80_StoneTongs.description:
你每次使用一个石材累积格时，额外获得1
。

每当你使用一个黏土/芦苇/石材累积格，在本卡牌上放置1

/
。在第7、11和14轮开始时，将本卡牌上的所有货物移动到你的供应堆。

或1
。

你每次执行“建造栅栏”行动时，你所建造的栅栏中有3个无需支付

游戏结束计分时，你每拥有一个

如图所示，将货物按顺序(从下往上)叠在本卡牌上。
(
)
你在任何时候都可以花费1

每当你从食物累积格中拿取1/2/3+
时，你还获得1

。

时，你还获得2

。在每次收成的收割步骤中，你可以从你的每个谷物农田上额外收获1

A113_HeresyTeacher.name: Heresy Teacher

A115_ChiefForester.description: 每当你使用一个木材累积格时，你还获得一个用于正好1块农田的“播种”行动。

A116_WoodCutter.description:
你每次使用一个木材累积格时，额外获得1
。

当你打出本卡牌时，你面前每有一个发展，你立刻获得1

在每次收成的收割步骤，你获得1
，且你可以用

。

A119_FirewoodCollector.description:

一旦你的木造房屋翻新为其他等级，在接下来的5轮的轮次格各放置2

当你打出本卡牌时和每当你使用一个“职业训练”行动格或“黏土坑”累积格后，你获得1
。

每当你使用“谷物运用”行动格时，你还获得2
和1
。

你每次建造一个房间或翻新时，你可以用1

或正好2

A124_Knapper.description:
每当你使用第5到第7轮的轮次格上的行动格卡牌前，你获得1
。

A125_Priest.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你住在砖土房屋，且有正好2个房间时，立即获得3
、2
和2
。

A126_MasterWorkman.name: Master Workman

A126_MasterWorkman.description:
每当你使用第1/2/3/4轮的轮次格上的行动格卡牌前，你获得1
