/
/
。

A127_Lodger.name: Lodger
desc: This card provides room for one person, but only until the returning home phase of round 9. If, by then, there is no room elsewhere for that person, remove it from play.
A127_Lodger.description: 直到第9轮的回家阶段之前，本卡牌为一个家庭成员提供房间。如果在那时，没有其他房间各纳该家庭成员，将该家庭成员从游戏中移除。

A128_RiparianBuilder.name: Riparian Builder
desc: Each time another player uses the __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you can build a room: if you build a clay/stone room, you get a discount of 1 <CLAY>/2 <STONE>.
A128_RiparianBuilder.description:
每当其他玩家使用“芦苇池”累积格，你可以建造一个房间：如果你建造的是砖土/石造房间，你少支付1
/2
。

A129_Swagman.name: Swagman
desc: Immediately after each time you use the __Farm Expansion__ or __Grain Seeds__ action space, you can use the respective other space with the same person (even if it is occupied).
A129_Swagman.description:
每当你使用“农场扩建”或“谷物种子”行动格之一后，你可以立刻用同一个家庭成员再使用另外那个格子
(即使该格子已经被占据)。

A130_MummysBoy.name: Mummy's Boy
desc: Once per round, when placing a person after your first two, you can place it on the action space with your 2nd person and use that space again, unless it is on the __Meeting Place__ action space.
A130_MummysBoy.description: 每轮仅限一次，当你本轮已经放置了2个家庭成员后，你要放置家庭成员时，你可以将其与第二个家庭成员放在同一个行动格中，并再次使用该格子。(标记这个行动格。)

A131_CraftTeacher.name: Craft Teacher
desc: Each time after you build the major improvement __Joinery__, __Pottery__, and __Basketmaker's Workshop__, you can play up to 2 occupations without paying an occupation cost.
A131_CraftTeacher.description: 每当你建造主要发展“木工坊”、“陶器工坊”和“制篮工坊”后，你可以打出至多2张职业卡牌，无需支付职业花费。

A132_Publican.name: Publican
desc: Each time before another player takes an unconditional __Sow__ action, you can give them 1 <GRAIN> from your supply to get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
A132_Publican.description:
每当在其他玩家执行一个无条件的“播种”行动前，你可以从你的供应堆中给其1
来获得1点奖励
。

A133_Braggart.name: Braggart
desc: During the scoring, you get 2/3/4/5/7/9 bonus <SCORE> for having at least 5/6/7/8/9/10 improvements in front of you.
A133_Braggart.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你面前有至少5/6/7/8/9/10张发展卡牌，获得2/3/4/5/7/9点奖励
。

A134_FullFarmer.name: Full Farmer
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <CLAY>. During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each pasture you have holding the maximum number of animals.
A134_FullFarmer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
和1
。游戏结束计分时，你拥有几个容纳最多动物的牧场，就获得多少奖励
。

A135_AnimalReeve.name: Animal Reeve
desc: If there are still 1/3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 1/2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with 2/3/4+ animals of each type gets 1/3/5 bonus <SCORE>.
A135_AnimalReeve.description:
如果距离游戏结束仍然有1/3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立刻获得1/2/3/4
。
游戏结束计分时，每种动物都拥有2+/3+/4+的每位玩家获得1/3/5点奖励
。

A136_DrudgeryReeve.name: Drudgery Reeve
desc: If there are still 1/3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 1/2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with 1+/2+/3+ building resources of each type gets 1/3/5 bonus <SCORE>.
A136_DrudgeryReeve.description:
如果距离游戏结束仍然有3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立刻获得2/3/4
。
游戏结束计分时，每种建造资源都拥有1+/2+/3+的每位玩家获得1/3/5点奖励
。

A137_RiverineShepherd.name: Riverine Shepherd
desc: Each time you use the __Sheep Market__ or __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you can also take 1 good from the respective other accumulation space, if possible.
A137_RiverineShepherd.description: 每当你使用“羊市”或“芦苇池”累积格之一时，如果可能，你还可以从另外那个累积格中拿取1个货物。

A138_Harpooner.name: Harpooner
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ space you can also pay 1 <WOOD> to get 1 <FOOD> for each person you have, and 1 <REED>
A138_Harpooner.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”累积格时，还可以支付1
来获得1
和等同于家庭成员数量的
。

A139_HollowWarden.name: Hollow Warden
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get a __Major Improvement__ action to build a Fireplace. Each time you use the __Hollow__ accumulation space, you also get 1 <FOOD>.
A139_HollowWarden.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得一个用于建造火炉的“主要发展”行动。每当你使用“泥坑”累积格时，你还获得1
。

A140_ShovelBearer.name: Shovel Bearer
desc: Each time you use the __Clay Pit__ or __Hollow__ accumulation space, you also get a number of <FOOD> equal to the amount of <CLAY> on the respective other accumulation space.
A140_ShovelBearer.description:
每当你使用“黏土坑”或“泥坑”累积格之一时，你还获得等于另外那个累积格上
数量的
。

A141_TurnipFarmer.name: Turnip Farmer
desc: At the start of the returning home phase of each round, if both the __Day Laborer__ and __Grain Seeds__ action spaces are occupied, you get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
A141_TurnipFarmer.description:
在每轮的回家阶段开始时，如果“临时工”和“谷物种子”行动格都被占据，你获得1个
。

A142_Cordmaker.name: Cordmaker
desc: Each time any player (including you) takes at least 2 <REED> from the __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you can choose to take 1 <GRAIN> or buy 1 <VEGETABLE> for 2 <FOOD>.
A142_Cordmaker.description:
每当任何玩家(包括你)从“芦苇池”累积格中拿取了至少2
，你可以选择拿取1
或用2
购买1
。

A143_Stonecutter.name: Stonecutter
desc: Every improvement, room, and renovation costs you 1 <STONE> less.
A143_Stonecutter.description:
你的每张发展卡牌、每个房间和每次翻新的花费都减少1
。

A144_Sequestrator.name: Sequestrator
desc: Place 3 <REED> and 4 <CLAY> on this card. The next player to have 3 pastures/5 field tiles gets the 3 <REED>/4 <CLAY> (not retroactively).
A144_Sequestrator.description:
在本卡牌上放置3
和4
。下一位拥有3个牧场/5个农田板块的玩家将获得这3
/4
(不追溯)。

A145_Ropemaker.name: Ropemaker
desc: At the end of each harvest, you get 1 <REED> from the general supply.
A145_Ropemaker.description:
在每次收成结束时，你从公共供应堆中获得1
。

A146_StorehouseSteward.name: Storehouse Steward
desc: Each time you take exactly 2/3/4/5 <FOOD> from a food accumulation space, you also get 1 <STONE>/<REED>/<CLAY>/<WOOD>. (If you take 6 or more <FOOD>, you do not get a bonus good).
A146_StorehouseSteward.description:
每当你从食物累积格中拿取正好2/3/4/5
时，你还获得1
/
/
/
。
(如果你拿取了6个或更多食物，你不能获得奖励货物。)

A147_AnimalDealer.name: Animal Dealer
desc: Each time you use the __Sheep Market__, __Pig Market__, or __Cattle Market__ accumulation space, you can buy 1 additional animal of the respective type for 1 <FOOD>.
A147_AnimalDealer.description:
你每次使用“羊市”、“猪市”或“牛市”累积格时，可以支付1
来额外购买1只同种类的动物。

A148_Woolgrower.name: Woolgrower
desc: This card can hold a number of <SHEEP> equal to the number of completed feeding phases.
A148_Woolgrower.description:
本卡牌可以容纳和已完成的供养步骤数量相等的
。

A149_HouseArtist.name: House Artist
desc: Each time you use the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you also get a __Build Rooms__ action. Each room you build during the action costs you 1 <REED> less.
A149_HouseArtist.description:
每当你使用“卖艺”累积格时，你还获得一个“建造房间”行动。每个你以该行动建造的房间少花费你1
。

A150_Stagehand.name: Stagehand
desc: Each time another player uses the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you can take your choice of a __Build Fences__, __Build Stables__, or __Build Rooms__ action.
A150_Stagehand.description: 每当其他玩家使用“卖艺”累积格，你可以选择执行一个“建造栅栏”、“建造畜棚”，或“建造房间”行动。

A151_Minstrel.name: Minstrel
desc: At the start of each returning home phase, if only one action space card on round space 1 to 4 is unoccupied, you can use that action space.
A151_Minstrel.description: 在每个回家阶段开始时，如果在第1至第4轮的轮次格上只有一张行动格卡牌未被占据，你可以使用该行动格。

A152_NightSchoolStudent.name: Night-School Student
desc: Each returning home phase in which no player returns a person from a __Lessons__ action space, you can play an occupation for an occupation cost of 1 <FOOD>.
A152_NightSchoolStudent.description:
在回家阶段，如果没有任何玩家的家庭成员从“职业训练”行动格回家，你可以以1
的职业花费打出一张职业卡牌。

A153_PigOwner.name: Pig Owner
desc: The first time after you play this card that you have 5 <PIG> on your farm, you immediately get 3 bonus <SCORE>.
A153_PigOwner.description:
你打出本卡牌后，第一次你的农场有5
时，你立刻获得3点奖励
。

A154_Paymaster.name: Paymaster
desc: Each time another player uses a food accumulation space, you can give them 1 <GRAIN> from your supply to get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
A154_Paymaster.description:
每当其他玩家使用一个食物累积格时，你可以从你的供应堆中给其1
来获得1点奖励
。

A155_Conjurer.name: Conjurer
desc: Each time you use the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you get an additional 1 <WOOD> and 1 <GRAIN>.
A155_Conjurer.description:
你每次使用“卖艺”累积格时，额外获得1
和1
。

A156_Buyer.name: Buyer
desc: Each time another player uses a reed, stone, sheep, or wild boar accumulation space, you can pay them 1 <FOOD> to get 1 good of the respective type from the general supply.
A156_Buyer.description:
每当其他玩家使用一个芦苇、石材、羊，或野猪累积格，你可以支付给其1
来从公共供应堆中获得1个对应货物。

A157_Bohemian.name: Bohemian
desc: At the start of each returning home phase, if at least one __Lessons__ action space is unoccupied, you get 1 <FOOD>.
A157_Bohemian.description:
在每个回家阶段开始时，如果至少一个“职业训练”行动格未被占据，你获得1
。

A158_CulinaryArtist.name: Culinary Artist
desc: Each time another player uses the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you can exchange your choice of 1 <GRAIN>/<SHEEP>/<VEGETABLE> for 4/5/7 <FOOD>.
A158_CulinaryArtist.description:
每当其他玩家使用“卖艺”累积格时，你可以选择用1
/
/
交换4/5/7
。

A159_JoineroftheSea.name: Joiner of the Sea
desc: Each time another player uses the __Fishing__/__Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you can give them 1 <WOOD> to get 2 <FOOD>/3 <FOOD> from the general supply.
A159_JoineroftheSea.description:
每当其他玩家使用“钓鱼”/“芦苇池”累积格，你可以给其1
来从公共供应堆中获得2/3
。

A160_Lutenist.name: Lutenist
desc: Each time another player uses the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you get 1 <FOOD> and 1 <WOOD>. Immediately after, you can buy exactly 1 <VEGETABLE> for 2 <FOOD>.
A160_Lutenist.description:
每次另一位玩家使用“卖艺”累积格时，你获得1
和1
，之后你可以立即用2
购买正好1
。

A161_PatchCaretaker.name: Patch Caretaker
desc: Each time you use an accumulation space while already having used another accumulation space for the same type of good that work phase, you also get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
A161_PatchCaretaker.description:
每当你使用一个累积格，且在该工作阶段已经使用了另一个相同类型货物的累积格时，你还获得1
。

A162_ForestTallyman.name: Forest Tallyman
desc: Each time both the __Forest__ and __Clay Pit__ accumulation spaces are occupied, you can use this card as an action space to get 2 <CLAY> and 3 <WOOD>.
A162_ForestTallyman.description:
每当“森林”和“黏土坑”累积格都被占据，你可以使用它们之间的空隙作为行动格来获得2
和3
。

A163_BuildingExpert.name: Building Expert
desc: Each time you use the __Resource Market__ action space with the 1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th person you place, you also get 1 <WOOD>/<CLAY>/<REED>/<STONE>/<STONE>.
A163_BuildingExpert.description:
每当你放置你的第1/2/3/4/5个家庭成员使用“资源市场”行动格时，你还获得1
/
/
/
/
。

A164_WoodWorker.name: Wood Worker
desc: Each time you take <WOOD> from an accumulation space, you can exchange 1 <WOOD> for 1 <SHEEP>. Place the <WOOD> on the accumulation space.
A164_WoodWorker.description:
每当你从累积格拿取
时，你可以用1
交换1
。将用于交换的
放在该累积格上。

A165_PigBreeder.name: Pig Breeder
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <PIG>. Your <PIG> breed at the end of round 12 (if there is room for the new <PIG>).
A165_PigBreeder.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你的
将在第12轮结束时繁殖一次(如果当时你有空间容纳新的
)。

A166_Haydryer.name: Haydryer
desc: Immediately before each harvest, you can buy 1 <CATTLE> for 4 <FOOD> minus 1 <FOOD> for each pasture you have. (The minimum cost is 0).
A166_Haydryer.description:
在每次收成之前，你可以立即用X
购买1
，其中X为4减去你拥有的牧场数量。(最小花费是0。)

A167_BreederBuyer.name: Breeder Buyer
desc: Each time you build at least 1 wood/clay/stone room and at least 1 stable on the same turn, you also get 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE>.
A167_BreederBuyer.description:
每当你在一个回合中建造至少1个木造/砖土/石造房间和至少1个畜棚，你还获得1
/
/
。

A168_AnimalTeacher.name: Animal Teacher
desc: Immediately after each time you use a __Lessons__ action space, you can also buy 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE> for 0/1/2 <FOOD>.
A168_AnimalTeacher.description:
每当你使用一个“职业训练”行动格后，你还可以立即用0/1/2
购买1
/
/
。

B1_UpscaleLifestyle.name: Upscale Lifestyle
desc: You immediately get 5 <CLAY> and a __Renovation__ action. If you take the action, you must pay the renovation cost.
B1_UpscaleLifestyle.description:
你立刻获得5
和一个“翻新”行动。如果你执行该行动，你必须支付翻新费用。

B2_MiniPasture.name: Mini Pasture
desc: Immediately fence a farmyard space, without paying <WOOD> for the fences. (If you already have pastures, the new one must be adjacent to an existing one.)
B2_MiniPasture.description:
你立即将一个农场格子圈成牧场，不需要支付
。(如果你的农场版图已有牧场，必须将新的牧场放在其相邻格子上。)

B3_Moonshine.name: Moonshine
desc: Randomly select an occupation in your hand. Either play it for an occupation cost of 2 <FOOD>, or give it to the next player.
B3_Moonshine.description:
随机选择你手牌中的一张职业卡牌。你可以用2
的职业花费打出它，或者将它传递给你左手边的玩家。

B4_WoodPile.name: Wood Pile
desc: You immediately get a number of <WOOD> equal to the number of people you have on accumulation spaces.
B4_WoodPile.description:
你立即获得等于你在累积格上的家庭成员数量的
。

B5_StoreofExperience.name: Store of Experience
desc: If you have 0-4/5/6/7 occupations left in hand, you immediately get 1 <STONE>/<REED>/<CLAY>/<WOOD>.
B5_StoreofExperience.description:
如果你手牌中还剩下0-4/5/6/7张职业卡牌，你立即获得1
/
/
/
。

B6_ExcursiontotheQuarry.name: Excursion to the Quarry
desc: You immediately get a number of <STONE> equal to the number of people you have.
B6_ExcursiontotheQuarry.description:
你立刻获得等于你拥有的家庭成员数量的
。

B7_Wage.name: Wage
desc: You immediately get 2 <FOOD> and 1 additional <FOOD> for each major improvement you have from the bottom row of the supply board.
B7_Wage.description:
你立即获得2
，且你每有一个在供应版图最底下一行中的主要发展，额外获得1
。

B8_MarketStall.name: Market Stall
desc: You immediately get 1 <VEGETABLE>. (Effectively, you are exchanging 1 <GRAIN> for 1 <VEGETABLE>).
B8_MarketStall.description:
你立即获得1
。(此卡牌效果等同用1
交换1
。)

B9_BeatingRod.name: Beating Rod
desc: You can immediately choose to either get 1 <REED> or exchange 1 <REED> for 1 <CATTLE>.
B9_BeatingRod.description:
你可以立刻选择获得1
或者用1
交换1
。

B10_Caravan.name: Caravan
desc: This card provides room for 1 person.
B10_Caravan.description: 本卡牌为1名家庭成员提供居住空间。

B11_Feedyard.name: Feedyard
desc: This card can hold 1 animal for each pasture you have, even different types. After the breeding phase of each harvest, you get 1 <FOOD> for each unused spot on this card.
B11_Feedyard.description:
本卡牌可以容纳等于你牧场数量的动物，即使它们是不同种类的动物。在每次收成的繁殖步骤后，本卡牌上每有一个未使用的位置，你获得1
。

B12_Stockyard.name: Stockyard
desc: This card can hold up to 3 animals of the same type. (It is not considered a pasture).
B12_Stockyard.description: 本卡牌可以容纳最多3个相同种类的动物。(本卡牌不视为牧场。)

B13_CarpentersParlor.name: Carpenter's Parlor
desc: Wooden rooms only cost you 2 <WOOD> and 2 <REED> each.
B13_CarpentersParlor.description:
每个木造房间只需花费2
和2
。

B14_Hawktower.name: Hawktower
desc: Place a stone room on round space 12. If you live in a stone house at the start of the round, you can build the stone room at no cost. Otherwise, discard the stone room.
B14_Hawktower.description: 在第12轮的轮次格上放置一个石造房间。在那一轮开始时，如果你住在石造房屋，你可以免费建造该石造房间。否则，丢弃该石造房间。

B15_CarpentersBench.name: Carpenter's Bench
desc: Immediately after each time you use a wood accumulation space, you can use the taken wood (and only that) to build exactly 1 pasture. If you do, one of the fences is free.
B15_CarpentersBench.description:
每当你使用一个木材累积格后，你可以立刻使用(且只使用)所获得的
来建造正好1个牧场。如果你这么做，其中一个栅栏免费。

B16_MiningHammer.name: Mining Hammer
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>. Each time you renovate, you can also build a stable without paying <WOOD>.
B16_MiningHammer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你每次翻新时，还可以不支付
建造一个畜棚。

B17_ForestPlow.name: Forest Plow
desc: Each time after you use a wood accumulation space, you can pay 2 <WOOD> to plow 1 field. Place the paid <WOOD> on the accumulation space (for the next visitor).
B17_ForestPlow.description:
每当你使用一个木材累积格时，你可以支付2
来犁1块田。将支付的
放在该累积格上(给下一位来访者)。

B18_GrasslandHarrow.name: Grassland Harrow
desc: Add 1 to the current round for each building resource in your supply and place 1 field on the corresponding round space. A the start of the round, you can plow the field.
B18_GrasslandHarrow.description: 将目前的轮数加上你供应堆中建造资源数量，并在该轮的轮次格放置1块农田。在那一轮开始时，你可以用该农田犁1块田。

B19_MoldboardPlow.name: Moldboard Plow
desc: Place 2 field tiles on this card. Twice this game, when you use the __Farmland__ action space, you can also plow 1 field from this card.
B19_MoldboardPlow.description: 在本卡牌上放置2个农田板块。游戏中你可以使用以下效果两次：当你使用“犁田”行动格时，还可以用本卡牌上的农田板块犁1块田。

B20_ChainFloat.name: Chain Float
desc: Add 7, 8, and 9 to the current round and place 1 field on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you can plow the field.
B20_ChainFloat.description: 将目前的轮数加上7、8和9，在这些轮的轮次格各放置1个农田。在那些轮开始时，你可以用该轮格子上的农田来犁1块田。

B21_HayloftBarn.name: Hayloft Barn
desc: Place 4 <FOOD> on this card. Each time you obtain at least 1 <GRAIN>, you also get 1 <FOOD> from this card. Once it is empty, you get a __Family Growth Even without Room__ action.
B21_HayloftBarn.description:
在本卡牌上放置4
。每当你获得至少1
时，你还获得本卡牌上的1
。一旦本卡牌上没有
，你获得一个“无需空房间的家庭增长”行动。

B22_WalkingBoots.name: Walking Boots
desc: You immediately get 2 <FOOD>. You must immediately place a person from your supply. If you do, in the next returning home phase, you must remove that person from play.
B22_WalkingBoots.description:
你立刻获得2
。你必须立刻从你的供应堆中放置1个家庭成员。如果你这么做，在下个回家阶段，你必须将该家庭成员从游戏中移除。

B23_FinalScenario.name: Final Scenario
desc: UPDATED: Reveal the action space card for round 14. Only you can use it until round 14 starts.
B23_FinalScenario.description: 将第14轮的行动卡牌正面朝上放置在你面前。直到它被放置在游戏版图上为止，只有你才能使用它。

B24_Lasso.name: Lasso
desc: You can place exactly two people immediately after one another if at least one of them uses the __Sheep Market__, __Pig Market__, or __Cattle Market__ accumulation space.
B24_Lasso.description: 你可以连续放置正好2名家庭成员执行行动，但其中至少1人使用“羊市”、“猪市”或“牛市”累积格。

B25_BreadPaddle.name: Bread Paddle
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>. For each occupation you play, you get an additional __Bake Bread__ action.
B25_BreadPaddle.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你每打出一张职业卡牌，可以额外执行一次“烤面包”行动。

B26_AgrarianFences.name: Agrarian Fences
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Utilization__ action space, you can take a __Build Fences__ action instead of one of the two actions provide by the action space.
B26_AgrarianFences.description: 每当你使用“谷物运用”行动格时，你可以将该行动格提供的两个行动之一改为执行一个“建造栅栏”行动。

B27_Toolbox.name: Toolbox
desc: In the work phase, after each turn in which you build at least 1 room, stable, or fence, you can build the __Joinery__, __Pottery__, or __Basketmaker's Workshop__ major improvement.
B27_Toolbox.description: 在工作阶段，每当你在一个回合内建造至少1个房间、畜棚，或栅栏，该回合结束后，你可以建造“木工坊”、“陶器工坊”或“制篮工坊”主要发展。

B28_ForestryStudies.name: Forestry Studies
desc: Each time after you use the __Forest__ accumulation space, you can return 2 <WOOD> to that space to play 1 occupation without paying an occupation costs.
B28_ForestryStudies.description:
每当你使用“森林”累积格后，你可以将2
放回到该格子上，来打出一张职业卡牌，无需支付职业花费。

B29_CookeryLesson.name: Cookery Lesson
desc: Each time you use a __Lessons__ action space and a cooking improvement on the same turn, you get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
B29_CookeryLesson.description:
每当你在同一个回合中使用一个“职业训练”行动格和一个
发展，你获得1点奖励
。

B30_WoodPalisades.name: Wood Palisades
desc: Instead of a fence piece, you can place 2 <WOOD> from your supply on the fence spaces at the edge of your farmyard. These fence spaces with 2 <WOOD> are worth 1 bonus <SCORE>.
B30_WoodPalisades.description:
你可以从你的供应堆中放置2
到你农场边缘的栅栏空间上来代替1个栅栏配件。这种拥有2
的栅栏空间价值1点奖励
。

B31_PotteryYard.name: Pottery Yard
desc: During the scoring, if there are at least 2 orthogonally adjacent unused spaces in your farm, you get 2 bonus <SCORE>. (You still get the negative points for those unused spaces.
B31_PotteryYard.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你的农场里至少有2个相邻的未使用的格子，你获得2点奖励
。(对于那些未使用的格子，你仍然会失去分数。)

B32_Kettle.name: Kettle
desc: At any time, you can exchange 1/3/5 <GRAIN> for 3/4/5 <FOOD> and 0/1/2 bonus <SCORE>.
B32_Kettle.description:
在任何时候，你可以用1/3/5
交换3/4/5
和0/1/2点奖励
。

B33_Mantlepiece.name: Mantlepiece
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each complete round left to play. You may no longer renovate your house.
B33_Mantlepiece.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，距离游戏结束每有1个未进行的完整轮次，立即获得1点奖励
。直到游戏结束之前，你都无法翻新房屋。

B34_SpecialFood.name: Special Food
desc: The next time you take animals from an accumulation space and accommodate all of them on your farm, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each of these animals.
B34_SpecialFood.description:
下一次你从一个累积格上拿取动物并将它们全部圈养在你的农场时，你获得等于这些动物数量的奖励
。

B35_HookKnife.name: Hook Knife
desc: Once this game, when you have 9/8/7/6/5/5 <SHEEP> on your farm in a 1-/2-/3-/4-/5-/6- player game, you immediately get 2 bonus <SCORE>.
B35_HookKnife.description:
本局游戏限一次，当你在1/2/3/4/5/6位玩家的游戏中拥有9/8/7/6/5/5
时，你立刻获得2点奖励
。

B36_Bottles.name: Bottles
desc: For each person you have, you must pay an additional 1 <CLAY> and 1 <FOOD> to play this card.
B36_Bottles.description:
你每有一个家庭成员，必须支付额外1
和1
，才能打出本卡牌。

B37_Grange.name: Grange
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>.
B37_Grange.prerequisite: 6 Field Tiles and All Animal Types
B37_Grange.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
。

B38_FutureBuildingSite.name: Future Building Site
desc: Up until all other farmyard spaces are used, you cannot use the unused spaces that are orthogonally adjacent to your house (not even to build rooms).
B38_FutureBuildingSite.description: 直到所有其他农场格子都被使用为止，你不能使用和你房屋相邻的未使用的空地(甚至不能用来建造房间)。

B39_Loom.name: Loom
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, if you have at least 1/4/7 <SHEEP>, you get 1/2/3 <FOOD>. During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for every 3 <SHEEP>.
B39_Loom.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤，如果你至少有1/4/7
，获得1/2/3
。游戏结束计分时，你每有3
，获得1点奖励
。

B40_BreweryPond.name: Brewery Pond
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ or __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you also get 1 <GRAIN> and 1 <WOOD>.
B40_BreweryPond.description:
每当你使用“钓鱼”或“芦苇池”累积格时，你还获得1
和1
。

B41_Hauberg.name: Hauberg
desc: Alternate placing 2 <WOOD> and 1 <PIG> on the next 4 round spaces. You decide what to start with. At the start of these rounds, you get the goods.
B41_Hauberg.description:
在接下来4轮的轮次格上交替放置2
和1
。由你决定以
或者
开始。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的货物。

B42_ForestInn.name: Forest Inn
desc: This is an action space for all. A player who uses it can exchange 5/7/9 <WOOD> for 8 <WOOD> and 2/4/7 <FOOD>. When another player uses it, they must first pay you 1 <FOOD>.
B42_ForestInn.description:
这是一个所有玩家都能使用的行动格。使用它的玩家可以用5/7/9
交换8
和2/4/7
。当其他玩家使用它时，他们必须先支付给你1
。

B43_Chophouse.name: Chophouse
desc: Each time you use the __Grain/Vegetable Seeds__ action space, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3/2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B43_Chophouse.description:
每当你使用“谷物/蔬菜种子”行动格时，在接下来的3/2轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B44_ChickStable.name: Chick Stable
desc: Add 3 and 4 to the current round and place 2 <FOOD> on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B44_ChickStable.description:
将目前的轮数加上3和4，在这些轮的轮次格各放置2
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B45_StrawberryPatch.name: Strawberry Patch
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B45_StrawberryPatch.description:
在接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B46_ClubHouse.name: Club House
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 4 round spaces and 1 <STONE> on the round space after that. At the start of these rounds, you get the respective good.
B46_ClubHouse.description:
在接下来4轮的轮次格各放置1
，这四个以后的1个轮次格上放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的货物。

B47_HerringPot.name: Herring Pot
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ accumulation space, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B47_HerringPot.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”累积格时，在接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B48_ForestStone.name: Forest Stone
desc: Place 2 <FOOD> on this card. Each time you use a wood accumulation space, move 1 of these <FOOD> to your supply. Each time you use a stone accumulation space, add 2 <FOOD> to this card.
B48_ForestStone.description:
在本卡牌上放置2
。每当你使用一个木材累积格时，将这些
中的1个移动到你的供应堆。每当你使用一个石材累积格时，在本卡牌上增加2
。

B49_Scales.name: Scales
desc: Each time after you place an improvement or occupation in front of you, if you then have the same number of improvements and occupations in play, you get 2 <FOOD>.
B49_Scales.description:
每当你在面前放置一张发展卡牌或者职业卡牌后，如果此时你场上有相同数量的发展卡牌和职业卡牌，你获得2
。

B50_ButterChurn.name: Butter Churn
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, you get 1 <FOOD> for every 3 <SHEEP> and 1 <FOOD> for every 2 <CATTLE> you have.
B50_ButterChurn.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤，你每有3
，获得1
，每有2
，获得1
。

B51_DiggingSpade.name: Digging Spade
desc: Each time you use a clay accumulation space, you also get a number of <FOOD> equal to the number of <PIG> in your farmyard.
B51_DiggingSpade.description:
每当你使用一个黏土累积格时，你还获得等于你农场中
数量的
。

B52_GrowingFarm.name: Growing Farm
desc: You can only play this card if you have at least as many pasture spaces as the number of completed rounds. If you do, you get a number of <FOOD> equal to the current round.
B52_GrowingFarm.description:
你只能在拥有至少等于已完成轮次数的牧场格子时打出本卡牌。如果你这么做，你获得等于目前轮数的
。

B53_SculptureCourse.name: Sculpture Course
desc: At the end of each round that does not end with a harvest, you can use this card to exchange your choice of 1 <WOOD> for 2 <FOOD>, or 1 <STONE> for 4 <FOOD>.
B53_SculptureCourse.description:
在不以收成结束的每个轮次结束时，你可以使用本卡牌，来用1
交换2
，或用1
交换4
。

B54_Tumbrel.name: Tumbrel
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <FOOD>. Each time after you take an unconditional __Sow__ action, you get 1 <FOOD> for each stable you have.
B54_Tumbrel.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得2
。每当你执行一个无条件的“播种”行动后，你获得等于你拥有的畜棚数量的
。

B55_MaintenancePremium.name: Maintenance Premium
desc: Place 3 <FOOD> on this card. Each time you use a wood accumulation space, you get 1 <FOOD> from this card. Each time you renovate restock this card to 3 <FOOD>.
B55_MaintenancePremium.description:
在本卡牌上放置3
。每当你使用一个木材累积格，你从本卡牌上获得1
。每当你翻新时，将本卡牌补充到3
。

B56_Brook.name: Brook
desc: Each time you use one of the four action spaces above the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get 1 additional <FOOD>.
B56_Brook.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”累积格上方的四个行动格之一时，额外获得1
。

B57_Scullery.name: Scullery
desc: At the start of each round, if you live in a wooden house, you get 1 <FOOD>.
B57_Scullery.description:
在每轮开始时，如果你住在木造房屋，获得1
。

B58_CrackWeeder.name: Crack Weeder
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>. For each <VEGETABLE> you take from a field in the field phase of a harvest, you also get 1 <FOOD>.
B58_CrackWeeder.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
。在收成的收割步骤中，你每从农田拿取1
，你还获得1
。

B59_FoodChest.name: Food Chest
desc: If you play this card on the __Major Improvement__ action space, you immediately get 4 <FOOD>. Otherwise, you get only 2 <FOOD>.
B59_FoodChest.description:
如果你通过“主要发展”行动格打出本卡牌，你立刻获得4
。否则，你只获得2
。

B60_BrewingWater.name: Brewing Water
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you can pay 1 <GRAIN> to place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 6 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B60_BrewingWater.description:
每当你使用“钓鱼”累积格时，你可以支付1
来在接下来的6轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B61_ThreeFieldRotation.name: Three-Field Rotation
desc: At the start of the field phase of each harvest, if you have at least 1 <GRAIN> field, 1 <VEGETABLE> field, and 1 empty field, you get 3 <FOOD>.
B61_ThreeFieldRotation.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤开始时，如果你至少有1
农田，１
农田，和1个闲置田地，获得3
。

B62_Pitchfork.name: Pitchfork
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, if the __Farmland__ action space is occupied you also get 3 <FOOD>.
B62_Pitchfork.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，如果“犁田”行动格已被占据，还获得3
。

B63_Tasting.name: Tasting
desc: Each time you use a __Lessons__ action space, before paying the occupation cost, you can exchange 1 <GRAIN> for 4 <FOOD>.
B63_Tasting.description:
每当你使用一个“职业训练”行动格时，在支付职业花费前，你可以用1
交换4
。

B64_MillWheel.name: Mill Wheel
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Utilization__ action space while the __Fishing__ accumulation space is occupied, you get an additional 2 <FOOD>.
B64_MillWheel.description:
每当你使用“谷物运用”行动格并且“钓鱼”累积格已经被占据，你额外获得2
。

B65_GrainDepot.name: Grain Depot
desc: If you paid <WOOD>/<CLAY>/<STONE> for this card, place 1 <GRAIN> on each of the next 2/3/4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <GRAIN>.
B65_GrainDepot.description:
如果你为本卡牌支付了
/
/
，在接下来的2/3/4轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B66_SackCart.name: Sack Cart
desc: Place 1 <GRAIN> each on the remaining spaces for rounds 5, 8, 11, and 14. At the start of these rounds, you get the <GRAIN>.
B66_SackCart.description:
在第5、8、11、14轮中剩余的轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B67_HandTruck.name: Hand Truck
desc: Each time before you take a __Bake Bread__ action, you also get 1 <GRAIN> for each of your people occupying an accumulation space.
B67_HandTruck.description:
每当你执行一个“烤面包”行动前，你还获得等于你已占据累积格的家庭成员数量的
。

B68_Beanfield.name: Beanfield
desc: This card is a field that can only grow vegetables.
B68_Beanfield.description: 本卡牌视作1块农田，但只能种植蔬菜。

B69_PottersMarket.name: Potters Market
desc: At any time, you can pay 3 <CLAY> and 2 <FOOD>. If you do, place 1 <VEGETABLE> on each of the next 2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <VEGETABLE>.
B69_PottersMarket.description:
在任何时候，如果你支付3
和2
。如果你这么做，在接下来2轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B70_NewPurchase.name: New Purchase
desc: Before the start of each round that ends with a harvest, you can buy one of each of the following crops: 2 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <GRAIN>; 4 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <VEGETABLE>
B70_NewPurchase.description: 在每个以收成结束的轮次开始之前，你可以购买以下每种作物各一次：

B71_HarvestHouse.name: Harvest House
desc: When you play this card, if the number of completed harvests is equal to the number of occupations you played, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>, 1 <GRAIN>, and 1 <VEGETABLE>.
B71_HarvestHouse.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果已完成的收成次数和你打出的职业卡牌数量相等，你立刻获得1
、1
和1
。

B72_LoveforAgriculture.name: Love for Agriculture
desc: You can sow crops in pastures covering 1 or 2 farmyard spaces. If you do, these pastures are also considered fields and hold 1 and 2 animals less, respectively.
B72_LoveforAgriculture.description: 你可以在覆盖1或2个农场格子的牧场中播种作物。如果你这么做，这些牧场也视为农田，且分别少容纳1或2个动物。

B73_GiftBasket.name: Gift Basket
desc: When you play this card, if you have exactly 2/3/4/5 rooms, you immediately get 1 <VEGETABLE>/<FOOD>/<GRAIN>/<VEGETABLE>.
B73_GiftBasket.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你正好有2/3/4/5个房间，你立刻获得1
/
/
/
。

B74_ThickForest.name: Thick Forest
desc: Place 1 <WOOD> on each remaining even-numbered round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <WOOD>.
B74_ThickForest.description:
在剩余的每个偶数轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B75_WoodWorkshop.name: Wood Workshop
desc: Each time before you play or build an improvement, you get 1 <WOOD>.
B75_WoodWorkshop.description:
每次你打出或建造一个发展前，你获得1
。

B76_Ceilings.name: Ceilings
desc: Place 1 <WOOD> on the next 5 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <WOOD>. Remove the <WOOD> promised by this card from future round spaces the next time you renovate.
B76_Ceilings.description:
在接下来5轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。在你下次翻新时，移除后续轮的轮次格上所有因本卡牌效果放置的
。

B77_LoamPit.name: Loam Pit
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you also get 3 <CLAY>.
B77_LoamPit.description:
你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，还获得3
。

B78_ReedBelt.name: Reed Belt
desc: Place 1 <REED> on each of the remaining space for rounds 5, 8, 10, and 12. At the start of these rounds, you get the <REED>.
B78_ReedBelt.description:
在第5、8、10、12轮中剩余的轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B79_Corf.name: Corf
desc: Each time any player (including you) takes at least 3 <STONE> from an accumulation space, you get 1 <STONE> from the general supply.
B79_Corf.description:
每当任何玩家(包括你)从一个累积格上拿取至少3
时，你从公共供应堆获得1
。

B80_HardPorcelain.name: Hard Porcelain
desc: At any time, you can exchange 2/3/4 <CLAY> for 1/2/3 <STONE>.
B80_HardPorcelain.description:
在任何时候，你可以用2/3/4
交换1/2/3
。

B81_Handcart.name: Handcart
desc: Before each work phase, you can take 1 building resource from at most one <WOOD>/<CLAY>/<REED>/<STONE> accumulation space containing at least 6/5/4/4 building resources of the same type.
B81_Handcart.description:
在每个工作阶段前，你可以从至多一个放有至少6/5/4/4个对应建造资源的
/
/
/
累积格上拿取1个对应的建造资源。

B82_ValueAssets.name: Value Assets
desc: After each harvest, you can buy exactly one of the following goods: 1 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <WOOD>; 1 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <CLAY>; 2 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <REED>; 2 <FOOD> <ARROW> 1 <STONE>
B82_ValueAssets.description: 在每次收成之后，你可以购买正好一个以下货物：

B83_MuddyPuddles.name: Muddy Puddles
desc: Pile (from bottom to top) 1 <PIG>, 1 <FOOD>, 1 <CATTLE>, 1 <FOOD>, and 1 <SHEEP> on this card. At any time, you can pay 1 <CLAY> to take the top good.
B83_MuddyPuddles.description:
将
(从下往上)叠在本卡牌上。你在任何时候都可以支付1
来拿取顶上的货物。

B84_AcornsBasket.name: Acorns Basket
desc: Place 1 <PIG> on each of the next 2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <PIG>.
B84_AcornsBasket.description:
在接下来2轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B85_FarmHand.name: Farm Hand
desc: Once this game, if you have 4 field tiles in a 2x2, you can build a stable in the center of the 2x2 during a __Build Stables__ action. This stable provides room for a person but not animals.
B85_FarmHand.description: 一旦你拥有4个排成2x2的农田板块，你可以使用一个“建造畜棚”行动来在该2x2的中心建造一个畜棚。该畜棚为一个家庭成员提供房间，而不是动物。

B86_TruffleSearcher.name: Truffle Searcher
desc: This card can hold a number of <PIG> equal to the number of completed feeding phases.
B86_TruffleSearcher.description:
本卡牌可以容纳等于已完成的供养步骤数量的
。

B87_Cottager.name: Cottager
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you can also either build exactly 1 room or renovate your house. Either way, you have to pay the cost.
B87_Cottager.description:
你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，还可以建造正好1个房间或翻新你的房屋。
无论如何，你依然需要支付花费。

B88_EstablishedPerson.name: Established Person
desc: If your house has exactly 2 rooms, immediately renovate it without paying any building resources. If you do, you can immediately afterward take a __Build Fences__ action.
B88_EstablishedPerson.description: 如果你的房屋正好有2个房间，立刻翻新它，无需支付任何建造资源。如果你这么做，然后你可以立刻执行一个“建造栅栏”行动。

B89_Groom.name: Groom
desc: When you play this card, immediately get 1 <WOOD>. Once you live in a stone house, at the start of each round, you can build exactly 1 stable for 1 <WOOD>.
B89_Groom.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。一旦你住进石造房屋，在每轮开始时，你可以支付1
来建造正好1个畜棚。

B90_CooperativePlower.name: Cooperative Plower
desc: Each time you use the __Farmland__ action space while the __Grain Seeds__ action space is occupied, you can plow 1 additional field.
B90_CooperativePlower.description: 每当你使用“犁田”行动格且“谷物种子”行动格被占据时，你可以额外犁1块田。

B91_AssistantTiller.name: Assistant Tiller
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you can also plow 1 field.
B91_AssistantTiller.description: 你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，还可以犁1块田。

B92_LittleStickKnitter.name: Little Stick Knitter
desc: From Round 5 on, each time you use the __Sheep Market__ accumulation space, you can also take a __Family Growth with Room Only__ action.
B92_LittleStickKnitter.description: 从第5轮起，每当你使用“羊市”累积格时，你还可以执行一个“需要空房间的家庭增长”行动。

B93_Confidant.name: Confidant
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> from your supply on each of the next 2, 3, or 4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD> back and your choice of a __Sow__ or __Build Fences__ action.
B93_Confidant.description:
从你的供应堆中各放置1
到接下来的2、3，或4轮的轮次格上。在这些轮开始时，你拿回这些
并且你选择执行一个“播种”或“建造栅栏”行动。

B94_StockProtector.name: Stock Protector
desc: Each time before you use the __Fencing__ action space, you get 2 <WOOD>. Immediately after that __Fencing__ action, you can place another person.
B94_StockProtector.description:
每当你使用“围栏”行动格前，你获得2
。在该“围栏”行动之后，你可以立刻放置另一个家庭成员。

B95_MasterBricklayer.name: Master Bricklayer
desc: Each time you build a major improvement, reduce the <STONE> cost by the number of rooms you have built onto your initial house.
B95_MasterBricklayer.description:
你每次建造一个主要发展时，减少
花费，减少的数量为你初始房间之外建造的房间数量。

B96_TreeFarmJoiner.name: Tree Farm Joiner
desc: Place 1 <WOOD> on each of the next 2 odd-numbered round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <WOOD> and, immediately afterward, a __Minor Improvement__ action.
B96_TreeFarmJoiner.description:
在接下来的2个奇数轮的轮次格各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
，然后立即执行一个“次要发展”行动。

B97_Scholar.name: Scholar
desc: Once you live in a stone house, at the start of each round, you can play an occupation for an occupation cost of 1 <FOOD>, or a minor improvement (by paying its cost).
B97_Scholar.description:
一旦你住进石造房屋，在每轮开始时，你可以支付1
作为职业花费来打出一张职业卡牌，或支付费用来打出1张次要发展卡牌。

B98_OrganicFarmer.name: Organic Farmer
desc: During the scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each pasture containing at least 1 animal while having unused capacity for at least three more animals.
B98_OrganicFarmer.description:
游戏结束计分时，你每有一个含有至少1个动物且还可再容纳3个及以上动物的牧场，获得1点奖励
。

B99_Tutor.name: Tutor
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each occupation played after this one.
B99_Tutor.description:
游戏结束计分时，你在打出本卡牌后每打出一张职业卡牌，获得1点奖励
。

B100_Clutterer.name: Clutterer
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each card played after this one that has "accumulation space(s)" in its text.
B100_Clutterer.description:
游戏结束计分时，你获得等于在本卡牌之后打出的文本中带有“累积格”的卡牌数量的奖励
。

B101_FurnitureCarpenter.name: Furniture Carpenter
desc: Each harvest, if any player (including you) owns the Joinery or an upgrade thereof, you can buy exactly 1 bonus <SCORE> for 2 <FOOD>.
B101_FurnitureCarpenter.description:
每次收成时，如果任何玩家(包括你)拥有木工坊或其升级，你可以用2
购买正好1点奖励
。

B102_Consultant.name: Consultant
desc: When you play this card in a 1-/2-/3-/4- player game, you immediately get 2 <GRAIN>/3 <CLAY>/2 <REED>/2 <SHEEP>.
B102_Consultant.description:
在1/2/3/4人游戏中，当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得2
/3
/2
/2
。

B103_FieldMerchant.name: Field Merchant
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <REED>. Each time you decline a __Minor/Major Improvement__ action, you get 1 <FOOD>/<VEGETABLE> instead.
B103_FieldMerchant.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
和1
。每当你拒绝一个“次要/主要发展”行动时，你改为获得1
/
。

B104_SheepWalker.name: Sheep Walker
desc: At any time, you can exchange 1 <SHEEP> on your farmyard for either 1 <PIG>, 1 <VEGETABLE>, or 1 <STONE>.
B104_SheepWalker.description:
你在任何时候可以用你农场上的1
交换1
、1
或1
。

B105_CaseBuilder.name: Case Builder
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 good of each of the following types, if you have at least 2 of that good in your supply already: <FOOD>, <GRAIN>, <VEGETABLE>, <REED>, <WOOD>.
B105_CaseBuilder.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你的供应堆中有至少2个以下种类的货物，你可以立刻获得1个该类货物：
、
、
、
、
。

B106_MoralCrusader.name: Moral Crusader
desc: Immediately before the start of each round, if there are goods on the remaining round spaces that are promised to you, you get 1 <FOOD>.
B106_MoralCrusader.description:
在每轮开始前，如果剩余的轮次格上有属于你的货物，你立刻获得1
。

B107_Manservant.name: Manservant
desc: Once you live in a stone house, place 3 <FOOD> on each remaining round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B107_Manservant.description:
一旦你住进石造房屋，在接下来的每轮的轮次格各放置3
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B108_OvenFiringBoy.name: Oven Firing Boy
desc: Each time you use a wood accumulation space, you get an additional __Bake Bread__ action.
B108_OvenFiringBoy.description: 你每次使用一个木材累积格时，可以额外执行一次“烤面包”行动。

B109_PaperMaker.name: Paper Maker
desc: Immediately before playing each occupation after this one, you can pay 1 <WOOD> total to get 1 <FOOD> for each occupation you have in front of you.
B109_PaperMaker.description:
在打出本卡牌后，你每次打出一张职业卡牌前，可以立即支付1
来获得等同于你面前职业卡牌卡牌数量的
。

B110_Pavior.name: Pavior
desc: At the end of each preparation phase, if you have at least 1 <STONE> in your supply, you get 1 <FOOD>. In round 14, you get 1 <VEGETABLE> instead.
B110_Pavior.description:
在每个准备阶段结束时，如果你的供应堆中至少有1
，你获得1
。在第14轮，你改为获得1
。

B111_Rustic.name: Rustic
desc: For each clay room you build, you get 2 <FOOD> and 1 bonus <SCORE>. (this does not apply to stone rooms and renovated wood rooms.)
B111_Rustic.description:
你每建造1个砖土房间，你获得2
和1点奖励
。(这个效果不适用于石造房屋和翻新木造房间。)

B112_Silokeeper.name: Silokeeper
desc: Each time you use the action space card that has been revealed right before the most recent harvest, you also get 1 <GRAIN>.
B112_Silokeeper.description:
每当你使用在最近的收成前刚刚被揭示的行动格卡牌时，你还获得1
。

B113_PatchCaregiver.name: Patch Caregiver
desc: When you play this card, you can choose to buy 1 <GRAIN> for 1 <FOOD>, or 1 <VEGETABLE> for 3 <FOOD>. This card is a field.
B113_PatchCaregiver.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以选择花费1
购买1
，或者花费3
购买1
。本卡牌是1块农田。

B114_Childless.name: Childless
desc: At the start of each round, if you have at least 3 rooms but only 2 people, you get 1 <FOOD> and 1 crop of your choice (<GRAIN> or <VEGETABLE>)
B114_Childless.description:
在每轮开始时，如果你有至少3个房间但只有2名家庭成员，获得1
和1个作物(
或
)

B115_TinsmithMaster.name: Tinsmith Master
desc: You can hold 1 additional animal in each pasture without a stable. Each time you sow in a field, you can place 1 additional crop of the respective type in that field.
B115_TinsmithMaster.description: 你可以在每个没有畜棚的牧场中额外容纳1个动物。每当你在1块农田播种，你可以在该农田额外放置1个对应作物。

B116_Shoreforester.name: Shoreforester
desc: When you play this card and each time 1 <REED> is placed on an empty __Reed Bank__ accumulation space in the preparation phase, you get 1 <WOOD>.
B116_Shoreforester.description:
当你打出本卡牌和每次准备阶段在空的“芦苇池”累积格上放置1
时，你获得1
。

B117_Informant.name: Informant
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD>. After each work phase, if you have more <STONE> than <CLAY> in your supply, you get 1 <WOOD>.
B117_Informant.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
。在每个工作阶段结束后，如果你供应堆中的
比
更多，你获得1
。

B118_SmallscaleFarmer.name: Small-scale Farmer
desc: As long as you live in a house with exactly 2 rooms, at the start of each round, you get 1 <WOOD>.
B118_SmallscaleFarmer.description:
在每轮开始时，如果你只有2个房间，获得1
。

B119_Lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
desc: You immediately get 1 <WOOD>. Additionally, place 1 <WOOD> on each of the next round spaces, up to the number of fences you built. At the start of these rounds, you get the <WOOD>.
B119_Lumberjack.description:
你立刻获得1
。此外，在后续的不超过你建造栅栏数量的轮次格中各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B120_Sweep.name: Sweep
desc: UPDATED: Each time before you use the action space above the most recent round 1-14 action space, you get 2 <CLAY>.
B120_Sweep.description:
每当你使用最后放置在轮次格上卡牌上方的行动格卡牌之前，你获得2
。

B121_Geologist.name: Geologist
desc: Each time you use the __Forest__ or __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you also get 1 <CLAY>. In games with 3 or more players, this also applies to the __Clay Pit__.
B121_Geologist.description:
你每次使用“森林”或“芦苇池”累积格时，还获得1
。
3人及以上游戏时，使用“黏土坑”累积格还能获得1
。

B122_Mineralogist.name: Mineralogist
desc: Each time you use a clay/stone accumulation space, you also get 1 of the other good, <STONE>/<CLAY>.
B122_Mineralogist.description:
每当你使用一个黏土/石材累积格时，你还获得1
/
。

B123_RoofBallaster.name: Roof Ballaster
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately pay 1 <FOOD> to get 1 <STONE> for each room you have.
B123_RoofBallaster.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即支付1
，如果你这么做，获得等同于你房间数量的
。

B124_Trimmer.name: Trimmer
desc: In each work phase, after you enclose at least one farmyard space, you get 2 <STONE>. (Subdividing an existing pasture does not count.)
B124_Trimmer.description:
在每个工作阶段，在你围了至少一个农场格子之后，你获得2
。(分割一个已存在的牧场不算。)

B125_EstateWorker.name: Estate Worker
desc: Place 1 <WOOD>, 1 <CLAY>, 1 <REED>, and 1 <STONE> in this order on the next 4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the respective building resource.
B125_EstateWorker.description:
在接下来4轮的轮次格中按以下顺序分别放置1
、1
、1
，和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的建造资源。

B126_Carpenter.name: Carpenter
desc: Every new room only costs you 3 of the appropriate building resource and 2 <REED> (e.g. if you live in a wooden house, 3 <WOOD> and 2 <REED>).
B126_Carpenter.description:
每个新建的房间只需花费3个对应资源和2
(例如：建造一个木造房间，只需支付3
和2
)。

B127_Seducer.name: Seducer
desc: When you play this card in round 5 or later, you can immediately pay 1 <STONE>, 1 <GRAIN>, 1 <VEGETABLE>, and 1 <SHEEP> to take a __Family Growth Even without Room__ action.
B127_Seducer.description:
当你在第5轮或之后打出本卡牌时，你可以立刻支付1
、1
、1
和1
来执行一个“无需空房间的家庭增长”行动。

B128_Plumber.name: Plumber
desc: Each time after you use the __Major Improvement__ action space, you can take a __Renovation__ action, paying 2 <CLAY> or 2 <STONE> less for the renovation.
B128_Plumber.description:
每当你使用一个“主要发展”行动格之后，你可以执行一个“翻新”行动，并在该翻新中少支付2
或2
。

B129_Seatmate.name: Seatmate
desc: You can use the action space on round space 13 even if it is occupied by one or more people of the players to your immediate left and right.
B129_Seatmate.description: 你可以使用第13轮的轮次格上的行动格，即使它被你相邻左边和右边玩家的一个或更多家庭成员占据。

B130_FullPeasant.name: Full Peasant
desc: Each time after you use the __Grain Utilization__ or __Fencing__ action space while the other is unoccupied, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to use the other space with the same person.
B130_FullPeasant.description:
每当你使用“谷物运用”或“围栏”行动格之一而另一个未被占据后，你可以支付1
，来用同一个家庭成员使用另外那个格子。

B131_Equipper.name: Equipper
desc: Immediately after each time you use a wood accumulation space, you can play a minor improvement.
B131_Equipper.description: 每当你使用一个木材累积格之后，你可以立刻打出1个次要发展。

B132_EstateMaster.name: Estate Master
desc: Once you have no unused farmyard spaces left, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each <VEGETABLE> that you harvest.
B132_EstateMaster.description:
一旦你没有剩下任何未使用的农场格子，你每收成1
，你获得1点奖励
。

B133_VillagePeasant.name: Village Peasant
desc: At the start of scoring, you get a number of <VEGETABLE> equal to the smallest of the numbers of major improvements, minor improvements, and occupations you have.
B133_VillagePeasant.description:
游戏结束计分时，你获得与你拥有的主要发展、次要发展和职业卡牌中最小数量相等的
。

B134_HousebookMaster.name: Housebook Master
desc: After playing this card, if you renovate to stone in round 13/12/11 or before, you immediately get 1/2/3 <FOOD> and 1/2/3 bonus <SCORE>.
B134_HousebookMaster.description:
打出本卡牌后，如果你在第13轮中/第12轮中/第11轮或之前翻新为石造，你立刻获得1/2/3个
和1/2/3点奖励
。

B135_NutritionExpert.name: Nutrition Expert
desc: At the start of each round, you can exchange a set comprised of 1 animal of any type, 1 <GRAIN>, and 1 <VEGETABLE> for 5 <FOOD> and 2 bonus <SCORE>.
B135_NutritionExpert.description:
在每轮开始时，你可以用1个任意的动物、1
和1
交换5
和2点奖励
。

B136_HouseSteward.name: House Steward
desc: If there are still 1/3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 1/2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with the most rooms gets 3 bonus <SCORE>.
B136_HouseSteward.description:
如果游戏还有完整的1/3/6/9轮尚未进行，你立即获得1/2/3/4
。
游戏结束计分时，有最多房间的每一位玩家获得3点奖励
。

B137_Wholesaler.name: Wholesaler
desc: Place 1 <VEGETABLE>, 1 <PIG>, 1 <STONE>, and 1 <CATTLE> on this card. Each time you use an action space card on round spaces 8 to 11, you get the corresponding good from this card.
B137_Wholesaler.description:
在本卡牌上放置1
、1
、1
、和1
。每当你在使用第8到11轮的轮次格上的行动格卡牌时，你从本卡牌上获得相应的货物。

B138_ForestGuardian.name: Forest Guardian
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <WOOD>. Each time before another player takes at least 5 <WOOD> from an accumulation space, they must first pay you 1 <FOOD>.
B138_ForestGuardian.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得2
。每当其他玩家从一个累积格上拿取至少5
前，他们必须先支付给你1
。

B139_ForestScientist.name: Forest Scientist
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if there is no wood left on the game board, you get 1 <FOOD>—from round 5 on, even 2 <FOOD>.
B139_ForestScientist.description:
在每轮的回家阶段，如果游戏版图上没有
剩下，你获得1
——从第5轮开始，改为2
。

B140_FarmyardWorker.name: Farmyard Worker
desc: At the end of each work phase in which you placed at least 1 good on 1 of your farmyard spaces, you get 2 <FOOD>.
B140_FarmyardWorker.description:
在每个你放置了至少1个货物在你农场格子的工作阶段结束时，你获得2
。

B141_FieldCaretaker.name: Field Caretaker
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately exchange 0/1/3 <CLAY> for 1/2/3 <GRAIN>. This card is a field.
B141_FieldCaretaker.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立刻用0/1/3
交换1/2/3
。本卡牌是1块农田。

B142_Greengrocer.name: Greengrocer
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you also get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
B142_Greengrocer.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，还获得1
。

B143_ClayWarden.name: Clay Warden
desc: Each time another player uses the __Hollow__ accumulation space, you get 1 <CLAY>. In a 3-/4-player game, you also get 1 additional <CLAY>/<FOOD>.
B143_ClayWarden.description:
每当其他玩家使用“泥坑”累积格时，你获得1
。在一场3/4位玩家的游戏中，你还额外获得1
/
。

B144_Collier.name: Collier
desc: Each time after you use the __Clay Pit__ or __Hollow__ accumulation space, you get 1 <WOOD>. On __Clay Pit__ you also get 1 additional <REED>.
B144_Collier.description:
每当你使用“黏土坑”或“泥坑”累积格后，你获得1
。若为“黏土坑”，你还额外获得1
。

B145_BrushwoodCollector.name: Brushwood Collector
desc: Each time you renovate or build a room, you can replace the required 1 or 2 <REED> with a total of 1 <WOOD>.
B145_BrushwoodCollector.description:
你每次翻新或建造房间时，你可以用1
替代需要花费的1或2
。

B146_Illusionist.name: Illusionist
desc: Each time you use a building resource accumulation space, you can discard exactly 1 card from your hand to get 1 additional building resource of the accumulating type.
B146_Illusionist.description: 每当你使用一个建造资源累积格时，你可以从手牌中丢弃正好1张卡牌来额外获得1个相同类型的建造资源。

B147_Huntsman.name: Huntsman
desc: Each time after you use a wood accumulation space, you can pay 1 <GRAIN> to get 1 <PIG>.
B147_Huntsman.description:
每当你使用一个木材累积格后，你可以支付1
来获得1
。

B148_PetBroker.name: Pet Broker
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <SHEEP>. You can keep 1 <SHEEP> on this card for each occupation in front of you.
B148_PetBroker.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
。你可以在你面前的每张职业卡牌上各容纳1
。

B149_OpenAirFarmer.name: Open Air Farmer
desc: When you play this card, you remove exactly 3 <STABLE> in your supply from play to build a pasture covering 2 farmyard spaces. You only need to pay a total of 2 <WOOD> for fences
B149_OpenAirFarmer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，将你供应堆中正好3个畜棚从游戏中移除，来建造一个覆盖2个农场格子的牧场。你只需要为这些栅栏支付总计2
。

B150_LargeScaleFarmer.name: Large-Scale Farmer
desc: Each time after you use the __Farm Expansion__ or __Major Improvement__ action space while the other is unoccupied, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to use that other space with the same person.
B150_LargeScaleFarmer.description:
每当你使用“农场扩建”或“主要发展”行动格之一开且另一个未被占据后，你可以支付1
，来用同一个家庭成员使用另外那个格子。

B151_LittlePeasant.name: Little Peasant
desc: You immediately get 1 <STONE>. As long as you live in a wooden house with exactly 2 rooms, actions spaces—excluding Meeting Place—are not considered occupied for you.
B151_LittlePeasant.description:
你立刻获得1个
。只要你住在有正好2个房间的木造房屋里，除了广场外的行动格对你而言视为未被占据。

B152_JuniorArtist.name: Junior Artist
desc: Each time after you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to use an unoccupied __Traveling Players__ or __Lessons__ action space with the same person.
B152_JuniorArtist.description:
每当你使用“临时工”行动格之后，你可以支付1个
，来用同一个家庭成员使用一个未被占据的“卖艺”或“职业训练”行动格。

B153_Housemaster.name: Housemaster
desc: During scoring, total the base point values of your major improvements. The smallest value counts double. If the total is at least 5/7/9/11, you get 1/2/3/4 bonus <SCORE>.
B153_Housemaster.description:
游戏结束计分时，将你的主要发展分数相加，其中的最小值乘2。如果总数至少为5/7/9/11，你获得1/2/3/4点奖励
。

B154_SheepKeeper.name: Sheep Keeper
desc: You can only play this card if you have less than 7 <SHEEP>. Once this game, when you have 7 <SHEEP> on your farm, you immediately get 3 bonus <SCORE> and 2 <FOOD>.
B154_SheepKeeper.description:
你只能在你拥有少于7
时打出本卡牌。本局游戏限一次，当你的农场上拥有7
时，你立刻获得3点奖励
和2
。

B155_ArtTeacher.name: Art Teacher
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <REED>. Each time you pay an occupation cost, you can use <FOOD> from the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space.
B155_ArtTeacher.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立刻获得1
和1
。每当你支付职业花费时，你可以使用“卖艺”累积格上的
。

B156_StorehouseKeeper.name: Storehouse Keeper
desc: Each time you use the __Resource Market__ action space, you also get your choice of 1 <CLAY> or 1 <GRAIN>.
B156_StorehouseKeeper.description:
你每次使用“资源市场”行动格时，还获得你选择的1
或1
。

B157_Salter.name: Salter
desc: At any time, you can pay 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE> from your farm. If you do, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3/5/7 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
B157_Salter.description:
在任何时候，你可以从你的农场支付1
/
/
。如果你这么做，在接下来的3/5/7轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B158_DistrictManager.name: District Manager
desc: At the end of each work phase, if you used both the __Forest__ and __Grove__ accumulation spaces, you get 5 <FOOD>.
B158_DistrictManager.description:
在每个工作阶段结束时，如果你同时使用了“森林”和“树林”累积格，你获得5
。

B159_LieutenantGeneral.name: Lieutenant General
desc: For each field tile that another player places next to an existing field tile, you get 1 <FOOD> from the general supply. In round 14, you get 1 <GRAIN> instead.
B159_LieutenantGeneral.description:
其他玩家每在已存在的农田板块边放置1个农田板块，你从公共供应堆中获得1
。在第14轮，你改为获得1
。

B160_PubOwner.name: Pub Owner
desc: When you play this card and at the end of each work phase in which the __Forest__, __Clay Pit__, and __Reed Bank__ accumulation spaces are all occupied, you get 1 <GRAIN>.
B160_PubOwner.description:
当你打出本卡牌和每个“森林”、“黏土坑”和“芦苇池”累积格都被占据的工作阶段结束时，你获得1
。

B161_Weakling.name: Weakling
desc: Each time it is your turn in the work phase, if there are one or more accumulation spaces with 5+ goods on them and you do not use any of them, you get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
B161_Weakling.description:
每次在工作阶段你的回合中，如果有一个或多个累积格上有5+个货物且你不使用其中任何一个时，你获得1
。

B162_ForestClearer.name: Forest Clearer
desc: Each time you obtain exactly 2/3/4 <WOOD> from a wood accumulation space, you get 1 additional <WOOD> and 1/0/1 <FOOD>.
B162_ForestClearer.description:
每当你从一个木材累积格上获得正好2/3/4
时，你额外获得1
和1/0/1
。

B163_Pastor.name: Pastor
desc: Once you are the only player to live in a house with only 2 rooms, you immediately get 3 <WOOD>, 2 <CLAY>, 1 <REED>, and 1 <STONE> (only once).
B163_Pastor.description:
一旦你是唯一一个只有2个房间的玩家，立即获得3
、2
、1
和1
(仅限一次)。

B164_SheepWhisperer.name: Sheep Whisperer
desc: Add 2, 5, 8, and 10 to the current round and place 1 <SHEEP> on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <SHEEP>.
B164_SheepWhisperer.description:
将目前的轮数加上2、5、8、10，在这些轮的轮次格各放1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

B165_GameProvider.name: Game Provider
desc: Immediately before each harvest, you can discard 1/3/4 <GRAIN> from different fields to get 1/2/3 <PIG>.
B165_GameProvider.description:
在每次收成前，你可以立刻从不同的农田丢弃1/3/4
来获得1/2/3
。

B166_CattleFeeder.name: Cattle Feeder
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you can also buy 1 <CATTLE> for 1 <FOOD>.
B166_CattleFeeder.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，还可以支付1
来购买1
。

B167_StableSergeant.name: Stable Sergeant
desc: When you play this card, you can pay 2 <FOOD> to get 1 <SHEEP>, 1 <PIG>, and 1 <CATTLE>, but only if you can accommodate all three animals on your farm.
B167_StableSergeant.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以支付2
来获得1
、1
，和1
，但你的农场必须能圈养这三个动物。

B168_PastureMaster.name: Pasture Master
desc: Each time you renovate, you get 2 <FOOD> and 1 additional animal of the respective type in each of your pastures with stable.
B168_PastureMaster.description:
每当你翻新时，你获得2
，且你每有1个有畜棚的牧场，额外获得1个对应的动物。

C1_Overhaul.name: Overhaul
desc: Immediately raze all of your fences, add up to 3 fences from your supply, and rebuild them. (You do not lose any animals during this.)
C1_Overhaul.description: 立刻拆除你的所有栅栏，从你的供应堆中加入最多3个栅栏然后重建它们(过程中你不会失去任何动物)。

C2_Stable.name: Stable
desc: Immediately build 1 stable. (The stable costs you nothing, but you must pay the cost shown on this card.)
C2_Stable.description: 立即建造1个畜棚(该畜棚无需任何花费，但你必须支付本卡牌上显示的花费)。

C3_CarriageTrip.name: Carriage Trip
desc: If you play this card in the work phase, you can immediately place another person.
C3_CarriageTrip.description: 如果你在工作阶段打出本卡牌，你可以立即放置另一名家庭成员。

C4_WritingBoards.name: Writing Boards
desc: You immediately get 1 <WOOD> for each occupation you have in front of you.
C4_WritingBoards.description:
你面前每有1张职业卡牌，你立即获得1
。

C5_Remodeling.name: Remodeling
desc: You immediately get 1 <CLAY> for each clay room and for each major improvement you have.
C5_Remodeling.description:
你每有1个砖土房间或1个主要发展，立即获得1
。

C6_StoneClearing.name: Stone Clearing
desc: Immediately place 1 <STONE> on each of your empty fields. Harvest them during the next field phase. These fields are considered planted until then.
C6_StoneClearing.description:
立即在你的每个闲置农田上各放置1
。在下个收割步骤中收成这些
。直到那时为止这些农田视为已播种农田。

C7_BladeShears.name: Blade Shears
desc: You immediately get your choice of 3 <FOOD>, or 1 <FOOD> for each sheep you have. (Keep the sheep.)
C7_BladeShears.description:
你立即选择获得3
或获得与你拥有的羊数量相同的
(保留羊)。

C8_PlantFertilizer.name: Plant Fertilizer
desc: In each field with exactly 1 good, you can immediately place 1 additional good of the same type.
C8_PlantFertilizer.description: 在每个有正好1个货物的农田中，你可以立即放置额外1个相同种类的货物。

C9_AutomaticWaterTrough.name: Automatic Water Trough
desc: If you can accommodate the animal, you can immediately buy 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE> for 0/1/2 <FOOD>.
C9_AutomaticWaterTrough.description:
如果你能圈养动物，你可以立即用0/1/2
购买1
/
/
。

C10_BunkBeds.name: Bunk Beds
desc: Once you have 4 rooms, your house can hold 5 people.
C10_BunkBeds.description: 一旦你有了4个房间，你的房屋可以容纳5名家庭成员。

C11_WildlifeReserve.name: Wildlife Reserve
desc: This card can hold up to 1 <SHEEP>, 1 <PIG>, and 1 <CATTLE>.
C11_WildlifeReserve.description:
本卡牌可以容纳最多1
、1
和1
。

C12_CattleFarm.name: Cattle Farm
desc: For each pasture you have, you can keep 1 <CATTLE> on this card.
C12_CattleFarm.description:
你每有1个牧场，你可以在本卡牌上安置1
。

C13_WoodSlideHammer.name: Wood Slide Hammer
desc: On your first renovation, if you have at least 5 wood rooms, you can renovate to stone directly and you get a discount of 2 <STONE> on the renovation cost.
C13_WoodSlideHammer.description:
你的第一次翻新中，如果你拥有至少5个木造房间，你可以直接翻新成石造并且翻新花费减少2
。

C14_StrawThatchedRoof.name: Straw-Thatched Roof
desc: You no longer need <REED> to renovate or build a room.
C14_StrawThatchedRoof.description:
翻新或建造房间时你不再需要
。

C15_Trellis.name: Trellis
desc: Each time before you use the __Pig Market__ accumulation space, you can take a __Build Fences__ action. (You must pay <WOOD> for the fences as usual.)
C15_Trellis.description:
每次你使用“猪市”累积格前，你可以执行1次“建造栅栏”行动(你必须如常为栅栏支付
)。

C16_FieldFences.name: Field Fences
desc: You can immediately take a __Build Fences__ action, during which you do not have to pay <WOOD> for fences that you build next to field tiles.
C16_FieldFences.description:
你可以立即进行1个 “建造栅栏” 行动，如果建造的是农田板块边的栅栏，你无需支付该栅栏的
。

C17_NewlyPlowedField.name: Newly-Plowed Field
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately plow 1 field, which needs not be adjacent to another field.
C17_NewlyPlowedField.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即犁1块田，该农田可以不与另一块农田相邻。

C18_RollOverPlow.name: Roll-Over Plow
desc: At any time, if you have at least 3 planted fields, you can discard all goods from one of those fields to plow 1 field.
C18_RollOverPlow.description: 在任何时候，如果你拥有至少3个已播种农田，你可以丢弃其中1块农田上所有的货物来犁1块田。

C19_SwingPlow.name: Swing Plow
desc: Place 4 field tiles on this card. Each time you use the __Farmland__ action space, you can also plow up to 2 fields from this card.
C19_SwingPlow.description: 在本卡牌上放置4个农田板块。每次你使用“犁田”行动格时，你还可以用本卡牌上的农田板块犁最多2块田。

C20_MolePlow.name: Mole Plow
desc: Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you can plow 1 additional field.
C20_MolePlow.description: 你每次使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，可以额外犁1块田。

C21_HeartofStone.name: Heart of Stone
desc: Each time a __Quarry__ accumulation space is revealed, if you have room in your house, you can immediately take a __Family Growth__ action without placing a person.
C21_HeartofStone.description: 每次“采石场”累积格被揭示时，如果你的房屋里有空房间，你可以立即执行一次“家庭增长”行动，无需放置家庭成员。

C22_BasketChair.name: Basket Chair
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately move the first person (unless it is on the __Meeting Place__ action space) you placed this work phase to this card. If you do, immediately afterward, you can place another person.
C22_BasketChair.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即将你在本工作阶段放置的第1名家庭成员(除非该家庭成员在“广场”行动格上)移动到本卡牌上。如果你这么做，然后你可以立即放置另一名家庭成员。

C23_JobContract.name: Job Contract
desc: If both are unoccupied, you can use the __Day Laborer__ and the adjacent __Lessons__ action space with a single person (in that order). Afterward, both spaces are considered occupied.
C23_JobContract.description: 如果“临时工”和相邻的“职业训练”行动格都未被占据，你可以只用一名家庭成员使用这两个行动格(按该顺序)。然后，两个格子都视为被占据。

C24_BedintheGrainField.name: Bed in the Grain Field
desc: At the start of the next harvest, you get a __Family Growth__ action if you have room for the newborn.
C24_BedintheGrainField.description: 在下次收成开始时，如果你有房间给新生儿，你获得一次“家庭增长”行动。

C25_SteamMachine.name: Steam Machine
desc: Each work phase, if the last action space you use is an accumulation space, you can immediately afterward take a __Bake Bread__ action.
C25_SteamMachine.description: 每个工作阶段，如果你使用的最后的行动格是一个累积格，然后你可以立即执行1次“烤面包”行动。

C26_Flail.name: Flail
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <FOOD>. Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you can also take a __Bake Bread__ action.
C26_Flail.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得2
。你每次使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，你还可以执行1次“烤面包”行动 。

C27_Blueprint.name: Blueprint
desc: You can build the major improvements __Joinery__, __Pottery__, and __Basketmaker's Workshop__ even when taking a __Minor Improvement__ action. They each cost you 1 <STONE> less.
C27_Blueprint.description:
你执行“次要发展”行动时，可以建造“木工坊”、“陶器工坊”和“制篮工坊”主要发展。它们的每个的花费减少1
。

C28_TeachersDesk.name: Teacher's Desk
desc: Each time you use the __Major Improvement__ or __House Redevelopment__ action space, you can also play 1 occupation at an occupation cost of 1 <FOOD>.
C28_TeachersDesk.description:
每次你使用“主要发展”或“房屋改建”行动格时，你还可以以1
的职业花费打出1张职业卡牌。

C29_BeerTable.name: Beer Table
desc: At the end of the field phase of each harvest, you can pay 1 <GRAIN> from your supply to get 2 bonus <SCORE>. If you do, all other players get 1 <FOOD> each.
C29_BeerTable.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤结束时，你可以从供应堆中支付1
来获得2点奖励
。如果你这么做，所有其他玩家获得1
。

C30_HalfTimberedHouse.name: Half-Timbered House
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each stone room you have. You can only use one card to get bonus points for your stone house.
C30_HalfTimberedHouse.description:
游戏结束计分时，你每拥有1个石造房间，获得1点奖励
。你只能使用1张卡牌来为你的石造房屋获得奖励分数。

C31_WritingChamber.name: Writing Chamber
desc: During scoring, you get a number of bonus <SCORE> equal to the total of negative points you have, to a maximum of 7 <SCORE>.
C31_WritingChamber.description:
游戏结束计分时，你获得与你失去的分数相同的奖励
，最多7
。

C32_AbortOriel.name: Abort Oriel
desc: You can no longer play this card when any player (including you) has 5 or more cards in front of them.
C32_AbortOriel.description: 当任意玩家(包括你自己)面前有5张或更多卡牌时，你无法再打出本卡牌。

C33_GreeningPlan.name: Greening Plan
desc: During scoring, if you then have at least 2/4/5/6 unplanted fields, you get 1/2/3/5 bonus <SCORE>.
C33_GreeningPlan.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你拥有至少2/4/5/6个未播种农田，你获得1/2/3/5点奖励
。

C34_ElephantgrassPlant.name: Elephantgrass Plant
desc: Immediately after each harvest, you can use this card to exchange exactly 1 <REED> for 1 bonus <SCORE>.
C34_ElephantgrassPlant.description:
每次收成后，你可以立即使用本卡牌来用正好1
交换1点奖励
。

C35_LanternHouse.name: Lantern House
desc: During scoring, you get 1 negative <SCORE> for each card left in your hand. You cannot discard cards from your hand unplayed. If you already have, you cannot play this card.
C35_LanternHouse.description:
游戏结束计分时，你没有1张手牌，失去1
。你不能丢弃手中未打出的卡牌。如果你已经丢弃过手牌，你无法打出本卡牌。

C36_ClayDeposit.name: Clay Deposit
desc: Immediately after each time you use a clay accumulation space, you can exchange 1 <CLAY> for 1 bonus <SCORE>. If you do, place the <CLAY> on the accumulation space.
C36_ClayDeposit.description:
你每次使用黏土累积格后，可以立即用1
交换1点奖励
。如果你这么做，将用于交换的
放在该累积格上。

C37_DwellingMound.name: Dwelling Mound
desc: From now on, you must pay 1 <FOOD> for each new field tile that you place in your farmyard.
C37_DwellingMound.description:
从现在起，你在农场中放置每个新的农田板块时都必须支付1
。

C38_Christianity.name: Christianity
desc: When you play this card, all other players get 1 <FOOD> each.
C38_Christianity.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，所有其他玩家各获得1
。

C39_StudioBoat.name: Studio Boat
desc: Each time you use the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you also get 1 bonus <SCORE>. In games with 1-3 players, this card is considered __Traveling Players__ (same effect as __Fishing__).
C39_StudioBoat.description:
你每次使用“卖艺”累积格时，还获得1点奖励
。1-3位玩家的游戏中，本卡牌视为“卖艺”(与“钓鱼”效果相同)。

C40_CanvasSack.name: Canvas Sack
desc: When you play this card paying <GRAIN>/<REED> for it, you immediately get 1 <VEGETABLE>/4 <WOOD>.
C40_CanvasSack.description:
当你打出本卡牌并为此支付
/
时，立即获得1
/4
。

C41_FarmStore.name: Farm Store
desc: After the feeding phase of each harvest, you can exchange exactly 1 <FOOD> for 2 different building resources of your choice or 1 <VEGETABLE>.
C41_FarmStore.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤后，你可以用正好1
交换2个你选择的不同的建造资源或1
。

C42_RavenousHunger.name: Ravenous Hunger
desc: Immediately after each time you use the __Vegetable Seeds__ action space, you can place another person on an accumulation space and get 1 additional good of the accumulating type.
C42_RavenousHunger.description: 你每次使用“蔬菜种子”行动格后，你可以立即放置另一名家庭成员到1个累积格上，并额外获得1个该累积格类型的货物。

C43_FarmBuilding.name: Farm Building
desc: Each time you build a major improvement, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
C43_FarmBuilding.description:
你每次建造主要发展时，在接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C44_ChickenCoop.name: Chicken Coop
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 8 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
C44_ChickenCoop.description:
在接下来的 8 个回合放置 1
。这些回合开始时，你可以获得这些
。

C45_Stew.name: Stew
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, also place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
C45_Stew.description:
你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，还在接下来4轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C46_Mandoline.name: Mandoline
desc: Once per round, you can pay 1 <VEGETABLE> to get 1 bonus <SCORE>. If you do, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
C46_Mandoline.description:
每轮仅限一次，你可以支付1
来获得1点奖励
。如果你这么做，在接下来2轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C47_GardenClaw.name: Garden Claw
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining round space, up to three times the number of planted fields you have. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
C47_GardenClaw.description:
在剩余每个轮次格上各放置1
，最多为你一样的已播种农田数量的三倍。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C48_Farmstead.name: Farmstead
desc: After each turn in which you make at least one unused farmyard space used, you get 1 <FOOD>.
C48_Farmstead.description:
在你的回合中，你每将1个未使用的农场格子变为已使用，获得1
。

C49_BeerStall.name: Beer Stall
desc: In the feeding phase of each harvest, for each empty unfenced stable you have, you can exchange 1 <GRAIN> for 5 <FOOD>.
C49_BeerStall.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤中，你每有1个牧场外的空畜棚，可以用1
交换5
。

C50_StableYard.name: Stable Yard
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD> for each completed round left to play. At any time, you can exchange 1 <SHEEP> plus 1 <PIG> for 1 <CATTLE>.
C50_StableYard.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，距离游戏结束每有1个未进行的完整轮次，立即获得1
。在任何时候，你可以用1
加上1
交换1
。

C51_FishingNet.name: Fishing Net
desc: Each time another player uses the __Fishing__ accumulation space, they must first pay you 1 <FOOD>. Then, in the returning home phase of that round, place 2 <FOOD> on __Fishing__.
C51_FishingNet.description:
每次有另一位玩家使用“钓鱼” 累积格时，其必须先支付给你1

1

C115_Sower.description:
你每次建造主要发展时，从公共供应堆中拿取1
，放置在本卡牌上。在任何时候，你可以将该
移动到你的供应堆或用其交换1次“播种”行动。

C116_FurnitureMaker.name: Furniture Maker
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD>. Each time you play an occupation after this one, you get 1 <WOOD> for each <FOOD> paid as occupation cost.
C116_FurnitureMaker.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。在打出本卡牌后，你每次打出职业卡牌时，每支付1个作为职业花费的
，你获得1
。

C117_Legworker.name: Legworker
desc: Each time you use an action space that is orthogonally adjacent to another action space occupied by one of your people, you get 1 <WOOD>.
C117_Legworker.description:
你每次使用1个行动格时，如果该行动格竖直或水平相邻的一个行动格被你的家庭成员占据，你获得1
。

C118_WoodCollector.name: Wood Collector
desc: Place 1 <WOOD> on each of the next 5 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <WOOD>.
C118_WoodCollector.description:
在接下来5轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C119_SkillfulRenovator.name: Skillful Renovator
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <CLAY>. Each time after you renovate, you get a number of <WOOD> equal to the number of people you placed that round.
C119_SkillfulRenovator.description:
当你出本卡牌时，立即获得1
和1
。在你每次翻新后，你获得等于你该轮放置了的家庭成员数量的
。

C120_AgriculturalLabourer.name: Agricultural Labourer
desc: Place 8 <CLAY> on this card. For each <GRAIN> you obtain, you also get 1 <CLAY> from this card.
C120_AgriculturalLabourer.description:
在本卡牌上放置8
。你每获得1
，你还从本卡牌获得1
。

C121_ClayKneader.name: Clay Kneader
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD> and 2 <CLAY>. Each time after you use __Grain Seeds__ or __Vegetable Seeds__ action space, you get 1 <CLAY>.
C121_ClayKneader.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
和2
。你每次使用“谷物种子”或“蔬菜种子”行动格后，获得1
。

C122_Bricklayer.name: Bricklayer
desc: Each improvement and each renovation cost you 1 <CLAY> less. Each room costs you 2 <CLAY> less.
C122_Bricklayer.description:
每个发展和每次翻新少花费你1
。每个房间少花费你2
。

C123_Freemason.name: Freemason
desc: As long as you live in a <CLAY>/<STONE> house with exactly 2 rooms, at the start of each work phase, you get 2 <CLAY>/<STONE>.
C123_Freemason.description:
只要你住在正好有2个房间的砖土/石造房屋，在每个工作阶段开始时，你获得2
/
。

C124_StoneImporter.name: Stone Importer
desc: In the breeding phase of the 1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th/6th harvest, you can use this card to buy exactly 2 <STONE> for 2/2/3/3/4/1 <FOOD>.
C124_StoneImporter.description:
在第1/第2/第3/第4/第5/第6次收成的每次繁殖步骤中，你可以使用本卡牌一次来用2/2/3/3/4/1
购买2
。

C125_Nightworker.name: Nightworker
desc: Before the start of each work phase, you can place a person on an accumulation space of a building resource not in your supply. (Then proceed with the start player.)
C125_Nightworker.description: 在每个工作阶段开始前，你可以将一个家庭成员放置到你供应堆中没有的建造资源的累积格上(然后从起始玩家开始)。

C126_Excavator.name: Excavator
desc: Each time after you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you get 1 additional <WOOD> and <CLAY>, and you can buy 1 <STONE> for 1 <FOOD>.
C126_Excavator.description:
你每次使用“临时工”行动格后，你还获得1
和1
，且你可以用1
购买1
。

C127_Lover.name: Lover
desc: When you play this card, immediately pay an amount of <FOOD> equal to the number of complete rounds left to play to take a __Family Growth Even without Room__ action.
C127_Lover.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即支付等于剩余完整轮次数量的
来执行1次“无需空房间的家庭增长”行动。

C128_WoodenHutExtender.name: Wooden Hut Extender
desc: Wood rooms now cost you 1 <REED>, and additionally 5 <WOOD> through round 5, 4 <WOOD>  in rounds 6 and 7, and 3 <WOOD>  in round 8 and later.
C128_WoodenHutExtender.description:
从现在起，在第1到5轮中/第6和7轮中/第8轮及之后，木造房间的花费为1
以及5/4/3
。

C129_SecondSpouse.name: Second Spouse
desc: You can use the __Urgent Wish for Children__ action space (from round 12-13) even if it is occupied by the first person another player placed.
C129_SecondSpouse.description: 你可以使用“渴望增加家庭成员”行动格(在第12或13轮中出现)，即使该行动格已经被其他玩家在该轮放置的第一名家庭成员占据。

C130_OutskirtsDirector.name: Outskirts Director
desc: Each time you use the __Grove__ or __Hollow__ accumulation space, you can place 2 <REED> from the general supply on the other space. If you do, you can immediately place another person.
C130_OutskirtsDirector.description:
你每次使用“树林”或“泥坑”累积格之一时，你可以从公共供应堆中拿取2
，放置到另外那个格子上。如果你这么做，你可以立即放置另一名家庭成员。

C131_PrivateTeacher.name: Private Teacher
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space when any __Lessons__ action space is occupied, you can also play an occupation for an occupation cost of 1 <FOOD>.
C131_PrivateTeacher.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格且任意一个“职业训练”行动格被占据时，你还可以以1
的职业花费打出1张职业卡牌。

C132_TimberShingleMaker.name: Timber Shingle Maker
desc: When you renovate to stone, you can place up to 1 <WOOD> from your supply in each of your rooms. During scoring, each such <WOOD> is worth 1 bonus <SCORE>.
C132_TimberShingleMaker.description:
当你翻新至石造时，你可以从你的供应堆拿取
，在你的每个房间上放置最多1
。游戏结束计分时，每个此类
价值1点奖励
。

C133_Soldier.name: Soldier
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each <STONE> + <WOOD> pair in your supply. You cannot score additional points for the resources scored with this card.
C133_Soldier.description:
游戏结束计分时，你的供应堆中每有1组1
+1
的组合，获得1点奖励
。用本卡牌计分过的资源无法再用于计算额外分数。

C134_CowPrince.name: Cow Prince
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each space in your farmyard (including rooms) holding at least 1 <CATTLE>.
C134_CowPrince.description:
游戏结束计分时，你的农场中(包括房间)每有1个容纳了至少1
的格子，获得1点奖励
。

C135_Constable.name: Constable
desc: If there are still 1/3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 1/2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with no negative points in any scoring line gets 3 bonus <SCORE>.
C135_Constable.description:
如果距离游戏结束仍然有1/3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立即获得1/2/3/4
。游戏结束计分时，每位没有失去任何分数的玩家获得3点奖励
。

C136_RanchProvost.name: Ranch Provost
desc: If there are still 3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with a pasture of highest capacity gets 3 bonus <SCORE>.
C136_RanchProvost.description:
如果游戏还有完整的3/6/9轮尚未进行，你立即获得2/3/4
。游戏结束计分时每位牧场容量最大的玩家获得3点奖励
。

C137_CharcoalBurner.name: Charcoal Burner
desc: Each time any player (including you) plays or builds a <BAKE>-improvement, you get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <FOOD>.
C137_CharcoalBurner.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)打出或建造
发展，你获得1
和1
。

C138_AnimalFeeder.name: Animal Feeder
desc: On the __Day Laborer__ action space, you also get your choice of 1 <SHEEP> or 1 <GRAIN>. Instead of that good, you can buy 1 <PIG> for 1 <FOOD> or 1 <CATTLE> for 2 <FOOD>.
C138_AnimalFeeder.description:
在“临时工”行动格上，你还可以获得1
或1
。或者，你可以用1
购买1
或用2
购买1
。

C139_BasketmakersWife.name: Basketmaker's Wife
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <REED> and 1 <FOOD>. At any time, you can turn 1 <REED> into 2 <FOOD>.
C139_BasketmakersWife.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得1
和1
。在任何时候，你可以将1
转化成2
。

C140_PackagingArtist.name: Packaging Artist
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <GRAIN>. Each time you get a __Minor Improvement__ action, you can take a __Bake Bread__ action instead.
C140_PackagingArtist.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你每次获得“次要发展”行动时，你可以改为执行“烤面包”行动。

C141_SheepProvider.name: Sheep Provider
desc: Each time any player (including you) uses the __Sheep Market__ accumulation space, you get 1 <GRAIN>.
C141_SheepProvider.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)使用“羊市”累积格时，你获得1
。

C142_MarketCrier.name: Market Crier
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you can get an additional 1 <GRAIN> and 1 <VEGETABLE>. If you do, each other player gets 1 <GRAIN>.
C142_MarketCrier.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，可以额外获得1
和1
。如果你这么做，其他每位玩家从公共供应堆各获得1
。

C143_StoneBuyer.name: Stone Buyer
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately buy exactly 2 <STONE> for 1 <FOOD>. From the next round on, once per round, you can buy 1 <STONE> for 2 <FOOD>.
C143_StoneBuyer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即用1
购买正好2
。从下一轮开始，每轮仅限一次，你可以用2
购买1
。

C144_ReedRoofRenovator.name: Reed Roof Renovator
desc: Each time another player renovates, you immediately get 1 <REED> from the general supply. When you play this card in a 3-player game, you immediately get 1 <REED>.
C144_ReedRoofRenovator.description:
每次其他玩家翻新时，你立即从公共供应堆中获得1
。当你在3人游戏中打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。

C145_ForestReviewer.name: Forest Reviewer
desc: Each time after any player (including you) uses the unoccupied __Grove__ or __Forest__ accumulation space while the other of the two is occupied, you get 1 <REED>.
C145_ForestReviewer.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)使用未被占据的“树林”或“森林”累积格之一且另外那个格子被占据时，你获得1
。

C146_WorkshopAssistant.name: Workshop Assistant
desc: Place a unique pair of different building resources on each of your improvements. Each time another player renovates, you may move one such pair to your supply.
C146_WorkshopAssistant.description: 在你的每个发展上各放置一对不同的建造资源，任意两个发展上放置的组合不能相同。每次另一位玩家翻新时，你可以移动其中一对至你的供应堆。

C147_Cowherd.name: Cowherd
desc: Each time you use the __Cattle Market__ accumulation space, you get 1 additional <CATTLE>.
C147_Cowherd.description:
每次你使用“牛市”累积格(在第10或11轮时出现)时，额外获得1
。

C148_MudWallower.name: Mud Wallower
desc: Every fourth time you use an accumulation space, you get 1 <PIG>, held by this card.
C148_MudWallower.description:
你每次使用累积格时，从公共供应堆中拿取1个
，放置在本卡牌上。你必须立即用本卡牌上的4
交换1
，由本卡牌容纳。

C149_ResourceRecycler.name: Resource Recycler
desc: Each time another player renovates to stone, if you live in a clay house, you can pay 2 <FOOD> to build a clay room at no additional cost.
C149_ResourceRecycler.description:
每次有另一位玩家翻新至石造时，如果你住在砖土房屋，你可以支付2
来建造1个砖土房间，无需额外花费。

C150_ParrotBreeder.name: Parrot Breeder
desc: On your turn, if you pay 1 <GRAIN> to the general supply, you can use the same action space (unless it is the __Meeting Place__ action space) that the player to your right has just used on their turn (not retroactive).
C150_ParrotBreeder.description:
在你的回合，如果你支付1
至公共供应堆，你可以使用你右手边玩家刚刚在其回合使用过的同一个行动格(不追溯)。

C151_SowingDirector.name: Sowing Director
desc: Each time after another player uses the __Grain Utilization__ action space, you get a __Sow__ action.
C151_SowingDirector.description: 每次有另一位玩家使用“谷物运用”行动格后，你获得1个“播种”行动。

C152_Puppeteer.name: Puppeteer
desc: Each time another player uses the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you can pay them 1 <FOOD> to immediately play an occupation without paying an occupation cost.
C152_Puppeteer.description:
每次有另一位玩家使用“卖艺”累积格时，你可以向其支付1
，来立即打出1张职业卡牌且无需支付职业花费。

C153_PatternMaker.name: Pattern Maker
desc: Each time another player renovates, you can exchange exactly 2 <WOOD> for 1 <GRAIN>, 1 <FOOD>, and 1 bonus <SCORE>.
C153_PatternMaker.description:
每次有其他玩家翻新时，你可以用正好2
交换1
、1
和1点奖励
。

C154_TwinResearcher.name: Twin Researcher
desc: Each time you use one of the two accumulation spaces for the same type of good containing exactly the same number of goods, you can also buy 1 bonus <SCORE> for 1 <FOOD>.
C154_TwinResearcher.description:
你每次使用货物数量正好相同的2个同类货物累积格之一时，你还可以用1
购买1点奖励
。

C155_FoodDistributor.name: Food Distributor
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <GRAIN> and, at the start of this returning home phase, an amount of <FOOD> equal to the number of occupied Round 1-14 action spaces.
C155_FoodDistributor.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
，且在本轮的回家阶段开始时，获得与被占据的行动格卡牌数量相等的
。

C156_HoofCaregiver.name: Hoof Caregiver
desc: Immediately add 1 <CATTLE> from the general supply to the __Cattle Market__ accumulation space. Afterward, for each cattle on __Cattle Market__, you get 1 <GRAIN> plus 1 <FOOD>.
C156_HoofCaregiver.description:
立即从公共供应堆中拿取1
，加入到“牛市”累积格中。然后，“牛市”上每有1
，你获得1
和1
。

C157_ResourceAnalyzer.name: Resource Analyzer
desc: Before the start of each round, if you have more building resources than all other players of at least two types, you get 1 <FOOD>.
C157_ResourceAnalyzer.description:
在每轮开始前，如果你有至少2种建造资源多于其他任何玩家，你获得1
。

C158_ForestCampaigner.name: Forest Campaigner
desc: Each time before you place a person, if there are at least 8 <WOOD> total on accumulation spaces, you get 1 <FOOD>.
C158_ForestCampaigner.description:
你每次放置1名家庭成员前，如果所有累积格上总共有至少8
，获得1
。

C159_FishermansFriend.name: Fisherman's Friend
desc: At the start of each round, if there is more <FOOD> on the __Traveling Players__ than on the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get the difference from the general supply.
C159_FishermansFriend.description:
在每轮开始时，如果“卖艺”累积格上相比“钓鱼”累积格上有更多
，你从公共供应堆中获得差值数量的
。

C160_Outrider.name: Outrider
desc: Each time before you use the action space on the most recently revealed action space card (after it has been placed on the round space), you get 1 <GRAIN>.
C160_Outrider.description:
你每次使用最近揭示的行动格卡牌(在其被放置到轮次格上后)上的行动格前，你获得1
。

C161_PotatoDigger.name: Potato Digger
desc: When you play this card, if you have at least 2/4/5 unplanted field tiles, you immediately get 1/2/3 <VEGETABLE>.
C161_PotatoDigger.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你有至少2/4/5块未播种的农田板块，立即获得1/2/3
。

C162_ForestOwner.name: Forest Owner
desc: This card is an action space for all. If another player uses it, they get 3 <WOOD> and must give you 1 <WOOD> from the general supply. If you use it, you get 4 <WOOD>.
C162_ForestOwner.description:
本卡牌是一个所有玩家都能使用的行动格。如果另一位玩家使用本卡牌，其获得3
且必须从公共供应堆中给予你1
。如果你使用本卡牌，你获得4
。

C163_MaterialDeliveryman.name: Material Deliveryman
desc: Each time any player (including you) takes 5/6/7/8+ goods from an accumulation space, you get 1 <WOOD>/<CLAY>/<REED>/<STONE> from the general supply.
C163_MaterialDeliveryman.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)累积格拿取5/6/7/8+个货物时，你从公共供应堆中获得1
/
/
/
。

C164_GermanHeathKeeper.name: German Heath Keeper
desc: Each time any player (including you) uses the __Pig Market__ accumulation space, you get 1 <SHEEP> from the general supply.
C164_GermanHeathKeeper.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)使用“猪市”累积格时，你从公共供应堆中获得1
。

C165_GameCatcher.name: Game Catcher
