desc: When you play this card, pay 1 <FOOD> for each remaining harvest to immediately get 1 <CATTLE> and 1 <PIG>.
C165_GameCatcher.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，支付与剩余收成次数相同数量的食物来立即获得1
和1
。

C166_CattleWhisperer.name: Cattle Whisperer
desc: Add 5 and 8 to the current round and place 1 <CATTLE> on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <CATTLE>.
C166_CattleWhisperer.description:
将目前的轮数加上5和8并在对应的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

C167_CattleBuyer.name: Cattle Buyer
desc: Each time another player uses the __Fencing__ action space, you can buy exactly 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE> from the general supply for 1/2/2 <FOOD>.
C167_CattleBuyer.description:
每次其他玩家使用“围栏”行动格时，你可以用1/2/2
从公共供应堆中购买正好1
/
/
。

C168_AnimalCatcher.name: Animal Catcher
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, instead of 2 <FOOD>, you can get 3 different animals from the general supply. If you do, you must pay 1 <FOOD> each harvest left to play.
C168_AnimalCatcher.description:
每次你使用“临时工”行动格时，你可以不获得2
，改为从公共供应堆中获得3个不同的动物。如果你这么做，你必须支付与剩余收成次数相同数量的
。

D1_ZigzagHarrow.name: Zigzag Harrow
desc: You can immediately plow 1 field such that it completes a "zigzag" pattern.
D1_ZigzagHarrow.description: 你可以立即犁1块能完成“之”字形图案的田：

D2_DwellingPlan.name: Dwelling Plan
desc: You can immediately take a __Renovation__ action.
D2_DwellingPlan.description: 你可以立即执行1个“翻新”行动。

D3_Furrows.name: Furrows
desc: You can immediately sow in exactly 1 field.
D3_Furrows.description: 你可以立即在正好1个农田上播种。

D4_CrossCutWood.name: Cross-Cut Wood
desc: You immediately get a number of <WOOD> equal to the number of <STONE> in your supply.
D4_CrossCutWood.description:
你立即获得等同于你供应堆中
数量的
。

D5_FieldClay.name: Field Clay
desc: You immediately get 1 <CLAY> for each planted field you have.
D5_FieldClay.description:
你立即获得等同于你已种植农田数量的
。

D6_PetrifiedWood.name: Petrified Wood
desc: Immediately exchange up to 3 <WOOD> for 1 <STONE> each.
D6_PetrifiedWood.description:
立即用
交换最多3
，每个
交换1
。

D7_Trident.name: Trident
desc: If you play this card in round 3/6/9/12, you immediately get 3/4/5/6 <FOOD>.
D7_Trident.description:
如果你在第3/6/9/12轮中打出本卡牌，立即获得3/4/5/6
。

D8_FernSeeds.name: Fern Seeds
desc: You get 2 <FOOD> and 1 <GRAIN>, which you must sow immediately.
D8_FernSeeds.description:
你获得2
和1个必须立即播种的
。

D9_GameTrade.name: Game Trade
desc: You immediately get 1 <PIG> and 1 <CATTLE>. (effectively, you are exchanging 2 <SHEEP> for 1 <PIG> and 1 <CATTLE>.)
D9_GameTrade.description:
你立即获得1
和1
。(此卡牌效果等同于用2
交换1
和1
。)

D10_StorksNest.name: Stork's Nest
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if you have more rooms than people, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to take a __Family Growth__ action.
D10_StorksNest.description:
在每轮的回家阶段中，如果你拥有的房间数大于家庭成员数，你可以支付1
来执行1次“家庭增长”行动。

D11_LawnFertilizer.name: Lawn Fertilizer
desc: Your pastures of size 1 can hold up to 3 animals of the same type. (With a stable, they can hold up to 6 animals of the same type.)
D11_LawnFertilizer.description: 你的大小为1的牧场可以容纳最多3个相同种类的动物。(如有畜棚，其可以容纳最多6个相同种类的动物。)

D12_MilkingPlace.name: Milking Place
desc: In the feeding phase of each harvest, you get 1 <FOOD>. You can no longer hold animals in your house (not even via another card).
D12_MilkingPlace.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤中，你获得1
。你无法再在你的房屋中容纳动物(即使有其他卡牌效果允许)。

D13_Trowel.name: Trowel
desc: At any time, you can renovate your house to stone. From a wooden house, this costs 1 <STONE>, 1 <REED>, and 1 <FOOD> per room. From a clay house, this costs 1 <STONE> per room.
D13_Trowel.description:
在任何时候，你可以将你的房屋翻新至石造。当前为木造房屋时，需要为每个房间花费1
、1
和1
。当前为砖土房屋时，需要为每个房间花费1
。

D14_HammerCrusher.name: Hammer Crusher
desc: Immediately before you renovate to stone, you get 2 <CLAY> and 1 <REED> and you can take a __Build Rooms__ action.
D14_HammerCrusher.description:
当你翻新至石造前，立即获得2
、1
和1次“建造房间”行动。

D15_ClaySupports.name: Clay Supports
desc: Each time you build a clay room, you can pay 2 <CLAY>, 1 <WOOD>, and 1 <REED> instead of 5 <CLAY> and 2 <REED>.
D15_ClaySupports.description:
你每次建造砖土房间时，你可以不支付5
和2
，改为支付2
、1
和1
。

D16_WoodenWheyBucket.name: Wooden Whey Bucket
desc: Each time before you use the __Sheep Market__/__Cattle Market__ accumulation space, you can build exactly 1 stable for 1 <WOOD>/at no cost.
D16_WoodenWheyBucket.description:
每次你使用“羊市”/“牛市”累积格前，你可以花费1
/无需花费建造正好1个畜棚。

D17_DrillHarrow.name: Drill Harrow
desc: Each time before you take an unconditional __Sow__ action, you can pay 3 <FOOD> to plow 1 field.
D17_DrillHarrow.description:
每次你执行一个无条件的“播种”行动前，你可以支付3
来犁1田。

D18_SteamPlow.name: Steam Plow
desc: Immediately after each returning home phase, you can pay 2 <WOOD> and 1 <FOOD> to use the __Farmland__ action space without placing a person.
D18_SteamPlow.description:
在每个回家阶段后，你可以立即支付2
和1
来使用“犁田”行动格，无需放置家庭成员。

D19_PulverizerPlow.name: Pulverizer Plow
desc: Immediately after each time you use a clay accumulation space, you can pay 1 <CLAY> to plow 1 field. If you do, place that 1 <CLAY> on the accumulation space.
D19_PulverizerPlow.description:
你每次使用黏土累积格后，你可以立即支付1
来犁1块田。如果你这么做，将支付的1
放置在该累积格上。

D20_TurnwrestPlow.name: Turnwrest Plow
desc: Place 2 field tiles on this card. Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you can also plow up to 2 fields from this card.
D20_TurnwrestPlow.description: 在本卡牌上放置2个农田板块。每次你使用“犁田”或“耕作”行动格时，你还可以用本卡牌上的农田板块，犁最多2块田。

D21_Recruitment.name: Recruitment
desc: From round 5 on, provided you have room in your house, each time you get a __Minor Improvement__ action, you can take a __Family Growth__ action instead.
D21_Recruitment.prerequisite: No People Left in the House
D21_Recruitment.description: 如果你的房屋内有空房间，从第5轮起，你每次获得1个“次要发展”行动时，你可以改为执行1次“家庭增长”行动。

D22_WorkPermit.name: Work Permit
desc: Add 1 to the current round for each building resource you have and place 1 person from your supply on the corresponding round space. In that round, you can use the person.
D22_WorkPermit.description: 在目前的轮数加上你拥有的建造资源数，并从你的供应堆中拿取1名家庭成员放置到相应的轮次格上。在该轮中，你可以使用该家庭成员。

D23_PioneeringSpirit.name: Pioneering Spirit
desc: This card is an action space for you only. In rounds 3-5, it provides a __Renovation__ action. In rounds 6-8, it provides your choice of 1 <VEGETABLE>, <PIG>, or <CATTLE>.
D23_PioneeringSpirit.description:
本卡牌是1个只有你能使用的行动格。在第3至第5轮中，本卡牌提供1次“翻新”行动。在第6至第8轮中，本卡牌提供给你选择1
、1
或1
。

D24_BrotherlyLove.name: Brotherly Love
desc: As long as you have exactly 4 people, in the work phase of each round, you can place your third and fourth person immediately after one another, even on the same action space.
D24_BrotherlyLove.description: 只要你正好拥有4名家庭成员，在每轮的工作阶段中，你可以立即依次放置你的第3、第4名家庭成员，甚至可以放在同一行动格上。

D25_WitchesDanceFloor.name: Witches' Dance Floor
desc: This card is a field that you can sow in, an occupation, and the __Fireplace__ major improvement with all of its effects. You can play it only via a __Minor Improvement__ action.
D25_WitchesDanceFloor.description: 本卡牌是1个你可以播种的农田，也是一张职业卡牌和1张没有效果的“火炉”主要发展。你只能通过“次要发展”行动打出本卡牌。

D26_CarpentersYard.name: Carpenter's Yard
desc: You can build the __Joinery__ and __Well__ major improvement even when taking a __Minor Improvement__ action, or you can build both with a single __Major Improvement__ action.
D26_CarpentersYard.description: 你执行“次要发展”行动时，可以建造“木工坊”和“井”主要发展，或在1次“主要发展”行动中同时建造“木工坊”和“井”。

D27_Retraining.name: Retraining
desc: At the end of each turn in which you renovate, you can exchange your __Joinery__ for the __Pottery__ or your __Pottery__ for the __Basketmaker's Workshop__.
D27_Retraining.description: 在你每个执行翻新的回合结束时，你可以用你的木工坊交换陶器工坊或用你的陶器工坊交换制篮工坊。

D28_WritingDesk.name: Writing Desk
desc: Each time you use a __Lessons__ action space, you can play 1 additional occupation for an occupation cost of 2 <FOOD>.
D28_WritingDesk.description:
每次你使用“职业训练”行动格时，你可以用2
作为职业花费打出1张额外职业卡牌。

D29_MuckRake.name: Muck Rake
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for exactly 1 unfenced stable holding exactly 1 <SHEEP>. The same applies to <PIG> and <CATTLE>, if held in different unfenced stables.
D29_MuckRake.description:
游戏结束计分时，若你有正好1个牧场外畜棚正好容纳1
，你获得1点奖励
。此效果同样生效于
和
(须位于不同的牧场外畜棚)。

D30_ArtisanDistrict.name: Artisan District
desc: During scoring, you get 2/5/8 bonus <SCORE> for having 3/4/5 major improvements from the bottom row of the supply board.
D30_ArtisanDistrict.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你在供应版图最下方的一行内有3/4/5个主要发展，你获得2/5/8点奖励
。

D31_Storeroom.name: Storeroom
desc: During scoring, you get ½ bonus <SCORE> for each pair of <GRAIN> plus <VEGETABLE> you have (considering all crops in your supply and fields), rounded up.
D31_Storeroom.description:
在游戏结束时，你每有一对谷物加蔬菜，获得½点奖励
，向上取整(计算你供应堆和农田中的所有作物)。

D32_WoodRake.name: Wood Rake
desc: During scoring, if you had at least 7 goods in your fields before the final harvest, you get 2 bonus <SCORE>.
D32_WoodRake.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果在最终收成前你的农田中有至少7个货物，你获得2点奖励
。

D33_SummerHouse.name: Summer House
desc: During scoring, if you live in a stone house, you get 2 bonus <SCORE> for each unused farmyard space orthogonally adjacent to your house. (You still lose the points for these unused spaces.)
D33_SummerHouse.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你住在石造房屋，你房屋旁每有1个竖直或水平相邻的未使用的农场格，获得2点奖励
(你仍然会因这些未使用的格子失去分数)。

D34_LuxuriousHostel.name: Luxurious Hostel
desc: During scoring, if you then have more stone rooms than people, you get 4 bonus <SCORE>. You can only use one card to get bonus points for your stone house.
D34_LuxuriousHostel.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你拥有的石造房屋比家庭成员多，你获得4点奖励
。你只能使用1张卡牌来为你的石造房屋获得奖励分数。

D35_FodderChamber.name: Fodder Chamber
desc: During scoring in a game with 1/2/3/4+ players, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for every 7th/5th/4th/3rd animal on your farm.
D35_FodderChamber.description:
在一场1/2/3/4+位玩家的游戏结束计分时，你农场上每有7/5/4/3个动物，你获得1点奖励
。

D36_BreedRegistry.name: Breed Registry
desc: During scoring, if you gained at most 2 <SHEEP> from sources other than breeding during the game and have not turned any sheep into food, you get 3 bonus <SCORE>.
D36_BreedRegistry.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你在游戏中通过繁殖外最多获得2
，并且没有把任何
转化成
，你获得3点奖励
。

D37_Sculpture.name: Sculpture
desc: You can only play this card if there are more complete rounds left to play than you have unused farmyard spaces.
D37_Sculpture.description: 只有在剩余完整轮次数大于你拥有的未使用农场格子数时，你才可以打出本卡牌。

D38_MilkingStool.name: Milking Stool
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, if you have at least 1/3/5 <CATTLE>, you get 1/2/3 <FOOD>. During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for every 2 <CATTLE> you have.
D38_MilkingStool.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤中，如果你有至少1/3/5
，你获得1/2/3
。游戏结束计分时，你每有2
，获得1点奖励
。

D39_TruffleSlicer.name: Truffle Slicer
desc: Each time you use a wood accumulation space, if you have at least 1 <PIG>, you can pay 1 <FOOD> for 1 bonus <SCORE>.
D39_TruffleSlicer.description:
每次你使用木材累积格时，如果你有至少1
，你可以支付1
购买1点奖励
。

D40_Cesspit.name: Cesspit
desc: Alternate placing 1 <CLAY> and 1 <PIG> on each remaining round space, starting with <CLAY>. At the start of these rounds, you get the respective good.
D40_Cesspit.description:
从黏土开始，在剩余轮的轮次格上交替放置1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取相应的货物。

D41_HorseDrawnBoat.name: Horse-Drawn Boat
desc: Alternate placing 1 <FOOD> and 1 <SHEEP> on each remaining round space, starting with <FOOD>. At the start of these rounds, you get the respective good.
D41_HorseDrawnBoat.description:
从
开始，在剩余的每个轮次格上交替放置1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取相应的货物。

D42_EducationBonus.name: Education Bonus
desc: After you play your 1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th/6th occupation this game, you immediately get 1 <GRAIN>/<CLAY>/<REED>/<STONE>/<VEGETABLE>/<FIELD> (not retroactively).
D42_EducationBonus.description:
本局游戏中，在你打出第1/2/3/4/5/6张职业卡牌后，立即获得1
/
/
/
/
/
(不追溯)。

D43_Hutch.name: Hutch
desc: Place 0, 1, 2, and 3 <FOOD> in this order on the next 4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D43_Hutch.description:
在接下来4轮的轮次格上，依次放置0、1、2、3
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D44_ForestWell.name: Forest Well
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining round space, up to the amount of <WOOD> in your supply. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D44_ForestWell.description:
在剩余每个轮次格中各放置1
，最多为你供应堆中
的数量。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D45_SheepWell.name: Sheep Well
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next round spaces, up to the number of <SHEEP> you have. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D45_SheepWell.description:
在接下来的每个轮次格上各放置1
，最多放置与你拥有
数相同的数量。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D46_PelletPress.name: Pellet Press
desc: Once per round, you can pay 1 <REED>. If you do, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 4 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D46_PelletPress.description:
每轮仅限一次，你可以支付1
来在接下来4轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D47_Churchyard.name: Churchyard
desc: Place 2 <FOOD> on each remaining round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>. (*Occupations and Improvements)
D47_Churchyard.description:
在剩余每个轮次格中各放置2
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
(*职业卡牌和发展卡牌)。

D48_CivicFacade.name: Civic Facade
desc: Before the start of each round, if you have more occupations than improvements in your hand, you get 1 <FOOD>.
D48_CivicFacade.description:
在每轮开始前，如果你手中的职业卡牌数大于你手中的发展卡牌，你获得1
。

D49_Bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
desc: Immediately before each time you play an occupation (even before paying the occupation cost), you get 3 <FOOD>.
D49_Bookshelf.description:
你每次打出职业卡牌前(甚至在支付职业花费前)，立即获得3
。

D50_ForeignAid.name: Foreign Aid
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 6 <FOOD>. You may no longer use the action spaces of rounds 12 to 14.
D50_ForeignAid.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得6
。你将无法使用第12轮至14轮的行动格。

D51_Archway.name: Archway
desc: This card is an action space for all. A player who uses it immediately gets 1 <FOOD>. Immediately before the returning home phase, they can use an unoccupied action space with the person from this card.
D51_Archway.description:
本卡牌是一个所有玩家都能使用的行动格。使用的玩家立即获得1
。在回家阶段之前，该玩家可以立即将本卡牌上的家庭成员移动到1个未被占据的行动格上。

D52_RollingPin.name: Rolling Pin
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if you have more <CLAY> than <WOOD> in your supply, you get 1 <FOOD>.
D52_RollingPin.description:
在每轮的回家阶段中，如果你供应堆中的
多于
，你获得1
。

D53_TeaHouse.name: Tea House
desc: Once per round, you can skip placing your second person and get 1 <FOOD> instead. (You can place the person later that round.)
D53_TeaHouse.description:
每轮一次，你可以跳过放置你的第2名家庭成员，改为获得1
(你可以在该轮中稍后放置这名家庭成员)。

D54_TroutPool.name: Trout Pool
desc: At the start of each work phase, if there are at least 3 <FOOD> on the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get 1 <FOOD> from the general supply.
D54_TroutPool.description:
在每个工作阶段开始时，如果在“钓鱼”累积格上有至少3
，你从公共供应堆中获得1
。

D55_NewMarket.name: New Market
desc: Each time you use an action space card on round spaces 8 to 11, you get 1 additional <FOOD>.
D55_NewMarket.description:
你每次使用第8至11轮的轮次格上的行动格时，你额外获得1
。

D56_FatstockStretcher.name: Fatstock Stretcher
desc: Each time you turn a <SHEEP> or <PIG> into <FOOD> using a cooking improvement, you get 1 additional <FOOD>.
D56_FatstockStretcher.description:
你每次使用
发展将1
或
转换成
时，你额外获得1
。

D57_WholesaleMarket.name: Wholesale Market
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D57_WholesaleMarket.description:
在剩余每个轮次格中各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D58_Gritter.name: Gritter
desc: At the end of each action in which you sow vegetables in a field, you get 1 <FOOD> for each vegetable field you have (including the new ones).
D58_Gritter.description:
你每个在农田播种蔬菜的行动结束时，你可以获得和你拥有的蔬菜农田数量等量的
(包括新的蔬菜农田)。

D59_EarthOven.name: Earth Oven
desc: [Anytime]
<VEGETABLE> <ARROW> 3<FOOD><PIG> <ARROW> 3<FOOD>
<SHEEP> <ARROW> 2<FOOD><CATTLE> <ARROW> 3<FOOD>
[__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW> 2<FOOD>
D59_EarthOven.description:
在任何时候：
3
3
2
3
“烤面包”行动：
2

D60_LargePottery.name: Large Pottery
desc: [Anytime]
<CLAY> <ARROW> 2<FOOD>
[Scoring]
3/5/6/7<CLAY> <ARROW-1X> 1/2/3/4<SCORE>
D60_LargePottery.description:
在任何时候：
2
计分：
3/5/6/7
1/2/3/4

D61_BaleofStraw.name: Bale of Straw
desc: At the start of each harvest, if you have at least 3 grain fields (including field cards with planted grain), you get 2 <FOOD>.
D61_BaleofStraw.description:
在每个收成开始时，若你拥有至少3个
农田(包括已播种谷物的农田卡牌)，你获得2
。

D62_BeerTap.name: Beer Tap
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <FOOD>. In the feeding phase of each harvest, you can turn 2/3/4 <GRAIN> into 3/6/9 <FOOD>.
D62_BeerTap.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得2
。在每次收成的供养步骤中，你可以将2/3/4
转换成3/6/9
。

D63_Lynchet.name: Lynchet
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, you get 1 <FOOD> for each harvested field tile that is orthogonally adjacent to your house.
D63_Lynchet.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤中，你获得等同于你房屋竖直或水平相邻的已收成农田板块数的
。

D64_BakingCourse.name: Baking Course
desc: [__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW> 2<FOOD>
At the end of each round that does not end with a harvest, you can take a __Bake Bread__ action.
D64_BakingCourse.description:
“烤面包”行动：
2
在不以收成结束的每轮结束时，你可以执行1次“烤面包”行动。

D65_GrainSieve.name: Grain Sieve
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, if you harvest at least 2 <GRAIN>, you get 1 additional <GRAIN> from the general supply.
D65_GrainSieve.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤中，如果你收成了至少2
，你从公共供应堆中获得额外1
。

D66_PotterCeramics.name: Potter Ceramics
desc: Each time before you take a __Bake Bread__ action, you can exchange 1 <CLAY> for 1 <GRAIN>.
D66_PotterCeramics.description:
你每次执行“烤面包”行动前，你可以用正好1
交换1
。

D67_ReapHook.name: Reap Hook
desc: Place 1 <GRAIN> on each of the next 3 of the round spaces 4, 7, 9, 11, 13, and 14. At the start of these rounds, you get the <GRAIN>.
D67_ReapHook.description:
在4、7、9、11、13、14轮中接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D68_SmallBasket.name: Small Basket
desc: Each time after you use the __Reed Bank__ accumulation space, you can pay 1 <REED> to get 1 <VEGETABLE>. If you do in a game with 4+ players, place that 1 <REED> on the accumulation space.
D68_SmallBasket.description:
你每次使用“芦苇池”累积格时，你可以支付1
来获得1
。如果你在一场4+位玩家的游戏中这么做，将该
放置在累积格上。

D69_SmallGreenhouse.name: Small Greenhouse
desc: Add 4 and 7 to the current round and place 1 <VEGETABLE> on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you can buy the <VEGETABLE> for 1 <FOOD>.
D69_SmallGreenhouse.description:
将目前的轮数加上4和7并在对应的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你可以用1
购买该轮格子上的
。

D70_StrawManure.name: Straw Manure
desc: Before the field phase of each harvest, you can pay 1 <GRAIN> from your supply to add 1 <VEGETABLE> to each of up to 2 vegetable fields.
D70_StrawManure.description:
在每次收成的收割步骤前，你可以从你的供应堆中支付1
来在最多2个
农田上各放置1
。

D71_Changeover.name: Changeover
desc: At any time, if a field contains exactly 1 good as a result of a harvest, you can discard that good and immediately take a __Sow__ action limited to that field.
D71_Changeover.description: 在任何时候，若有农田因收成而含有正好1个货物，你可以丢弃该货物，立即在该农田中执行1次“播种”行动。

D72_StableManure.name: Stable Manure
desc: In the field phase of each harvest, you can harvest 1 additional good from a number of fields equal to the number of unfenced stables you have.
D72_StableManure.description: 在每次收成的收割步骤中，你可以从等于你牧场外畜棚数量的农田中额外收成1个货物。

D73_SupplyBoat.name: Supply Boat
desc: Each time after you use the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you can choose to buy 1 <GRAIN> for 1 <FOOD>, or 1 <VEGETABLE> for 3 <FOOD>.
D73_SupplyBoat.description:
每次你使用“钓鱼”累积格后，你可以选择用1
购买1
，或用3
购买1
。

D74_RoyalWood.name: Royal Wood
desc: At the end of each turn in which you use the __Farm Expansion__ action space or build an improvement, you get 1 <WOOD> back for every 2 <WOOD> paid during those actions (rounded down).
D74_RoyalWood.description:
在你每个使用了“农场扩建”行动格或建造发展的回合结束时，你取回这些行动中
花费的一半(向下取整)。

D75_WoodField.name: Wood Field
desc: You can plant <WOOD> on this card as though it were 2 fields, but it is considered 1 field. Sow and harvest <WOOD> on this card as you would <GRAIN>.
D75_WoodField.description:
你可以将本卡牌当做2个只能种植
的农田，但只视为1个农田。在本卡牌上，
能像
一样被播种和收成。

D76_SocialBenefits.name: Social Benefits
desc: Immediately after the feeding phase of each harvest, if you have no <FOOD> left, you get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <CLAY>.
D76_SocialBenefits.description:
在每次收成的供养阶段后，如果你没有剩余的
，你立即获得1
和1
。

D77_RecycledBrick.name: Recycled Brick
desc: Each time any player (including you) renovates to stone, you get 1 <CLAY> for each newly renovated room.
D77_RecycledBrick.description:
每次任意一位玩家(包括你自己)翻新至石造时，你获得和新翻新房间数量相等的
。

D78_ReedPond.name: Reed Pond
desc: Place 1 <REED> on each of the next 3 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <REED>.
D78_ReedPond.description:
在接下来3轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D79_CarrotMuseum.name: Carrot Museum
desc: At the end of rounds 8, 10, and 12, you get 1 <STONE> for each vegetable field you have and a number of <WOOD> equal to the number of <VEGETABLE> in your supply.
D79_CarrotMuseum.description:
在第8、10、12轮结束时，你获得等于你供应堆中
数量的
，且你每有1个蔬菜农田，获得1
。

D80_BrickHammer.name: Brick Hammer
desc: Each time after you build an improvement costing at least 2 <CLAY>, you get 1 <STONE>.
D80_BrickHammer.description:
每次你建造花费至少为2
的发展后，你获得1
。

D81_RoofLadder.name: Roof Ladder
desc: Each time you renovate, you pay 1 fewer <REED> and, at the end of the action, you get 1 <STONE>.
D81_RoofLadder.description:
每次你翻新时，你少支付1
，并且在该行动结束时，你获得1
。

D82_HuntingTrophy.name: Hunting Trophy
desc: Improvements built on __House Redevelopment__ cost you 1 building resource of your choice less. Fences built on __Farm Redevelopment__ cost you a total of 3 <WOOD> less.
D82_HuntingTrophy.description:
“房屋改建”上建造发展时你少花费任意1个建造资源。建造“农场改建”的围栏时你少花费共计3
。

D83_Pigswill.name: Pigswill
desc: Each time you use the __Fencing__ action space, you also get 1 <PIG>.
D83_Pigswill.description:
每次你使用“围栏”行动格时，你还获得1
。

D84_FeedPellets.name: Feed Pellets
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <SHEEP>. In the feeding phase of each harvest, you can exchange exactly 1 <VEGETABLE> for 1 animal of a type you already have.
D84_FeedPellets.description:
当你出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。在每次收成的供养步骤中，你可以用正好1
交换任意1个你已拥有种类的动物。

D85_Reader.name: Reader
desc: As soon as you have 6 (__7 in draft mode__) occupations in front of you (including this one), this cards provides room for one person.
D85_Reader.description: 只要你面前有6张职业卡牌(包括本卡牌)，本卡牌为一名家庭成员提供房间。在轮抽变体中，你需要7张职业卡牌来打出本卡牌。

D86_SheepAgent.name: Sheep Agent
desc: You can keep 1 <SHEEP> on this card for each occupation card in front of you (including this one), unless it is already able to hold animals.
D86_SheepAgent.description:
你面前的每张职业卡牌(包括本卡牌)上可以容纳1
，除非其已经能够容纳动物。

D87_MasterBuilder.name: Master Builder
desc: Once your house has at least 5 rooms, at any time, but only once this game, you can add another room at no cost.
D87_MasterBuilder.description: 一旦你的房屋有至少5个房间，在任何时候你可以添加另一个房间且无需花费，本场游戏仅限一次。

D88_Millwright.name: Millwright
desc: You immediately get 1 <GRAIN>. Each time you build fences, stables, and rooms, or renovate your house, you can replace up to 2 building resources of any type with 1 <GRAIN> each.
D88_Millwright.description:
你立即获得1
。你每次建造栅栏、畜棚、房间或翻新你的房屋时，你可以用
代替最多2个任意种类的建造资源，每个
可代替1个建造资源。

D89_Stablehand.name: Stablehand
desc: Each time you build at least 1 fence, you can also build a stable without paying <WOOD> for the stable.
D89_Stablehand.description:
你每次建造至少1个栅栏时，你还可以建造1个畜棚且无需为其支付
。

D90_PlowMaker.name: Plow Maker
desc: Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to plow 1 additional field.
D90_PlowMaker.description:
你每次使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，你可以支付1
来额外犁1块田。

D91_Plowman.name: Plowman
desc: Add 4, 7, and 10 to the current round and place a field tile on each corresponding round space. At the start of these rounds, you can plow the field for 1 <FOOD>.
D91_Plowman.description:
将目前的轮数加上4、7、10并在对应的轮次格上各放置1个农田板块。在这些轮开始时，你可以花费1个
，用该轮格子上的农田板块犁1块田。

D92_ChildOmbudsman.name: Child Ombudsman
desc: From round 5 on, if you have room in your house, at the end of each person action, you can take a __Family Growth__ action with that person. If you do, you get 2 negative <SCORE>.
D92_ChildOmbudsman.description:
从第5轮开始，如果你的房屋中有空房间，在每个家庭成员行动结束时，你可以用该家庭成员执行1次“家庭增长”。如果你这么做，你失去2
。

D93_SheepInspector.name: Sheep Inspector
desc: Once per work phase, after you complete a person action, you can pay 1 <SHEEP> and 2 <FOOD> to return another person you placed home, unless it is on the __Meeting Place__ action space.
D93_SheepInspector.description:
每个工作阶段一次，在你完成家庭成员行动后，你可以支付1
和2
来让另一名你放置的家庭成员回家。

D94_HenpeckedHusband.name: Henpecked Husband
desc: Each time you take a __Build Rooms__ action with the second person you place, return the first person you placed home, unless it is on the __Meeting Place__ action space.
D94_HenpeckedHusband.description: 你每次用放置的第2名家庭成员执行“建造房间”行动时，你可以让第1名家庭成员回家，除非该家庭成员在“广场”行动格上。

D95_SiteManager.name: Site Manager
desc: When you play this card, immediately build a major improvement. When paying its cost, you can replace up to 1 building resource of each type with 1 <FOOD> each.
D95_SiteManager.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即建造1个主要发展。当支付该主要发展的费用时，每种建造资源中，你都可以用1
来代替最多1个建造资源。

D96_Furnisher.name: Furnisher
desc: UPDATED: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <WOOD>. Each time after you build at least one new room, you can build or play a number of improvements equal to the number of new rooms you built, paying up to 1 <WOOD> less for each such improvement.
D96_Furnisher.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得2
。你建造每个新房间后，你可以建造或打出1个发展且
花费减1。

D97_BeggingStudent.name: Begging Student
desc: When you play this card, you must immediately take 1 <BEGGING> marker. At the start of each harvest, you can play 1 occupation without paying an occupation cost.
D97_BeggingStudent.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你必须立即拿取1
标志。在每次收成开始时，你可以打出1张职业卡牌，且无需支付职业花费。

D98_Transactor.name: Transactor
desc: Immediately before the final harvest at the end of round 14, you can take all the building resources that are left on the entire game board.
D98_Transactor.description: 在第14轮结束时，最终收成前，你可以立即拿取整个游戏版图上剩下的所有建造资源。

D99_EarthenwarePotter.name: Earthenware Potter
desc: If you play this card in round 4 or before, after the final harvest, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each person for which you then pay 1 <CLAY>.
D99_EarthenwarePotter.description:
如果你在第4轮或之前打出本卡牌，在最终收成后，你可以支付等于家庭成员数的
并获得相同数量的奖励
。

D100_LordoftheManor.name: Lord of the Manor
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each scoring category in which you score the maximum 4 points. (The bonus point is also awarded for 4 fenced stables.)
D100_LordoftheManor.description:
游戏结束计分时，你每有1个计分类型获得了最高分4分，你获得1点奖励
(4个牧场内畜棚也会获得奖励
)。

D101_SugarBaker.name: Sugar Baker
desc: Each time after you use the __Grain Utilization__ action space, you can buy 1 bonus <SCORE> for 1 <FOOD>. Place the <FOOD> on the action space (for the next visitor).
D101_SugarBaker.description:
你每次使用“谷物运用”行动格后，你可以用1
购买1点奖励
。将该
放置在该行动格上(下一位使用者可获得)。

D102_SampleStableMaker.name: Sample Stable Maker
desc: At the start of each returning home phase, you can return a built stable to your supply to get 1 <WOOD>, 1 <GRAIN>, 1 <FOOD>, and a __Minor Improvement__ action.
D102_SampleStableMaker.description:
在每个回家阶段开始时，你可以归还1个已建造的畜棚到你的供应堆来获得1
、1
、1
和1次“次要发展”行动。

D103_CanalBoatman.name: Canal Boatman
desc: Each time you use __Fishing__ or __Reed Bank__, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to immediately place another person on this card. If you do, you get your choice of 3 <STONE> or 1 <GRAIN> plus 1 <VEGETABLE>.
D103_CanalBoatman.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”或“芦苇池”时，你可以支付1
来立即在本卡牌上放置另一名家庭成员。如果你这么做，你选择获得3
或1
和1
。

D104_Cultivator.name: Cultivator
desc: For each new field tile you get, you also get 1 <WOOD> and 1 <FOOD>.
D104_Cultivator.description:
你每获得1个新的农田板块，你还获得1
和1
。

D105_Sculptor.name: Sculptor
desc: Each time you use a clay accumulation space, you also get 1 <FOOD>. Each time you use a stone accumulation space, you also get 1 <GRAIN>.
D105_Sculptor.description:
你每次使用黏土累积格时，你还获得1
。你每次使用石材累积格时，你还获得1
。

D106_WhiskyDistiller.name: Whisky Distiller
desc: At any time, you can pay 1 <GRAIN>. If you do, add 2 to the current round and place 4 <FOOD> on the corresponding round space. At the start of that round, you get the <FOOD>.
D106_WhiskyDistiller.description:
在任何时候，你可以支付1
。如果你这么做在目前轮数上加2并在相应的轮次格上放置4
。在该轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D107_Bellfounder.name: Bellfounder
desc: In the returning home phase of each round, if you have at least 1 <CLAY>, you can use this card to discard all of your <CLAY> and get your choice of 3 <FOOD> or 1 bonus <SCORE>.
D107_Bellfounder.description:
在每轮的回家阶段中如果你有至少1
，你可以使用本卡牌来丢弃你的所有
并选择获得3
或1点奖励
。

D108_StoneCarver.name: Stone Carver
desc: Each harvest, you can use this card to turn exactly 1 <STONE> into 3 <FOOD>.
D108_StoneCarver.description:
每次收成，你可以使用本卡牌一次来将正好1
转化成3
。

D109_SowingMaster.name: Sowing Master
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <WOOD>. Each time after you use the __Grain Utilization__ or __Cultivation__ action space, you get 2 <FOOD>.
D109_SowingMaster.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得1
。你每次使用“播种”行动的行动格后，你获得2
。

D110_FishFarmer.name: Fish Farmer
desc: Each time there is 1/2/3+ food on the __Fishing__ accumulation space, you get an additional 2 <FOOD> on the __Reed Bank__/ __Clay Pit__/ __Forest__ accumulation spaces.
D110_FishFarmer.description:
每次“钓鱼”累积格上有1/2/3+
时，你在“芦苇池”/“黏土坑”/“树林”累积格上获得额外2
。

D111_InteriorDecorator.name: Interior Decorator
desc: Each time you renovate, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 6 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
D111_InteriorDecorator.description:
你每次翻新时，在接下来6轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D112_YoungFarmer.name: Young Farmer
desc: Each time you use the __Major Improvement__ action space, you also get 1 <GRAIN> and, afterward, you can take a __Sow__ action.
D112_YoungFarmer.description:
你每次使用“主要发展”行动格时，你还获得1
，然后，你可以执行1次“播种”行动。

D113_FoodMerchant.name: Food Merchant
desc: For each <GRAIN> you harvest from a field, you can buy 1 <VEGETABLE> for 3 <FOOD>. If you harvest the last <GRAIN> from a field, the <VEGETABLE> costs you only 2 <FOOD>.
D113_FoodMerchant.description:
你每从农田收成1
，你可以用3
购买1
。如果你收成了农田的最后1个
，该
只花费你2个
。

D114_SeedTrader.name: Seed Trader
desc: Place 2 <GRAIN> and 2 <VEGETABLE> on this card. You can buy them at any time. Each <GRAIN> costs 2 <FOOD>; each <VEGETABLE> costs 3 <FOOD>.
D114_SeedTrader.description:
在本卡牌上放置2
和2
。你可以在任何时候购买它们。每个
花费2
；每个
花费3
。

D115_FodderPlanter.name: Fodder Planter
desc: In the breeding phase of each harvest, for each newborn animal you get, you can sow crops in exactly 1 field.
D115_FodderPlanter.description: 在每次收成的繁殖步骤中，你每获得1个新生动物，你可以在正好1个农田内播种作物。

D116_TreeInspector.name: Tree Inspector
desc: This card is a __1 <WOOD>__ accumulation space for you only. Each time the newly revealed action space card is a __Quarry__ accumulation space, you must discard all <WOOD> from this card.
D116_TreeInspector.description:
本卡牌是1个只有你能使用的“1
”累积格。每次新揭示的行动格卡牌是“采石场”累积格时，你必须丢弃本卡牌上所有的
。

D117_WoodExpert.name: Wood Expert
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <WOOD>. Each improvement costs you up to 2 <WOOD> less, if you pay 1 <FOOD> instead.
D117_WoodExpert.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得2
。对于每个发展的花费，你可以支付1
来少支付最多2
。

D118_Bonehead.name: Bonehead
desc: When you play this card, immediately place 6 <WOOD> on it. Immediately after each time you play a card from your hand, including this one, you get 1 <WOOD> from this card.
D118_Bonehead.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即在本卡牌上放置6
。你每次打出1张手牌后，包括本卡牌，立即从本卡牌上获得1
。

D119_WoodBarterer.name: Wood Barterer
desc: Each time before you use an action space with a __Build Fences__ or __Build Rooms__ action, you can choose to either get 2 <WOOD> or exchange up to 2 <WOOD> for 1 <REED> each.
D119_WoodBarterer.description:
你每次使用带有“建造栅栏”或“建造房间”行动的行动格前，你可以选择获得2
或用最多2
交换
，每个
换1
。

D120_ClayDeliveryman.name: Clay Deliveryman
desc: Place 1 <CLAY> on each remaining space for rounds 6 to 14. At the start of these rounds, you get the <CLAY>.
D120_ClayDeliveryman.description:
在第6至14轮中剩余轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

D121_ClayPlasterer.name: Clay Plasterer
desc: Renovating to clay only costs you exactly 1 <CLAY> and 1 <REED>. Each clay room only costs you 3 <CLAY> and 2 <REED> to build.
D121_ClayPlasterer.description:
翻新至砖土时你只需花费正好1
和1
。建造每个砖土房间时你只需花费正好3
和2
。

D122_ClayCarrier.name: Clay Carrier
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <CLAY>. At any time, but only once per round, you can buy 2 <CLAY> for 2 <FOOD>.
D122_ClayCarrier.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得2
。在任何时候但每轮仅限一次，你可以用2
购买2
。

D123_RenovationPreparer.name: Renovation Preparer
desc: For each new wood/clay room you build, you get 2 <CLAY>/2 <STONE>.
D123_RenovationPreparer.description:
你每建造1个新的木造/砖土房间，你获得2
/2
。

D124_Emissary.name: Emissary
desc: At any time, you can place a good from your supply on this card to get 1 <STONE>. You must place different goods on this card. (<FOOD> is also considered a good.)
D124_Emissary.description:
在任何时候，你可以从你的供应堆中拿取1个货物，放置在本卡牌上来获得1
。在本卡牌上你必须放置不同的货物(
也被视为货物)。

D125_ForestTrader.name: Forest Trader
desc: Each time you use a wood or clay accumulation space, you can also buy exactly 1 building resource. <WOOD>, <CLAY>, and <REED> cost 1 <FOOD> each; <STONE> costs 2 food.
D125_ForestTrader.description:
你每次使用木材或黏土累积格时，你还可以购买正好1个建造资源。每个
，
和
花费1
；
花费2
。

D126_FieldCultivator.name: Field Cultivator
desc: Pile 1 <WOOD>, 1 <CLAY>, 1 <REED>, 1 <STONE>, 1 <REED>, 1 <CLAY>, and 1 <WOOD> on this card. Each time you harvest a field tile, you can also take the top good from the pile.
D126_FieldCultivator.description:
在本卡牌上堆放
。你每次收成农田板块时，你还拿取该货物堆顶的1个货物。

D127_HardworkingMan.name: Hardworking Man
desc: This card is an action space for you only. If each other player has more rooms than you, it provides the __Day Laborer__, __Building Rooms__, and __Major Improvement__ actions (all three).
D127_HardworkingMan.description: 本卡牌是1个只有你能使用的行动格。如果其他每个玩家拥有的房间都比你多，本卡牌提供“临时工”、“建造房间”和“主要发展”行动(共计三个)。

D128_BuildingTycoon.name: Building Tycoon
desc: Each time after another player builds 1 or more rooms, you can give them 1 <FOOD> to build exactly 1 room yourself. (You must pay the building cost of the room.)
D128_BuildingTycoon.description:
每次有其他玩家建造1个或更多房间后，你可以给他们1个
来为你自己建造正好1个房间(你必须支付房间的建造费用)。

D129_LumberVirtuoso.name: Lumber Virtuoso
desc: Each harvest in which you have at least 5 <WOOD> in your supply, you can discard down to 5 <WOOD> to take a __Build Stables__ or __Build Wood Rooms__ action by paying the usual costs.
D129_LumberVirtuoso.description:
每次收成中，如果你的供应堆中有至少5
，你可以丢弃
至5个来执行1次“建造畜棚”或“建造木造房间”行动
(需支付正常花费)。

D130_RecreationalCarpenter.name: Recreational Carpenter
desc: At the end of each work phase in which you did not use the __Meeting Place__ action space, you can take a __Build Rooms__ action without placing a person.
D130_RecreationalCarpenter.description: 在每个你没有使用“广场”行动格的工作阶段结束时，你可以执行1次“建造房间”行动且无需放置家庭成员。

D131_CraftsmanshipPromoter.name: Craftsmanship Promoter
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <STONE>. You can build any of the major improvements in the bottom row of the supply board even when taking a __Minor Improvement__ action.
D131_CraftsmanshipPromoter.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得1
。你在执行“次要发展”行动时，可以建造供应堆板块底下一行的任意主要发展。

D132_HideFarmer.name: Hide Farmer
desc: During scoring, you can pay 1 <FOOD> each for any number of unused farmyard spaces. You do not lose points for these spaces.
D132_HideFarmer.description:
游戏结束计分时，你每有1个未使用的农场格子，你可以支付1
。如果你这么做，你不会由于你支付
的这些格子失去分数。

D133_BeerTentOperator.name: Beer Tent Operator
desc: In the feeding phase of each harvest, you can use this card to turn 1 <WOOD> plus 1 <GRAIN> into 1 bonus <SCORE> and 2 <FOOD>.
D133_BeerTentOperator.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤中，你可以使用本卡牌来将1
和1
转化成1点奖励
和
。

D134_OysterEater.name: Oyster Eater
desc: Each time the __Fishing__ accumulation space is used, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> and must skip placing your next person that round. (You can place the person on a later turn.)
D134_OysterEater.description:
每当“钓鱼”累积格被使用时，你获得1点奖励
且在该轮中你必须跳过放置你的下一名家庭成员(你可以在之后的回合放置该家庭成员)。

D135_GardeningHeadOfficial.name: Gardening Head Official
desc: If there are still 3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with the most vegetables in their fields gets 2 bonus <SCORE>.
D135_GardeningHeadOfficial.description:
如果距离游戏结束仍然有3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立即获得2/3/4
。游戏结束计分时，每位在农田拥有最多蔬菜的玩家获得2点奖励
。

D136_AnimalActivist.name: Animal Activist
desc: If there are still 3/6/9 complete rounds left to play, you immediately get 2/3/4 <WOOD>. During scoring, each player with the most fenced stables gets 2 bonus <SCORE>.
D136_AnimalActivist.description:
如果距离游戏结束仍然有3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立即获得2/3/4
。游戏结束计分时，每位拥有最多在牧场内畜棚的玩家获得2点奖励
。

D137_TradeTeacher.name: Trade Teacher
desc: Each time after you use a __Lesson__ action space, you can buy up to 2 different goods: <GRAIN>, <STONE>, <SHEEP>, and <PIG> for 1 <FOOD> each; <CATTLE> and <VEGETABLE> for 2 food each.
D137_TradeTeacher.description:
你每次使用“职业训练”行动格后，你可以购买2种不同的货物：
、
、
、
每个花费1
；
和
每个花费2
。

D138_PetLover.name: Pet Lover
desc: Each time you use an accumulation space providing exactly 1 animal, you can leave it on the space and get one from the general supply instead, as well as 3 <FOOD> and 1 <GRAIN>.
D138_PetLover.description:
你每次使用提供正好1个动物的累积格时，你可以将动物留在格子上，改为从公共供应堆中拿取，同时获得3
和1
。

D139_Chairman.name: Chairman
desc: Each time another player uses the __Meeting Place__ action space, both they and you get 1 <FOOD> (before taking the actions). If you use it, you get 1 <FOOD>.
D139_Chairman.description:
每次有其他玩家使用“广场”行动格时，你和该玩家获得1
(在执行行动之前)。如果你使用“广场”，你获得1
。

D140_Loudmouth.name: Loudmouth
desc: Each time you take at least 4 building resources or 4 animals from an accumulation space, you also get 1 <FOOD>.
D140_Loudmouth.description:
你每次从一个累积格上拿取至少4个建造资源或4个动物时，你还获得1
。

D141_SeedSeller.name: Seed Seller
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <GRAIN>. Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you get 1 additional <GRAIN>.
D141_SeedSeller.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，你额外获得1
。

D142_PotatoPlanter.name: Potato Planter
desc: At the end of each work phase in which you occupy the __Clay Pit__ or __Reed Bank__ accumulation space while the respective other is unoccupied, you get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
D142_PotatoPlanter.description:
在每个你占用“黏土坑”或“芦苇池”累积格之一且另一个未被占据的工作阶段结束时，你获得1
。

D143_TreeCutter.name: Tree Cutter
desc: Each time you use an accumulation space providing at least 3 goods of the same type except <WOOD>, you get an additional 1 <WOOD>. (<FOOD> is also considered a good.)
D143_TreeCutter.description:
你每次使用提供至少3个同类货物(除
外)的累积格时，你获得额外1个
(
也被视为货物)。

D144_WaterWorker.name: Water Worker
desc: Each time after you use any of the __Fishing__, __Reed Bank__, __Day Laborer__ spaces or the action space of round 4, you get 1 additional <REED>.
D144_WaterWorker.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”累积格或其3个竖直或水平相邻的行动格之一时，你获得额外1
。

D145_RoofExaminer.name: Roof Examiner
desc: When you play this card, if you have 1/2/3/4 major improvements, you immediately get 2/3/4/5 <REED>.
D145_RoofExaminer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，如果你有1/2/3/4个主要发展，你立即获得2/3/4/5
。

D146_Porter.name: Porter
desc: Each time you take at least 4 of the same building resource from an accumulation space, you get 1 additional building resource of the accumulating type and 1 <FOOD>
D146_Porter.description:
你每次从一个累积格中拿取至少4个相同建造资源时，你额外获得该累积格类型的1个建造资源和1个
。

D147_TrapBuilder.name: Trap Builder
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, place 1 <FOOD>, 1 <FOOD>, and 1 <PIG> on the next 3 round spaces, respectively. At the start of these rounds, you get the good.
D147_TrapBuilder.description:
你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，在接下来3轮的轮次格上依次对应放置1
、1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的货物。

D148_DomesticianExpert.name: Domestician Expert
desc: You can keep 2 sheep on the border between each pair of orthogonally adjacent rooms.
D148_DomesticianExpert.description:
你可以在每对竖直或水平相邻的房间中间的边线处容纳2
。

D149_CasualWorker.name: Casual Worker
desc: Each time another player uses a __Quarry__ accumulation space, you can choose to get 1 <FOOD> or build a stable without paying wood.
D149_CasualWorker.description:
每次有其他玩家使用“采石场”累积格时，你可以选择获得1
或无需支付
建造1个畜棚。

D150_GodlySpouse.name: Godly Spouse
desc: Each time you take a __Family Growth__ action with the second person you place in a round, return the first person you placed home, unless it is on the __Meeting Place__ action space.
D150_GodlySpouse.description: 你每次用本轮放置的第2名家庭成员执行“家庭增长”行动时，你可以让第1个家庭成员回家。

D151_SpinDoctor.name: Spin Doctor
desc: Immediately after each time you use the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space, you can place another person on an action space of your choice, regardless whether or not the action space is occupied.
D151_SpinDoctor.description: 你每次使用“卖艺”累积格后，你可以立即将另一名家庭成员放置到任意行动格上，无论该行动格是否被占据。

D152_Patron.name: Patron
desc: Immediately before each time you play an occupation after this one (even before paying the occupation cost), you get 2 <FOOD>.
D152_Patron.description:
打出本卡牌后，你每次打出职业卡牌前(甚至在支付职业花费前)，你立即获得2
。

D153_WealthyMan.name: Wealthy Man
desc: At the start of each of the 1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th/6th harvest, if you have at least 1/2/3/4/5/6 grain fields, you get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
D153_WealthyMan.description:
在第1/2/3/4/5/6次收成开始时，如果你拥有至少1/2/3/4/5/6个谷物农田，你获得1点奖励
。

D154_ChimneySweep.name: Chimney Sweep
desc: Renovating to stone costs you 2 <STONE> less. During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each other player living in a stone house.
D154_ChimneySweep.description:
翻新到石造时，你少花费2
。游戏结束计分时，每有一个其他玩家住在石造房屋内，你获得1点奖励
。

D155_Ebonist.name: Ebonist
desc: Each harvest, you can use this card to turn exactly 1 <WOOD> into 1 <FOOD> and 1 <GRAIN>.
D155_Ebonist.description:
每次收成，你可以使用本卡牌来将正好1
转化成1
和1
。

D156_RetailDealer.name: Retail Dealer
desc: Place 3 <GRAIN> and 3 <FOOD> on this card. Each time you use the __Resource Market__ action space, you also get 1 <GRAIN> and 1 <FOOD> from this card.
D156_RetailDealer.description:
在本卡牌上放置3
和3
。你每次使用“资源市场”行动格时，你还从本卡牌上获得1
和1
。

D157_PartyOrganizer.name: Party Organizer
desc: As soon as the next player but you gains their 5th person, you immediately get 8 <FOOD> (not retroactively). During scoring, if only you have 5 people, you get 3 bonus <SCORE>.
D157_PartyOrganizer.description:
当除了你之外的下一位玩家获得第五个家庭成员时，你立即获得8
(不追溯)。
游戏结束计分时，如果只有你拥有5个家庭成员，你获得3点奖励
。

D158_BeanCounter.name: Bean Counter
desc: Each time you use an action space on round spaces 1 to 8, place 1 <FOOD> on this card. Each time this cards has 3 <FOOD> on it, move the <FOOD> to your supply.
D158_BeanCounter.description:
你每次使用第1至8轮的轮次格上的行动格时，在本卡牌上放置1
。每当本卡牌上有3
，将这些
移至你的供应堆。

D159_ReedSeller.name: Reed Seller
desc: At any time, you can turn 1 <REED> into 3 <FOOD>. Any other player can prevent this by buying the <REED> for 2 <FOOD> from you. If multiple players are interested, choose one.
D159_ReedSeller.description:
在任何时候，你可以将1
转化成3
。任何其他玩家都可以通过用2
向你购买该
来阻止本效果。如果多位玩家想要购买，你选择一位。

D160_Midwife.name: Midwife
desc: Each time another player uses the first person they place in a round to take a __Family Growth__ action, you get 1 <GRAIN> from the general supply.
D160_Midwife.description:
每次有其他玩家用其本轮放置的第1名家庭成员执行“家庭增长”行动时，你从公共供应堆中获得1
。

D161_CabbageBuyer.name: Cabbage Buyer
desc: Each time any player (including you) renovates and the builds no/ 1 minor/ 1 major improvement, you can buy 1 <VEGETABLE> for 3/2/1 <FOOD>.
D161_CabbageBuyer.description:
每次有任意玩家(包括你自己)翻新并建造0个/1个次要/1个主要发展时，你可以用3/2/1/
购买1
。

D162_ClayFirer.name: Clay Firer
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <CLAY>. At any time, you can turn <CLAY> into <STONE>: you get 1 <STONE> for 2 <CLAY>, and 2 <STONE> for 3 <CLAY>.
D162_ClayFirer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得2
。在任何时候，你可以将2/3
转化成1/2
。

D163_JourneymanBricklayer.name: Journeyman Bricklayer
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 2 <STONE>. Each time another player renovates to stone or builds a stone room, you get 1 <STONE>.
D163_JourneymanBricklayer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得2
。每有其他玩家翻新到石造或建造石造房间时，你获得1
。

D164_PetGrower.name: Pet Grower
desc: Each time you use an animal accumulation space, if afterward you have no animal in your house, you also get 1 <SHEEP>.
D164_PetGrower.description:
你每次使用动物累积格时，然后如果你的房屋内没有动物，你还获得1
。

D165_PigStalker.name: Pig Stalker
desc: UPDATED: Each time you use an animal accumulation space, you get an additional 1 <PIG> if you occupy a Round 1-14 action space which is immediately to the left or right of that accumulation space.
D165_PigStalker.description:
你每次使用动物累积格时，如果你已占据该累积格上方或下方紧靠的行动格，你还获得1
。

D166_StableMilker.name: Stable Milker
desc: Each time you build at least 2 stables on the same turn, you also get 1 <CATTLE>.
D166_StableMilker.description:
你每次在同一回合中建造至少2个畜棚时，你还获得1
。

D167_PureBreeder.name: Pure Breeder
desc: You immediately get 1 <WOOD>. After each round that does not end with a harvest, you can breed exactly one type of animal. (This is not considered a breeding phase.)
D167_PureBreeder.description:
你立即获得1
。每个不以收成结束的轮次结束后，你可以使正好1种动物进行繁殖。(这不视为繁殖步骤)。

D168_Stockman.name: Stockman
desc: When you build your 2nd/3rd/4th stable, you immediately get 1 <CATTLE>/<PIG>/<SHEEP>, even if built on the same turn (but not retroactively).
D168_Stockman.description:
当你建造你的第2/3/4个畜棚时，你立即获得1
/
/
，即使是在同一回合建造(不追溯)。

E1_PoleBarns.name: Pole Barns
desc: You can immediately build up to 3 stables at no cost. (You must pay the cost of this card though.)
E1_PoleBarns.description: 你可以立即免费建造最多3个畜棚。(但你必须支付本卡牌的花费。)

E2_RenovationMaterials.name: Renovation Materials
desc: Immediately renovate to clay at no cost. (You must pay the cost of this card though.)
E2_RenovationMaterials.description: 立即免费翻新为砖土。(但你必须支付本卡牌的花费。)

E3_TeaTime.name: Tea Time
desc: Immediately return your person on the __Grain Utilization__ action space home; you can place it again later this round.
E3_TeaTime.description: 立即让你在“谷物运用”行动格上的家庭成员回家，在本轮后续中你可以再次放置它。

E4_Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
desc: Immediately remove all <GRAIN> from one of your fields to the general supply. Gain 2 <WOOD> for each <GRAIN> you just removed.
E4_Thunderbolt.description:
立即移除你的一个农田中所有的
，并将它们移动到公共供应堆。每因此效果移除了一个
，获得2
。

E5_NightLoot.name: Night Loot
desc: Immediately remove 2 different building resources total from accumulation spaces and place them in your supply.
E5_NightLoot.description: 立即从累积格移除正好2个不同的建造资源，并将它们放置到你的供应堆。

E6_Recount.name: Recount
desc: You immediately get 1 building resource of each type of which you have 4 or more resources in your supply already.
E6_Recount.description: 你立即获得自己供应堆中已有至少4个的每种建造资源各1个。

E7_Pumpernickel.name: Pumpernickel
desc: You immediately get 4 <FOOD>. (Effectively, you are turning 1 <GRAIN> into 4 <FOOD>.)
E7_Pumpernickel.description:
你立即获得4
。(此卡牌效果等同于将1
转化为4
。)

E8_FarmersMarket.name: Farmers Market
desc: You immediately get 1 <VEGETABLE>. (Effectively, you are buying 1 <VEGETABLE> for 2 <FOOD>.)
E8_FarmersMarket.description:
你立即获得1
。(此卡牌效果等同于用2
购买1
。)

E9_BarteringHut.name: Bartering Hut
desc: Up to two times: Immediately spend any 2/3/4 building resources for 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE> from the general supply.
E9_BarteringHut.description:
最多两次：立即花费任意2/3/4个建造资源，从公共供应堆获得1
/
/
。

E10_StrawHat.name: Straw Hat
desc: At the end of the work phases of rounds 3 and 6, you can move your person from the __Farmland__ action space to an unoccupied action space and take that action, or get 1 <FOOD>.
E10_StrawHat.description:
在第3轮和第6轮的工作阶段结束时，你可以将自己的家庭成员从“犁田”行动格移动到一个未被占据的行动格并执行该格上的行动，或获得1
。

E11_PettingZoo.name: Petting Zoo
desc: As long as you have a pasture orthogonally adjacent to your house, you can keep animals of any type on this card, up to the number of rooms in your house.
E11_PettingZoo.description: 只要你有牧场和自己的房屋垂直/水平相邻，你就可以在本卡牌上保留任何种类的动物，数量最多等于你房屋中的房间数量。

E12_AnimalBedding.name: Animal Bedding
desc: You can keep 1 additional animal (of the same type) in each of your unfenced stables, and 2 additional animals (of the same type) in each pasture with stable.
E12_AnimalBedding.description: 你可以在自己的每个牧场外畜棚中额外安置1个(相同种类的)动物，并在每个有畜棚的牧场中额外安置2个(相同种类的)动物。

E13_StoneHouseReconstruction.name: Stone House Reconstruction
desc: At any time, you can renovate your clay house to a stone house without placing a person. (You must pay the normal renovation cost.)
E13_StoneHouseReconstruction.description: 在任何时候，你可以将自己的砖土房屋翻新为石造房屋且无需放置家庭成员。(你必须支付正常的翻新花费。)

E14_WoodSaw.name: Wood Saw
desc: Each time all other players have more people than you, you can take a __Build Rooms__ action without placing a person.
E14_WoodSaw.description: 每次所有其他玩家的家庭成员都多于你的家庭成员时，你可以执行一次“建造房间”行动，无需放置家庭成员。

E15_NailBasket.name: Nail Basket
desc: Each time after you use a wood accumulation space, you can place 1 <STONE> from your supply on that space (for the next visitor) to take a __Build Fences__ action.
E15_NailBasket.description:
每次你使用木材累积格后，你可以从你供应堆中将1
放置在该格上(给下一位来访者)，来执行一次“建造栅栏”行动。

E16_BriarHedge.name: Briar Hedge
desc: You do not need to pay wood for fences that you build on the edge of your farmyard board.
E16_BriarHedge.description:
你无需为你建造在自己农场版图边界上的栅栏支付
。

E17_SkimmerPlow.name: Skimmer Plow
desc: Each time you use the __Farmland__ or __Cultivation__  action space, you can plow 2 fields instead of 1. Each time you sow, you must place 1 fewer good on each field you sow.
E17_SkimmerPlow.description: 每当你使用“犁田”或“耕种”行动格时，你可以不犁1块田，改为犁2块田。你每次播种时，必须在播种的每块农田上少放置1个货物。

E18_SeedAlmanac.name: Seed Almanac
desc: Each time after you play a minor improvement after this one, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to plow 1 field.
E18_SeedAlmanac.description:
在打出本卡牌后，每当你打出一个次要发展时，你可以支付1
来犁1块田。

E19_OxGoad.name: Ox Goad
desc: Each time after you use the __Cattle Market__ accumulation space, you can pay 2 <FOOD> to plow 1 field.
E19_OxGoad.description:
每当你使用“牛市”累积格后，你可以支付2
来犁1块田。

E20_IronHoe.name: Iron Hoe
desc: At the end of each work phase, if you occupy both the __Grain Seeds__ and __Vegetable Seeds__ action spaces, you can plow 1 field.
E20_IronHoe.description: 在每个工作阶段结束时，如果你占用了“谷物种子”和 “蔬菜种子”行动格，你可以犁1块田。

E21_SheepRug.name: Sheep Rug
desc: You can use any __Wish for Children__ action space, even if it is occupied by another player's person.
E21_SheepRug.description: 你可以使用任何一个“增加家庭成员”行动格，即使该格上已有其他玩家的家庭成员。

E22_GuestRoom.name: Guest Room
desc: Immediately place any amount of <FOOD> from your supply on this card. Once per round, you can discard 1 <FOOD> from this card to place a person from your supply in that round.
E22_GuestRoom.description:
立即从你的供应堆放置任意数量的
到本卡牌上。每轮仅限一次，你可以从本卡牌上丢弃1
，来在该轮内从你的供应堆中放置一个家庭成员。

E23_Apiary.name: Apiary
desc: At the end of each work phase, you can sow exactly 1 crop on 1 field.
E23_Apiary.description: 在每个工作阶段结束时，你可以在1块农田上播种正好1个作物。

E24_Ambition.name: Ambition
desc: Each time you get a __Minor Improvement__ action on an action space, you can build a major improvement instead of playing a minor one.
E24_Ambition.description: 每次你在行动格上获得一个“次要发展”行动时，你可以不打出一个次要发展，改为建造一个主要发展。

E25_BumperCrop.name: Bumper Crop
desc: When you play this card, immediately play the field phase of the harvest on your farmyard only.
E25_BumperCrop.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，立即只在你的农场中执行收成的收割步骤。。

E26_Sundial.name: Sundial
desc: At the end of the work phases of rounds 7 and 9, you can take a __Sow__ action without placing a person.
E26_Sundial.description: 在第7轮和第8轮的工作阶段结束时，你可以执行一次“播种”行动，无需放置家庭成员。

E27_PiggyBank.name: Piggy Bank
desc: At the end of each work phase, you can place 1 <FOOD> on this card, irretrievably. At any time, you can discard 6 <FOOD> from this card to build a major improvement at no cost.
E27_PiggyBank.description:
在每个工作阶段结束时，你可以在本卡牌上放置1
(无法再取回)。在任何时候，你都可以从本卡牌上丢弃6
来免费建造一个主要发展。

E28_Bookmark.name: Bookmark
desc: Add 3 to the current round and mark the corresponding round space. At the start of that round, you can play 1 occupation without paying an occupation cost.
E28_Bookmark.description: 在当前的轮数上加3，并标记对应的轮次格。在该轮开始时，你可以打出1张职业卡牌，且无需支付职业花费。

E29_Heirloom.name: Heirloom
desc: (This card has no additional effect.)

E30_ChildsToy.name: Child's Toy
desc: During the feeding phase of each harvest, your newborns require 2 <FOOD> (instead of 1).
E30_ChildsToy.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤期间，你的新生儿需要2
(而不是1个)。

E31_Upholstery.name: Upholstery
desc: Each time you build or play an improvement after this one, you can place 1 <REED> on this card, irretrievably, to get 1 bonus <SCORE>, up to the number of rooms in your house.
E31_Upholstery.description:
在打出本卡牌后，每当你建造或打出一个发展时，你可以在本卡牌上放置1
(无法再取回)来获得1点奖励
，数量最多等于你房屋中房间的数量。

E32_Nave.name: Nave
desc: During scoring, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each of the 5 columns of your farmyard board containing at least one room.
E32_Nave.description:
游戏结束计分时，你农场版图上每有1个含有至少一个房间的竖列，你获得1点奖励
。

E33_BeaverColony.name: Beaver Colony
desc: From now on, one of your pastures with stable cannot hold animals. Each time you get <REED> from an action space, you get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
E33_BeaverColony.description:
从现在起，你的一个有畜棚的牧场不能容纳动物。每当你从行动格获得
时，你获得1点奖励
。

E34_LandRegister.name: Land Register
desc: During scoring, if your farm has no unused spaces, you get 2 bonus <SCORE>.
E34_LandRegister.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你的农场中没有未使用的空地，你获得2点奖励
。

E35_Misanthropy.name: Misanthropy
desc: During scoring, if you have exactly 4/3/2 people, you get 2/3/5 bonus <SCORE>.
E35_Misanthropy.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你有正好4/3/2个家庭成员，你获得2/3/5点奖励
。

E36_HerbalGarden.name: Herbal Garden
desc: From now on, at least one of your pastures must contain no animals.
E36_HerbalGarden.description: 从现在起，你必须有至少一个没有容纳动物的牧场。

E37_OxSkull.name: Ox Skull
desc: During scoring, if you have no <CATTLE>, you get 3 bonus <SCORE>.
E37_OxSkull.description:
游戏结束计分时，如果你没有
，你获得3点奖励
。

E38_RodCollection.name: Rod Collection
desc: Each time you use __Fishing__, you can place up to 2 <WOOD> on this card, irretrievably. During scoring, each such <WOOD> is worth 1 bonus <SCORE>, except the 1st, 4th, 7th, and 10th.
E38_RodCollection.description:
每当你使用“钓鱼”时，你可以在本卡牌上放置最多2
(无法再取回)。游戏结束计分时，除放置的第1、第4、第7和第10
外，每个此类
价值1点奖励
。

E39_Paintbrush.name: Paintbrush
desc: Each harvest, you can exchange exactly 1 <CLAY> for your choice of 2 <FOOD> or 1 bonus <SCORE>.
E39_Paintbrush.description:
每次收成，你可以用正好1
交换2
或1点奖励
(由你选择)。

E40_BeeStatue.name: Bee Statue
desc: Pile (from bottom to top) 1 <VEGETABLE>, 1 <STONE>, 1 <GRAIN>, 1 <STONE>, 1 <GRAIN> on this card. Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you get the top good.
E40_BeeStatue.description:
将
(从下往上)叠放在本卡牌上。你每次使用“临时工”行动格时，你获得本卡牌最顶上的一个货物。

E41_MuddyWaters.name: Muddy Waters
desc: Alternate placing 1 <FOOD> and 1 <CLAY> on each remaining even-numbered round space, starting with <FOOD>. At the start of these rounds, you get the respective good.
E41_MuddyWaters.description:
从
开始，在剩余的每个偶数轮次格上交替放置1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取相应的货物。

E42_WaterGully.name: Water Gully
desc: Place 1 <CATTLE>, 1 <GRAIN>, and 1 <CATTLE> on the next 3 round spaces (in that order). At the start of these rounds, you get the respective good.
E42_WaterGully.description:
在接下来3轮的轮次格上依次放置1
、1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取相应的货物。

E43_BarnCats.name: Barn Cats
desc: If you have 1/2/3/4 stables, place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 2/3/4/5 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
E43_BarnCats.description:
如果你有1/2/3/4个畜棚，在接下来的2/3/4/5轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E44_FodderBeets.name: Fodder Beets
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining odd-numbered round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
E44_FodderBeets.description:
在剩余的每个奇数轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E45_FruitLadder.name: Fruit Ladder
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining even-numbered round space. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
E45_FruitLadder.description:
在剩余的每个偶数轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E46_WaterlilyPond.name: Waterlily Pond
desc: Place 1 <FOOD> on each of the next 2 round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.
E46_WaterlilyPond.description:
在接下来2轮的轮次格上各放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E47_SyrupTap.name: Syrup Tap
desc: Each time you get at least 1 <WOOD> from an action space, place 1 <FOOD> on the next round space. At the start of that round, you get the <FOOD>.
E47_SyrupTap.description:
每当你从行动格获得至少1
时，在接下来1轮的轮次格上放置1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E48_TownHall.name: Town Hall
desc: In the feeding phase of each harvest, if you live in a clay or stone house, you get 1 or 2 <FOOD>, respectively.
E48_TownHall.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤中，如果你住在砖土或石造房屋中，你相应地获得1或2
。

E49_Twibil.name: Twibil
desc: Each time after any player (including you) builds at least 1 wood room, you get 1 <FOOD>.
E49_Twibil.description:
每次在任意玩家(包括你自己)建造至少1个木造房间后，你获得1
。

E50_WildGreens.name: Wild Greens
desc: Each time you sow, you get 1 <FOOD> for every different type of good that you sow.
E50_WildGreens.description:
每当你播种时，你每播种一种不同种类的货物，你获得1
。

E51_WhaleOil.name: Whale Oil
desc: Each time you use __Fishing__, place 1 <FOOD> from the general supply on this card. Each time before you play an occupation, you get <FOOD> equal to the amount on this card.
E51_WhaleOil.description:
你每次使用“钓鱼”时，从公共供应堆将1
放置在本卡牌上。每次你打出职业卡牌前，你获得等于本卡牌上
数量的
。

E52_Cubbyhole.name: Cubbyhole
desc: For each room that you add to your house, place 1 <FOOD> from the general supply on this card. At the start of each feeding phase, you get <FOOD> equal to the amount on this card.
E52_Cubbyhole.description:
你每在自己的房屋中增设一个房间，从公共供应堆将1
放置在本卡牌上。在每个供养步骤开始时，你获得等于本卡牌上
数量的
。

E53_BoarSpear.name: Boar Spear
desc: Each time you get at least 1 <PIG> outside of the breeding phase of a harvest, you can immediately turn them into 4 <FOOD> each.
E53_BoarSpear.description:
每当你在收成的繁殖步骤之外获得至少1
，你可以立即将每个这种
转化为4
。

E54_Contraband.name: Contraband
desc: Each time you play or build an improvement after this, you can pay 1 additional building resource of a type in the printed cost to get 3 <FOOD>.
E54_Contraband.description:
在打出本卡牌后，每当你打出或建造一个发展时，你可以支付额外1个建造资源(其种类为该发展卡面花费的种类之一)，来获得3
。

E55_StoneWeir.name: Stone Weir
desc: Each time you use the __Fishing__ accumulation space, if there are 0/1/2/3 <FOOD> on the space, you get an additional 4/3/2/1 <FOOD> from the general supply.
E55_StoneWeir.description:
每次你使用“钓鱼”累积格时，如果该格上有0/1/2/3
，你从公共供应堆获得额外4/3/2/1
。

E56_RomanPot.name: Roman Pot
desc: Place 4 <FOOD> from the general supply on this card. At the start of each work phase, if you are the last player in turn order, move 1 <FOOD> from this card to your supply.
E56_RomanPot.description:
从公共供应堆将4
放置在本卡牌上。在每个工作阶段开始时，如果你是回合顺序中的最后一位玩家，从本卡牌上将1
移动到你的供应堆。

E57_CheeseFondue.name: Cheese Fondue
desc: Each time you bake at least 1 <GRAIN> into bread, you get 1 additional <FOOD> if you have at least 1 <SHEEP> and (another) 1 additional <FOOD> if you have at least 1 <CATTLE>.
E57_CheeseFondue.description:
每次你将至少1
烤成面包时，如果你有至少1
，额外获得1
；并且/或者如果你有至少1
，再额外获得1
。

E58_LunchtimeBeer.name: Lunchtime Beer
desc: At the start of each harvest, you can choose to skip the field and breeding phase of that harvest and get exactly 1 <FOOD> instead.
E58_LunchtimeBeer.description:
在每次收成开始时，你可以选择跳过该次收成的收割和繁殖步骤，并改为获得正好1
。

E59_CombandCutter.name: Comb and Cutter
desc: Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you get 1 additional <FOOD> for each <SHEEP> on the __Sheep Market__ accumulation space, up to a maximum of 4 additional <FOOD>.
E59_CombandCutter.description:
每次你使用“临时工”行动格时，每有一个
在“羊市”累积格上，你额外获得1
(最多为4)。

E60_WorkingGloves.name: Working Gloves
desc: When you play this card, you get 1 <FOOD>. Each time you pay an occupation cost, you can pay 1 building resource of your choice in place of (up to) 2 <FOOD>.
E60_WorkingGloves.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你获得1
。每当你支付职业花费时，你可以支付任意1个建造资源来代替(最多)2
。

E61_RaisedBed.name: Raised Bed
desc: At the start of each harvest, you get 4 <FOOD>.
E61_RaisedBed.description:
在每次收成开始时，你获得4
。

E62_SourDough.name: Sour Dough
desc: Once per round, if all players have at least 1 person left to place, you can skip placing a person and take a __Bake Bread__ action instead.
E62_SourDough.description: 每轮仅限一次，如果所有玩家都还有至少1个可以放置的家庭成员，你可以跳过放置家庭成员并改为执行一次“烤面包”行动。

E63_IronOven.name: Iron Oven
desc: [__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW-1X> 6<FOOD>
When you play this card, you can immediately take a __Bake Bread__ action.
E63_IronOven.description:
“烤面包”行动：
6
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即执行一次“烤面包”行动。

E64_SimpleOven.name: Simple Oven
desc: [__Bake Bread__ action:]
<GRAIN> <ARROW-1X> 3<FOOD>
When you play this card, you can immediately take a __Bake Bread__ action.
E64_SimpleOven.description:
“烤面包”行动：
3
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即执行一次“烤面包”行动。

E65_Almsbag.name: Almsbag
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <GRAIN> for every 2 completed rounds.
E65_Almsbag.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，每有2个已完成的轮次，你立即获得1
。

E66_BarnShed.name: Barn Shed
desc: Each time another player (or, in a solo game, you) uses the __Forest__ accumulation space, you get 1 <GRAIN>.
E66_BarnShed.description:
每当其他玩家(或在单人游戏中，你) 使用“森林”累积格，你获得1
。

E67_GrainBag.name: Grain Bag
desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you get 1 additional <GRAIN> for each <BAKE>-improvement you have.
E67_GrainBag.description:
你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，你每有一个
发展，额外获得1
。

E68_CherryOrchard.name: Cherry Orchard
desc: This card is a field on which you can only sow and harvest wood as you would grain. Each time you harvest the last <WOOD> from this card, you also get 1 <VEGETABLE>.
E68_CherryOrchard.description:
本卡牌是1块只能种植
的农田。在本卡牌上，
能像
一样被播种和收成。每当你从本卡牌上收获了最后一个
时，你还获得1
。

E69_MelonPatch.name: Melon Patch
desc: This card is a field that can only grow vegetables. Each time you harvest the last <VEGETABLE> from this card, you can plow 1 field.
E69_MelonPatch.description:
本卡牌是1块农田，但只能种植
。每当你从本卡牌上收获了最后一个
时，你可以犁1块田。

E70_CropRotationField.name: Crop Rotation Field
desc: This card is a field. Each time you remove the last <GRAIN> or <VEGETABLE> from this card, you can immediately sow <VEGETABLE> or <GRAIN> on this card, respectively.
E70_CropRotationField.description:
本卡牌是1块农田。每当你从本卡牌上移除了最后一个
或
时，你可以立即相应地在本卡牌上播种
或
。

E71_CowPatty.name: Cow Patty
desc: Each time you sow in a field that is orthogonally adjacent to a pasture, you can place 1 additional good of the planted type in it.
E71_CowPatty.description: 每当你在1块和牧场垂直/水平相邻的农田播种，你可以在该农田额外放置1个对应种类的货物。

E72_ArtichokeField.name: Artichoke Field
desc: This card is a field. During the field phase of each harvest, if you harvest at least 1 good from this card, you also get 1 <FOOD>.
E72_ArtichokeField.description:
本卡牌是1块农田。在每次收成的收割步骤期间，如果你从本卡牌上收获了至少1个货物，你还获得1
。

E73_Scythe.name: Scythe
desc: During the field phase of each harvest, you can select exactly one of your fields and harvest all the crops planted in it.
E73_Scythe.description: 在每次收成的收割步骤期间，你可以选择正好1块你的农田，并收获其中所有已播种的作物。

E74_AshTrees.name: Ash Trees
desc: When you play this card, immediately place (up to) 5 fences from your supply on it. When you build fences, fences taken from this card cost you nothing.
E74_AshTrees.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，立即从你的供应堆中放置(最多)5个栅栏到本卡牌上。当你建造栅栏时，从本卡牌上拿取的栅栏无需花费。

E75_StoneAxe.name: Stone Axe
desc: Each time you use a wood accumulation space, you can return 1 <STONE> to the general supply to get an additional 3 <WOOD>.
E75_StoneAxe.description:
每当你使用一个木材累积格时，你可以将1
归还到公共供应堆中来获得额外3
。

E76_LumberPile.name: Lumber Pile
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately return up to 3 <STABLE> from your farmyard board to your supply and get 3 <WOOD> for each.
E76_LumberPile.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即从你的农场版图上将3个畜棚归还到你的供应堆中，每归还一个畜棚获得3
。

E77_Mattock.name: Mattock
desc: Each time you get <REED> and/or <STONE> from an action space, you get 1 additional <CLAY>.
E77_Mattock.description:
每当你从行动格获得
和/或
时，你获得额外1
。

E78_SleightofHand.name: Sleight of Hand
desc: When you play this card, you can immediately exchange up to 4 building resources for an equal number of other building resources.
E78_SleightofHand.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即用最多4个建造资源交换相同数量的其他建造资源。

E79_FieldSpade.name: Field Spade
desc: Each time after you sow in at least 1 field, you get 1 <STONE>.
E79_FieldSpade.description:
每当你在至少1块农田上播种后，你获得1
。

E80_RockGarden.name: Rock Garden
desc: You can only plant <STONE> on this card. Plant as though it were 3 fields, but it is considered 1 field. Sow and harvest <STONE> on this card as you would vegetables.
E80_RockGarden.description:
你可以将本卡牌当做3个只能种植
的农田，但只能视为1个农田。在本卡牌上，
能像蔬菜一样被播种和收成。

E81_AlchemistsLab.name: Alchemists Lab
desc: This card is an action space for all. A player who uses it gets 1 building resource of each type they already have. If another player uses it, they must first pay you 1 <FOOD>.
E81_AlchemistsLab.description:
本卡牌是一个所有玩家都能使用的行动格。使用它的玩家每已有一种建造资源，获得1个该种类的建造资源。如果其他玩家使用它，其必须先支付给你1
。

E82_Profiteering.name: Profiteering
desc: When you play this card, you immediately get 1 <FOOD>. Each time you use the __Day Laborer__ action space, you can exchange 1 building resource for another building resource.
E82_Profiteering.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，立即获得1
。你每次使用“临时工”行动格后，你可以用1个建造资源交换1个不同的建造资源。

E83_ShepherdsWhistle.name: Shepherd's Whistle
desc: At the start of the breeding phase of each harvest, if you have at least 1 unfenced stable without an animal, you get 1 <SHEEP>.
E83_ShepherdsWhistle.description:
在每次收成的繁殖步骤开始时，如果你有至少1个没有动物的牧场外畜棚，你获得1
。

E84_DollysMother.name: Dolly's Mother
desc: You only require 1 <SHEEP> to breed sheep during the breeding phase of a harvest. This card can hold 1 <SHEEP>.
E84_DollysMother.description:
在收成的繁殖步骤期间，你只需要1
来繁殖
。本卡牌可以容纳1
。

E85_MasterTanner.name: Master Tanner
desc: For each <PIG> or <CATTLE> you turn into <FOOD>, you can place 1 of that <FOOD> on this card. While its <FOOD> equals your number of rooms, this card provides room for 1 person.
E85_MasterTanner.description:
你每将一个
或
转化为
，你可以将1个该
放置在本卡牌上。只要本卡牌上的
数量等于你的房间数量，本卡牌就为1名家庭成员提供居住空间。

E86_PenBuilder.name: Pen Builder
desc: At any time, you can discard 1 <WOOD> from your supply. This card can hold two animals of any type for each <WOOD> discarded this way.
E86_PenBuilder.description:
在任何时候，你可以将你供应堆中的
放置在本卡牌上(无法再取回)。你可以在本卡牌上安置任何种类的动物，数量等于本卡牌上
数量的两倍。

E87_MasterRenovator.name: Master Renovator
desc: At the end of the work phases of rounds 7 and 9, you can take a __Renovation__ action without placing a person and pay 1 building resource of your choice less.
E87_MasterRenovator.description: 在第7轮和第9轮的工作阶段结束时，你可以执行一次“翻新”行动，无需放置家庭成员且少支付任意1个建造资源。

E88_MasterFencer.name: Master Fencer
desc: Once you live in a stone house, at the start of each round, you can pay 2 or 3 <WOOD> to build up to 3 or 4 fences, respectively.
E88_MasterFencer.description:
一旦你住进石造房屋，在每轮开始时，你可以支付2或3个
来对应地建造最多3或4个栅栏。

E89_Stallwright.name: Stallwright
desc: After you play your 2nd, 3rd, 5th, and 7th occupation (including this one), you can build 1 stable at no cost.
E89_Stallwright.description: 在你打出你的第2张、第3张、第5张和第7张职业卡牌后(包括本卡牌)，你可以免费建造1个畜棚。

E90_DungCollector.name: Dung Collector
desc: Each time you get 2 or more newborn animals, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to plow 1 field.
E90_DungCollector.description:
每当你获得至少2个新生动物时，你可以支付1
来犁1块田。

E91_PlowBuilder.name: Plow Builder
desc: You can build the Joinery when taking a __Minor Improvement__ action. If you use the Joinery (or an upgrade thereof) during the harvest, you can pay 1 <FOOD> to plow 1 field.
E91_PlowBuilder.description:
你执行“次要发展”行动时，可以建造木工坊。如果你在收成期间使用木工坊或其升级，你可以支付1
来犁1块田。

E92_FieldDoctor.name: Field Doctor
desc: Once this game, if you live in a house with exactly 2 rooms surrounded by 4 field tiles, you can use any __Wish for Children__ action space even without room.
E92_FieldDoctor.description: 本局游戏仅限一次，如果你的房屋有正好2个房间且被4块农田板块围住，你可以使用任意“家庭增长”行动格，无需空房间。

E93_Motivator.name: Motivator
desc: On your first turn each round, if you have no unused farmyard spaces, you can place a person from your supply.
E93_Motivator.description: 在每轮内你的第一个回合中，如果你没有未使用的农场格，你可以从你的供应堆中放置一个家庭成员。

E94_Prophet.name: Prophet
desc: When you play this card, immediately take a __Renovation__ action. Afterward, you can take a __Build Fences__ action. (Both actions require their usual cost.)
E94_Prophet.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，立即执行一次“翻新”行动。然后，你可以执行一次“建造栅栏”行动。(这两个行动都需要支付通常的花费。)

E95_Miller.name: Miller
desc: You can immediately build a <BAKE>-improvement by paying its cost. Each time another player uses the __Grain Seeds__ action space, you can take a __Bake Bread__ action.
E95_Miller.description:
你可以支付一个
发展的花费，立即建造该发展。每当其他玩家使用“谷物种子”行动格时，你可以执行1次“烤面包”行动。

E96_Elder.name: Elder
desc: You can play this card at the start of the work phase of round 1 without placing a person. (This card has no effect other than counting as a played occupation.)
E96_Elder.description:
在第1轮的工作阶段开始时，你可以打出本卡牌，无需放置家庭成员。
(本卡牌没有效果，仅算作一张打出的职业卡牌。)

E97_Beneficiary.name: Beneficiary
desc: If this is your 3rd occupation, you can immediately play another occupation for an occupation cost of 1 <FOOD> and/or play 1 minor improvement by paying its cost.
E97_Beneficiary.description:
如果这是你的第3张职业卡牌，你可以立即以1
作为职业花费打出另一张职业卡牌并/或支付1个次要发展的花费来打出该次要发展。

E98_Prodigy.name: Prodigy
desc: If this is your 1st occupation, you immediately get 1 <SCORE> for each improvement you have. (This will not apply to improvements played after this card.)
E98_Prodigy.description:
如果这是你的第1张职业卡牌，你每拥有一个发展，你立即获得1点奖励
。(本效果不适用于在本卡牌之后打出的发展。)

E99_UncaringParents.name: Uncaring Parents
desc: At the end of each harvest, if you live in a stone house, you get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
E99_UncaringParents.description:
在每次收成结束时，如果你住在石造房屋中你获得1点奖励
。

E100_MuseumCaretaker.name: Museum Caretaker
desc: At the start of each work phase, if you have at least 1 <WOOD>, 1 <CLAY>, 1 <REED>, 1 <STONE>, 1 <GRAIN>, and 1 <VEGETABLE> in your supply, you get 1 bonus <SCORE>.
E100_MuseumCaretaker.description:
在每个工作阶段开始时，如果你的供应堆中有至少1
、1
、1
、1
、1
和1
，你获得1点奖励
。

E101_Blighter.name: Blighter
desc: When you play this card, you get 1 bonus <SCORE> for each complete stage left to play. You may not play any more occupations.
E101_Blighter.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，距离游戏结束每有一个未进行的完整时期，获得1点奖励
。你不能再打出任何职业卡牌。

E102_Acquirer.name: Acquirer

E102_Acquirer.description:
在每轮开始时，你可以支付数量等于你拥有的家庭成员数量的
，从公共供应堆购买任意1个货物。

(从下往上)叠在本卡牌上。每当你获得一个和本卡牌最顶上货物种类相同的货物时，你可以将本卡牌最顶上的货物移动到你的供应堆中并获得1个
。

E104_SpiceTrader.name: Spice Trader
desc: If you play this card in round 4 or before, place 3 <VEGETABLE> on the space for round 11. At the start of that round, you get the <VEGETABLE>.
E104_SpiceTrader.description:
如果你在第4轮或之前打出本卡牌，在第1轮的轮次格上放置3
。在该轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E105_Pioneer.name: Pioneer
desc: When you play this card and each time before you use the most recent action space card, you get 1 building resource of your choice and 1 <FOOD>.
E105_Pioneer.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，以及在你每次使用最近放置的行动格卡牌前，你获得任意1个建造资源和1
。

desc: When you play this card, you can immediately turn as many building resources into food as you have people:
<WOOD>/<CLAY> <ARROW> 2 <FOOD>
<REED>/<STONE> <ARROW> 3 <FOOD>

当你打出本卡牌时，你可以立即将数量等于你家庭成员数量的建造资源转化为

/
2
/
3

E107_LandSurveyor.description:

。

desc: Each time you build fences, place 1 <FOOD> on each remaining round space, up to the number of fences just built. At the start of these rounds, you get the <FOOD>.

你每次建造栅栏时，在剩余数个轮次格中各放置1
，放置的轮次格数量等于你刚刚建造的栅栏数量。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的
。

E109_BraidMaker.description:

交换2

和1
的花费建造制篮工坊。在你执行“次要发展”行动时，你可以建造制篮工坊。

desc: At the start of each harvest, you can place 1 <WOOD> from your supply on this card, irretrievably. In each feeding phase, you get 1 <FOOD> for each <WOOD> on this card.

在每次收成开始时，你可以将你供应堆中的1
放置在本卡牌上(无法再取回)。在每个供养步骤中，本卡牌上每有一个

只要你面前没有次要发展，你在每轮开始时获得1
，并且在每次收成开始时获得1
。

E116_FirCutter.description:
当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得1
。你每次用自己的第1个/第2个/第3个/第4个/第5个家庭成员使用动物累积格后，你获得1/1/2/2/3
。

E117_PipeSmoker.description:
在每次收成开始时，如果你至少有1个谷物农田，你获得2
。

desc: Each time you get <FOOD> from an action space, you get 1 additional <WOOD>.

每当你从行动格获得
时，你获得额外1
。

如果你在第4轮或之前打出本卡牌，在第9轮的轮次格上放置4
和4
。在该轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取放置的资源。

从
开始，在接下来6轮的轮次格上交替放置1
和1
。在这些轮开始时，你从该轮格子上拿取相应的资源。

desc: Each time you use the __Grain Seeds__ or __Vegetable Seeds__ action space, you also get 2 or 3 <CLAY>, respectively.

每当你打出或建造一个发展，你在支付其花费后立即选择获得1
或1

你立即获得2
和2
。游戏结束计分时，你的供应堆中每有一个
，获得-1分，并且你的供应堆中每有一个
，获得-1分。你不能再丢弃
和
。

E125_DelayedWayfarer.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，你立即获得任意1个建造资源，并且在本轮所有家庭成员都放置完毕后，你可以从你的供应堆放置一个家庭成员。

一旦你住进石造房屋，在每轮开始时，你可以选择获得2
、2
、1
或1
。

E127_DiligentFarmer.description: 当你打出本卡牌时，如果你将要在3个计分项目中(包括牧场内畜棚)都得最多的4分，你可以免费将自己的房屋扩建1个房间。

每当你建造一个主要发展后，你可以支付1
来犁1块田。

<GRAIN_VEG_STACK> <ARROW-1X> 6<FOOD>
[Scoring]

6

。

。

。游戏结束计分时，

。

如果距离游戏结束仍然有3/6/9个未进行的完整轮次，你立即获得2/3/4

。

你每次使用“芦苇池”累积格时，还获得1
。你每次使用“谷物种子”行动格时，还获得1
。

选择一个后续轮的轮次格，以该格的轮次减去当前轮次，将数量等于计算结果的

。

下一轮中，每当你使用建造资源累积格时，你每从该格上拿取一个建造资源，你还获得1
。

E141_VegetableVendor.description:
你每次使用“主要发展”或“蔬菜种子”行动格时，你还相应地获得1
或一次“主要或次要发展”行动。

[<WOOD> <ARROW> <GRAIN>]
or
[<GRAIN> <ARROW> <STONE>]

或

E143_Hewer.description:
从第3轮开始，在所有黏土累积格都未被占据的每个工作阶段结束时，你获得1
和1
。

E144_WaresSalesman.description:
每次有任意一位玩家(包括你自己)打出或建造一张可以使其将建造资源转化为
的卡牌，你获得正好1个相同的建造资源和1
。

E145_Parvenu.name: Parvenu
desc: If you play this card in round 7 or before, choose <CLAY> or <REED>: you immediately get a number of that building resource equal to the number you already have in your supply.
E145_Parvenu.description:
如果你在第7轮或之前打出本卡牌，选择
或

E146_Reseller.description: 本局游戏仅限一次，在打出或建造一个发展后，你可以立即选择从公共供应堆获得该发展的卡面花费。

E147_AnimalDriver.name: Animal Driver
desc: At the start of each harvest, if you have 1/2/3+ fenced stables, you get 1 <SHEEP>/<PIG>/<CATTLE>.
E147_AnimalDriver.description:
在每次收成开始时，如果你有1个/2个/3+个牧场内畜棚，你获得1
/
/
。

desc: At the start of each round, you can place 1 <FOOD> from your supply on the __Traveling Players__ accumulation space to play a minor improvement by paying its cost.
E152_BargainHunter.description:
在每轮开始时，你可以从你的供应堆中放置1
到“卖艺”累积格上，来打出1张次要发展卡牌(支付其花费)。

E153_StoneSculptor.name: Stone Sculptor
desc: Each harvest, you can use this card to exchange exactly 1 <STONE> for 1 bonus <SCORE> and 1 <FOOD>.
E153_StoneSculptor.description:
每次收成中，你可以使用本卡牌来用正好1
交换1点奖励
和1
。

E154_Margrave.name: Margrave
desc: Once you live in a stone house, you get 2 <FOOD> each time any player renovates and, during scoring, 1 bonus <SCORE> for each wood house and clay house.
E154_Margrave.description:
一旦你住进石造房屋，每当任意玩家翻新时，你获得2个
，并且在游戏结束计分时，每有一个木造房屋或一个砖土房屋，你获得1点奖励
。

E155_Visionary.name: Visionary

E155_Visionary.description:
如果你在第4轮或之前打出本卡牌，你获得1
、1
和2
。你在第11轮之前都不能获得新的家庭成员，除非所有其他玩家都已获得了新的家庭成员。

E156_ClaypitOwner.description:
每次另一位玩家打出或建造卡面花费有
的发展卡牌时，你获得1
和1
。

E157_Usufructuary.name: Usufructuary
desc: When you play this card as your first occupation, you immediately get 1 <FOOD> for every other occupation in play (by any player), up to a maximum of 7 <FOOD>.
E157_Usufructuary.description:
当你将本卡牌作为你的第一张职业卡牌打出时，场上每有一张(任意玩家的)其他职业卡牌，你立即获得1

)。

E158_StoneCustodian.name: Stone Custodian
desc: At the end of each work phase, you get 1 <FOOD> for each stone accumulation space with stone on it.
E158_StoneCustodian.description:
在每个工作阶段结束时，每有一个石材累积格上有石材，你获得1
。

E159_OldMiser.description:
在每次收成的供养步骤中，你的每个家庭成员需要的
